trans-unit.source: This method is identical in functionality to the clear() method (which is part of the List interface).
trans-unit.target: 此方法的功能与 clear() 方法（属于 List 接口的一部分）功能相同。

trans-unit.source: This method is identical in functionality to the get(int) method (which is part of the List interface).
trans-unit.target: 此方法的功能与 get(int) 方法（属于 List 接口的一部分）相同。

trans-unit.source: This method is identical in functionality to the remove(int) method (which is part of the List interface). Note that the remove method returns the old value that was stored at the specified position.
trans-unit.target: 此方法的功能与 remove(int) 方法（属于 List 接口的一部分）相同。请注意， remove 方法返回存储在指定位置的旧值。

trans-unit.source: This method is identical in functionality to the remove(Object) method (which is part of the List interface).
trans-unit.target: 此方法的功能与 remove(Object) 方法（属于 List 接口的一部分）相同。

trans-unit.source: This method is identical in functionality to the set(int, E) method (which is part of the List interface). Note that the set method reverses the order of the parameters, to more closely match array usage. Note also that the set method returns the old value that was stored at the specified position.
trans-unit.target: 此方法的功能与 set(int, E) 方法（属于 List 接口的一部分）相同。请注意， set 方法反转参数的顺序，以更紧密地匹配数组用法。还要注意， set 方法返回存储在指定位置的旧值。

trans-unit.source: This method is identical to size, which implements the List interface defined in the 1.2 Collections framework. This method exists in conjunction with setSize so that size is identifiable as a JavaBean property.
trans-unit.target: 此方法与 size 相同，后者实现了1.2 Collections框架中定义的 List 接口。此方法与 setSize 一起存在，因此可以将 size 标识为JavaBean属性。

trans-unit.source: This method is implemented in terms of setDividerLocation(int). This method immediately changes the size of the split pane based on its current size. If the split pane is not correctly realized and on screen, this method will have no effect (new divider location will become (current size * proportionalLocation) which is 0).
trans-unit.target: 根据 setDividerLocation(int) 实现此方法。此方法根据其当前大小立即更改拆分窗格的大小。如果未正确实现拆分窗格并在屏幕上显示，此方法将无效（新的分隔符位置将变为（当前大小*比例位置）为0）。

trans-unit.source: This method is implemented to do nothing since MOVE is not a supported action of this implementation (getSourceActions does not include MOVE).
trans-unit.target: 实现此方法无济于事，因为 MOVE 不是此实现的支持操作（ getSourceActions 不包括 MOVE ）。

trans-unit.source: This method is implemented to do nothing. Subclasses would normally override this method if they process some key events themselves. If the event is processed, it should be consumed.
trans-unit.target: 这个方法的实现是为了什么都不做。子类如果自己处理一些关键事件,一般会重写这个方法。如果处理了该事件,就应该消耗掉它。

trans-unit.source: This method is included alongside latest() to allow identification of situations where the language model API is running on a platform version different than the latest version modeled by the API. One way that sort of situation can occur is if an IDE or similar tool is using the API to model source version
trans-unit.target: 该方法与 latest() 一起提供，以允许识别语言模型API在与该API建模的最新版本不同的平台版本上运行的情况。发生这种情况的一种方式是，如果IDE或类似工具正在使用API​​对源版本进行建模

trans-unit.source: This method is included for the benefit of applications that must generate bytecodes that process method handles and invokedynamic.
trans-unit.target: 包含此方法是为了使应用程序必须生成可由处理方法处理并 invokedynamic 字节码。

trans-unit.source: This method is included for the benefit of applications that must generate bytecodes that process method handles and invokedynamic. fromMethodDescriptorString, because the latter requires a suitable class loader argument.
trans-unit.target: 包含此方法是为了使应用程序必须生成可处理方法处理和 invokedynamic 的字节码。 fromMethodDescriptorString ，因为后者需要合适的类加载器参数。

trans-unit.source: This method is included for the benefit of applications that must generate bytecodes that process method handles and invokedynamic. fromMethodDescriptorString, because the latter requires a suitable class loader argument.
trans-unit.target: 包含此方法是为了使应用程序必须生成可由处理方法处理并 invokedynamic 字节码。 fromMethodDescriptorString ，因为后者需要合适的类加载器参数。

trans-unit.source: This method is inherently deadlock-prone.
trans-unit.target: 这种方法本身就容易产生死锁。

trans-unit.source: This method is inherently deadlock-prone. See Thread.suspend() for details.
trans-unit.target: 这种方法本质上是容易死锁的。有关详细信息，请参见 Thread.suspend() 。

trans-unit.source: This method is inherently unsafe.
trans-unit.target: 这种方法本质上是不安全的。

trans-unit.source: This method is inherently unsafe. See Thread.stop() for details.
trans-unit.target: 这种方法本质上是不安全的。有关详细信息，请参见 Thread.stop() 。

trans-unit.source: This method is inherently unsafe. Stopping a thread with Thread.stop causes it to unlock all of the monitors that it has locked (as a natural consequence of the unchecked ThreadDeath exception propagating up the stack). If any of the objects previously protected by these monitors were in an inconsistent state, the damaged objects become visible to other threads, potentially resulting in arbitrary behavior. Many uses of stop should be replaced by code that simply modifies some variable to indicate that the target thread should stop running. The target thread should check this variable regularly, and return from its run method in an orderly fashion if the variable indicates that it is to stop running. If the target thread waits for long periods (on a condition variable, for example), the interrupt method should be used to interrupt the wait. For more information, see Why are Thread.stop, Thread.suspend and Thread.resume Deprecated?.
trans-unit.target: 这种方法本质上是不安全的。使用Thread.stop停止线程会导致它解锁所有已锁定的监视器（由于未经检查的 ThreadDeath 异常会在堆栈中传播，这是自然的结果）。如果先前由这些监视器保护的任何对象处于不一致状态，则损坏的对象将对其他线程可见，从而可能导致任意行为。 stop 多种用途应该用简单地修改一些变量以指示目标线程应该停止运行的代码代替。目标线程应定期检查此变量，如果该变量指示要停止运行，则应有序地从其运行方法返回。如果目标线程等待很长一段时间（例如，在条件变量上），则应使用 interrupt 方法来中断等待。有关更多信息，请参见为什么不赞成使用Thread.stop，Thread.suspend和Thread.resume？。

trans-unit.source: This method is inherently unsafe. Stopping a thread with Thread.stop causes it to unlock all of the monitors that it has locked (as a natural consequence of the unchecked ThreadDeath exception propagating up the stack). If any of the objects previously protected by these monitors were in an inconsistent state, the damaged objects become visible to other threads, potentially resulting in arbitrary behavior. Many uses of stop should be replaced by code that simply modifies some variable to indicate that the target thread should stop running. The target thread should check this variable regularly, and return from its run method in an orderly fashion if the variable indicates that it is to stop running. If the target thread waits for long periods (on a condition variable, for example), the interrupt method should be used to interrupt the wait. For more information, see Why are Thread.stop, Thread.suspend and Thread.resume Deprecated?.
trans-unit.target: 这种方法本质上是不安全的。使用Thread.stop停止线程会导致它解锁所有已锁定的监视器（由于未经检查的 ThreadDeath 异常会在堆栈中传播，这是自然的结果）。如果先前由这些监视器保护的任何对象处于不一致状态，则损坏的对象将对其他线程可见，从而可能导致任意行为。 stop 多种用途应该用简单地修改一些变量以指示目标线程应该停止运行的代码代替。目标线程应定期检查此变量，如果该变量指示要停止运行，则应有序地从其运行方法返回。如果目标线程等待很长一段时间（例如，在条件变量上），则应使用 interrupt 方法来中断等待。有关更多信息，请参见为什么不赞成使用Thread.stop，Thread.suspend和Thread.resume？。

trans-unit.source: This method is intended for advanced use cases that need access to the internal state during parsing. Typical application code should use parse(CharSequence, TemporalQuery) or the parse method on the target type.
trans-unit.target: 此方法适用于需要在解析过程中访问内部状态的高级用例。典型的应用程序代码应在目标类型上使用 parse(CharSequence, TemporalQuery) 或parse方法。

trans-unit.source: This method is intended for advanced use cases that need access to the internal state during parsing. Typical application code should use parse(CharSequence, TemporalQuery) or the parse method on the target type.
trans-unit.target: 此方法适用于需要在解析过程中访问内部状态的高级用例。典型的应用程序代码应在目标类型上使用 parse(CharSequence, TemporalQuery) 或parse方法。

trans-unit.source: This method is intended for high-performance class loading. It is not capable (or intended) to read arbitrary large resources that could potentially be 2GB or larger. The rationale for using this method in conjunction with the release method is to allow module reader implementations manage buffers in an efficient manner.
trans-unit.target: 此方法用于高性能的类加载。它无法（或打算）读取可能为2GB或更大的任意大资源。将此方法与 release 方法结合使用的基本原理是允许模块读取器实现以有效的方式管理缓冲区。

trans-unit.source: This method is intended for simple cases where it is appropriate and convenient to read the content of a file into a String. It is not intended for reading very large files.
trans-unit.target: 本方法适用于简单的情况下,将文件的内容读取到一个字符串中是合适的、方便的。它不用于读取非常大的文件。

trans-unit.source: This method is intended for simple cases where it's convenient to read all events in a single operation. It isn't intended for reading large files.
trans-unit.target: 这个方法是为了在简单的情况下,方便地在一次操作中读取所有事件。它不是用来读取大文件的。

trans-unit.source: This method is intended for specialized providers of pseudo file systems where the contents of one or more files is treated as a file system. The env parameter is a map of provider specific properties to configure the file system.
trans-unit.target: 此方法适用于伪文件系统的专门提供程序，其中一个或多个文件的内容被视为文件系统。该 env 参数是地图提供特定属性的配置文件系统。

trans-unit.source: This method is intended for use by focus implementations. Client code should not use this method; instead, it should use requestFocusInWindow().
trans-unit.target: 此方法旨在供焦点实现使用。客户代码不应该使用这种方法。相反，它应该使用 requestFocusInWindow() 。

trans-unit.source: This method is intended for use in instrumentation, as described in the class specification.
trans-unit.target: 如类说明中所述，此方法旨在用于仪器中。

trans-unit.source: This method is intended for use in situations in which new providers can be installed into a running Java virtual machine.
trans-unit.target: 该方法旨在用于将新的提供者安装到正在运行的 Java 虚拟机中的情况。

trans-unit.source: This method is intended for use in situations in which new service providers can be installed into a running Java virtual machine.
trans-unit.target: 该方法旨在用于可以将新的服务提供者安装到正在运行的 Java 虚拟机中的情况。

trans-unit.source: This method is intended for use when generating Java code to set the value of the property.
trans-unit.target: 这个方法是为了在生成Java代码来设置属性的值时使用。

trans-unit.source: This method is intended for use when generating Java code to set the value of the property. It should return a fragment of Java code that can be used to initialize a variable with the current property value.
trans-unit.target: 这个方法是为了在生成Java代码来设置属性值时使用。它应该返回一个Java代码片段,可用于用当前属性值初始化一个变量。

trans-unit.source: This method is intended for use when only installed providers are desired. The resulting service will only find and load providers that have been installed into the current Java virtual machine; providers on the application's class path will be ignored.
trans-unit.target: 此方法用于只需要安装的提供者时。由此产生的服务将只查找并加载已安装到当前 Java 虚拟机中的提供者;应用程序的类路径上的提供者将被忽略。

trans-unit.source: This method is intended for use when only installed providers are desired. The resulting service will only find and load providers that have been installed into the current Java virtual machine; providers on the application's module path or class path will be ignored.
trans-unit.target: 此方法用于只需要已安装的提供者时。由此产生的服务将只查找并加载已安装到当前 Java 虚拟机中的提供者;应用程序的模块路径或类路径上的提供者将被忽略。

trans-unit.source: This method is intended to allow array-backed buffers to be passed to native code more efficiently. Concrete subclasses provide more strongly-typed return values for this method.
trans-unit.target: 这个方法的目的是让数组支持的缓冲区更有效地传递给本地代码。具体子类为这个方法提供了更强类型的返回值。

trans-unit.source: This method is intended to be used after the system is fully initialized. This method may trigger the immediate loading and initialization of the System.LoggerFinder service, which may cause issues if the Java Runtime is not ready to initialize the concrete service implementation yet. System classes which may be loaded early in the boot sequence and need to log localized messages should create a logger using getLogger(java.lang.String) and then use the log methods that take a resource bundle as parameter.
trans-unit.target: 该方法旨在在系统完全初始化之后使用。此方法可能会触发 System.LoggerFinder 服务的立即加载和初始化，如果Java运行时尚未准备好初始化具体的服务实现，则可能会引起问题。可能在引导顺序的早期加载并需要记录本地化消息的系统类应该使用 getLogger(java.lang.String) 创建一个记录器，然后使用将资源包作为参数的log方法。

trans-unit.source: This method is intended to be used by sophisticated applications, for example, a Scanner object which utilizes the rich parsing/scanning functionality provided by the Scanner:
trans-unit.target: 该方法旨在供复杂的应用程序使用，例如，利用 Scanner 提供的丰富的解析/扫描功能的 Scanner 对象：

trans-unit.source: This method is intended to be used only by KeyboardFocusManager set as current KeyboardFocusManager for the calling thread's context. It is not for general client use.
trans-unit.target: 此方法仅用于被设置为调用线程上下文的当前KeyboardFocusManager。它不适合一般客户端使用。

trans-unit.source: This method is intended to be used only by KeyboardFocusManagers and KeyEventDispatchers. It is not for general client use.
trans-unit.target: 此方法仅用于KeyboardFocusManagers和KeyEventDispatchers。它不适合一般客户端使用。

trans-unit.source: This method is intended to be used only by KeyboardFocusManagers and focus implementations. It is not for general client use.
trans-unit.target: 此方法仅用于KeyboardFocusManagers和焦点实现。它不适合一般客户端使用。

trans-unit.source: This method is intended to be used only by event targeting subsystems, such as client-defined KeyboardFocusManagers. It is not for general client use.
trans-unit.target: 此方法仅用于事件目标子系统,如客户端定义的 KeyboardFocusManagers。它不适合一般客户端使用。

trans-unit.source: This method is intended to be used where the file store attribute view defines type-safe methods to read or update the file store attributes. The type parameter is the type of the attribute view required and the method returns an instance of that type if supported.
trans-unit.target: 此方法旨在用于文件存储属性视图定义用于读取或更新文件存储属性的类型安全方法的情况。所述 type 参数是所需要的属性视图的类型，并且如果支持该方法返回该类型的一个实例。

trans-unit.source: This method is intended to help adapt code that produces Enumeration instances to code that consumes Iterator instances. trans-unit.source: This method is intended to provide a default, nonlocalized string for the attribute's category. If two attribute objects return the same category from the getCategory() method, they should return the same name from the getName() method.
trans-unit.target: 此方法旨在为属性的类别提供默认的非本地化字符串。如果两个属性对象从 getCategory() 方法返回相同的类别，则它们应该从 getName() 方法返回相同的名称。

trans-unit.source: This method is intended to report the beginning of the DOCTYPE declaration; if the document has no DOCTYPE declaration, this method will not be invoked.
trans-unit.target: 这个方法的目的是报告DOCTYPE声明的开始;如果文档没有DOCTYPE声明,这个方法将不会被调用。

trans-unit.source: This method is intended to report the end of the DOCTYPE declaration; if the document has no DOCTYPE declaration, this method will not be invoked.
trans-unit.target: 本方法旨在报告DOCTYPE声明的结束;如果文档中没有DOCTYPE声明,本方法将不会被调用。

trans-unit.source: This method is invoked after the ScrollPaneLayout is set as the LayoutManager of a JScrollPane.
trans-unit.target: 将ScrollPaneLayout设置为 JScrollPane 的LayoutManager后，将调用此方法。

trans-unit.target: 将ScrollPaneLayout设置为 JScrollPane 的LayoutManager后，将调用此方法。它初始化通常由 addLayoutComponent 设置的所有内部字段。例如：

trans-unit.source: This method is invoked by a channel's register method in order to perform the actual work of registering the channel with this selector.
trans-unit.target: 通道的 register 方法调用此方法，以执行使用此选择器注册通道的实际工作。

trans-unit.source: This method is invoked by a channel's register method in order to perform the actual work of registering the channel with this selector.
trans-unit.target: 通道的 register 方法调用此方法，以执行使用此选择器注册通道的实际工作。

trans-unit.source: This method is invoked by the close method in order to perform the actual work of closing the channel. This method is only invoked if the channel has not yet been closed, and it is never invoked more than once.
trans-unit.target: 该方法由 close 方法调用，以执行关闭通道的实际工作。仅在尚未关闭通道的情况下才调用此方法，并且永远不要调用一次以上。

trans-unit.source: This method is invoked by the close method in order to perform the actual work of closing the selector. This method is only invoked if the selector has not yet been closed, and it is never invoked more than once.
trans-unit.target: 该方法由 close 方法调用，以执行关闭选择器的实际工作。如果选择尚未关闭此方法仅调用，它永远不会被调用一次以上。

trans-unit.source: This method is invoked by the configureBlocking method in order to perform the actual work of changing the blocking mode. This method is only invoked if the new mode is different from the current mode.
trans-unit.target: 此方法由 configureBlocking 方法调用，以执行更改阻塞模式的实际工作。仅当新模式不同于当前模式时，才调用此方法。

trans-unit.source: This method is invoked by the close method in order to perform the actual work of closing the channel. This method is only invoked if the channel has not yet been closed, and it is never invoked more than once.
trans-unit.target: 该方法由 close 方法调用，以执行关闭通道的实际工作。仅在尚未关闭通道的情况下才调用此方法，并且永远不要调用一次以上。

trans-unit.source: This method is invoked by the close method in order to perform the actual work of closing the channel. This method is only invoked if the channel has not yet been closed, and it is never invoked more than once.
trans-unit.target: 该方法由 close 方法调用，以执行关闭通道的实际工作。仅在尚未关闭通道的情况下才调用此方法，并且永远不要调用一次以上。

trans-unit.source: This method is invoked by the isHidden method.
trans-unit.target: 此方法由 isHidden 方法调用。

trans-unit.source: This method is invoked by the isHidden method.
trans-unit.target: 此方法由 isHidden 方法调用。

trans-unit.source: This method is invoked by the close method in order to perform the actual work of closing the channel. This method is only invoked if the channel has not yet been closed, and it is never invoked more than once.
trans-unit.target: 该方法由 close 方法调用，以执行关闭通道的实际工作。仅在尚未关闭通道的情况下才调用此方法，并且永远不要调用一次以上。

trans-unit.source: This method is invoked by the configureBlocking method in order to perform the actual work of changing the blocking mode. This method is only invoked if the new mode is different from the current mode.
trans-unit.target: 此方法由 configureBlocking 方法调用，以执行更改阻塞模式的实际工作。仅当新模式与当前模式不同时，才调用此方法。

trans-unit.source: This method is invoked by the close method in order to perform the actual work of closing the selector. This method is only invoked if the selector has not yet been closed, and it is never invoked more than once.
trans-unit.target: 该方法由 close 方法调用，以执行关闭选择器的实际工作。仅在选择器尚未关闭的情况下才调用此方法，并且永远不要调用一次以上。

trans-unit.source: This method is invoked by the DragGestureRecognizer when the DragGestureRecognizer detects a platform-dependent drag initiating gesture.
trans-unit.target: 此方法由所调用 DragGestureRecognizer 当 DragGestureRecognizer 检测到依赖于平台的拖动启动动作。

trans-unit.source: This method is invoked by the DragGestureRecognizer when the DragGestureRecognizer detects a platform-dependent drag initiating gesture. To initiate the drag and drop operation, if appropriate, startDrag() method on the DragGestureEvent has to be invoked.
trans-unit.target: 此方法由所调用 DragGestureRecognizer 当 DragGestureRecognizer 检测到依赖于平台的拖动启动动作。要启动拖放操作，如果合适，必须调用 DragGestureEvent 上的 startDrag() 方法。

trans-unit.source: This method is invoked by the createUI method of MultiXxxxUI classes.
trans-unit.target: MultiXxxxUI 类的 createUI 方法调用此方法。

trans-unit.source: This method is invoked by the channel's close method in order to perform the actual work of closing the channel. This method is only invoked if the channel has not yet been closed, and it is never invoked more than once by the channel's close implementation.
trans-unit.target: 这个方法被通道的关闭方法调用,以便执行关闭通道的实际工作。这个方法只有在通道还没有被关闭的情况下才会被调用,而且它绝不会被通道的关闭执行调用超过一次。

trans-unit.source: This method is invoked by the defineClass method which takes a CodeSource as an argument when it is constructing the ProtectionDomain for the class being defined.
trans-unit.target: 该方法由defineClass方法调用,该方法在为被定义的类构建ProtectionDomain时,会将CodeSource作为参数。

trans-unit.source: This method is invoked by the parser to signal it has reached the end of the document after successfully completing the parsing process. After the event, the parser will return the control to the application.
trans-unit.target: 该方法由解析器调用,在成功完成解析过程后,发出信号,表示已经到达文档的终点。事件发生后,解析器将把控件返回给应用程序。

trans-unit.source: This method is invoked during the resolve phase of parsing. It is designed to allow application defined fields to be simplified into more standard fields, such as those on ChronoField, or into a date.
trans-unit.target: 在解析的解析阶段调用此方法。它旨在允许将应用程序定义的字段简化为更多标准字段，例如 ChronoField 上的字段或日期。

trans-unit.source: This method is invoked for the current security manager by methods load and loadLibrary of class Runtime.
trans-unit.target: 当前的安全管理器通过 Runtime 类的 load 和 loadLibrary 方法调用此方法。

trans-unit.source: This method is invoked for the current security manager by the accept method of class ServerSocket.
trans-unit.target: 通过 ServerSocket 类的 accept 方法为当前的安全管理器调用此方法。

trans-unit.source: This method is invoked for the current security manager by the delete method of class File.
trans-unit.target: 当前的安全管理器通过 File 类的 delete 方法调用此方法。

trans-unit.source: This method is invoked for the current security manager by the exec methods of class Runtime.
trans-unit.target: 通过 Runtime 类的 exec 方法为当前的安全管理器调用此方法。

trans-unit.source: This method is invoked for the current security manager by the exit method of class Runtime. A status of 0 indicates success; other values indicate various errors.
trans-unit.target: 通过 Runtime 类的 exit 方法为当前的安全管理器调用此方法。状态 0 表示成功；状态0表示成功。其他值表示各种错误。

trans-unit.source: This method is invoked for the current security manager by the stop, suspend, resume, setPriority, setName, and setDaemon methods of class Thread.
trans-unit.target: 当前的安全管理器通过 Thread 类的 stop ， suspend ， resume ， setPriority ， setName 和 setDaemon 方法调用此方法。

trans-unit.source: This method is invoked for the current security manager when a new child thread or child thread group is created, and by the setDaemon, setMaxPriority, stop, suspend, resume, and destroy methods of class ThreadGroup.
trans-unit.target: 创建新的子线程或子线程组时，将由当前的安全管理器调用此方法，并由 ThreadGroup 类的 setDaemon ， setMaxPriority ， stop ， suspend ， resume 和 destroy 方法来调用此方法。

trans-unit.source: This method is invoked internally by the run() method upon failure of the computation.
trans-unit.target: 计算失败时， run() 方法在内部调用此方法。

trans-unit.source: This method is invoked internally by the run() method upon successful completion of the computation.
trans-unit.target: 成功完成计算后， run() 方法在内部调用此方法。

trans-unit.source: This method is invoked internally by the RunnableFuture.run() method upon failure of the computation.
trans-unit.target: 计算失败时，由 RunnableFuture.run() 方法在内部调用此方法。

trans-unit.source: This method is invoked internally by the RunnableFuture.run() method upon successful completion of the computation.
trans-unit.target: 成功完成计算后，由 RunnableFuture.run() 方法在内部调用此方法。

trans-unit.source: This method is invoked on registered objects when a SSL handshake is completed.
trans-unit.target: 当SSL握手完成时,会在注册对象上调用该方法。

trans-unit.source: This method is invoked once for each push promise received, up to the point where the response body of the initiating client-sent request has been fully received.
trans-unit.target: 这个方法对每个收到的推送承诺都会被调用一次,直到发起的客户端发送的请求的响应体被完全接收为止。

trans-unit.source: This method is invoked only by Java code; when the garbage collector clears references it does so directly, without invoking this method.
trans-unit.target: 这个方法只被Java代码调用;当垃圾回收器清除引用时,它直接清除,而不调用这个方法。

trans-unit.source: This method is invoked only by Java code; when the garbage collector enqueues references it does so directly, without invoking this method.
trans-unit.target: 这个方法只被Java代码调用,当垃圾收集器enqueues引用时,它直接调用,而不调用这个方法。

trans-unit.source: This method is invoked to signify that the Drag and Drop operation is complete.
trans-unit.target: 此方法被调用以表示拖放操作完成。

trans-unit.source: This method is invoked to signify that the Drag and Drop operation is complete. The getDropSuccess() method of the DragSourceDropEvent can be used to determine the termination state. The getDropAction() method returns the operation that the drop site selected to apply to the Drop operation. Once this method is complete, the current DragSourceContext and associated resources become invalid.
trans-unit.target: 调用此方法表示拖放操作已完成。 DragSourceDropEvent 的getDropSuccess（）方法可用于确定终止状态。getDropAction（）方法返回选择放置站点以应用于Drop操作的操作。此方法完成后，当前的 DragSourceContext 和关联的资源将变为无效。

trans-unit.source: This method is invoked when an event is registered to obtain the default value. It is therefore important that a valid value can be returned immediately after an instance of this class is created. It is not valid to return null.
trans-unit.target: 注册事件以获取默认值时，将调用此方法。因此，重要的是，在创建此类的实例之后，可以立即返回有效值。返回 null 无效。

trans-unit.source: This method is invoked while synchronized on the selector and its selected-key set. Great care must be taken to avoid deadlocks with other threads that also synchronize on these objects.
trans-unit.target: 这个方法是在同步选择器和它的select-key集的时候被调用的。必须非常小心,以避免与同样同步这些对象的其他线程发生死锁。

trans-unit.source: This method is invoked with the lock held on this node and its parent (and all ancestors that are being removed as a result of a single invocation to Preferences.removeNode()).
trans-unit.target: 在此节点及其父节点（以及由于对 Preferences.removeNode() 的一次调用而被删除的所有祖先）上保持的锁调用此方法。

trans-unit.source: This method is invoked with the lock held on this node and its parent (and all ancestors that are being removed as a result of a single invocation to Preferences.removeNode()).
trans-unit.target: 在此节点及其父节点（以及由于对 Preferences.removeNode() 的一次调用而被删除的所有祖先）上保持的锁调用此方法。

trans-unit.source: This method is invoked with the lock on this node held.
trans-unit.target: 这个方法是在持有这个节点的锁的情况下调用的。

trans-unit.source: This method is invoked with this node locked.
trans-unit.target: 本方法是在锁定此节点的情况下调用的。

trans-unit.source: This method is invoked with this node locked. The contract of this method is to force any cached changes in the contents of this preference node to the backing store, guaranteeing their persistence. (It is perfectly possible that this node does not exist on the backing store, either because it has been deleted by another VM, or because it has not yet been created.) Note that this method should
trans-unit.target: 这个方法是在锁定这个节点的情况下调用的。此方法的契约是将此优选节点内容的任何缓存变化强制到后盾存储中,保证其持久性。(这个节点完全有可能不存在于后盾存储上,或者因为它已经被另一个虚拟机删除,或者因为它还没有被创建)。请注意,这个方法应该

trans-unit.source: This method is invoked with this node locked. The contract of this method is to synchronize any cached preferences stored at this node with any stored in the backing store. (It is perfectly possible that this node does not exist on the backing store, either because it has been deleted by another VM, or because it has not yet been created.) Note that this method should
trans-unit.target: 这个方法是在锁定这个节点的情况下调用的。此方法的合同是将存储在此节点上的任何缓存首选项与存储在备份存储中的任何首选项同步。此节点完全有可能不存在于备份存储中,因为它已被另一个虚拟机删除,或因为它尚未创建)。请注意,此方法应该

trans-unit.source: This method is like NamingManager.getStateToBind except for the following differences:
trans-unit.target: 此方法类似于 NamingManager.getStateToBind ，不同之处在于：

trans-unit.source: This method is meant for informational use. To display carets, it is better to use getCaretShapes.
trans-unit.target: 此方法仅供参考。要显示插入符号，最好使用 getCaretShapes 。

trans-unit.source: This method is meant for those wishing to customize the default Printable implementation used by JTable's print methods. Developers wanting simply to print the table should use one of those methods directly.
trans-unit.target: 这种方法是为希望自定义默认的 Printable 所使用的实施 JTable 中的 print 方法。仅希望打印表格的开发人员应直接使用这些方法之一。

trans-unit.source: This method is merely a convenience equivalent to calling read(int, ImageReadParam) with a read param specifying a source region having offsets of tileX*getTileWidth(imageIndex), tileY*getTileHeight(imageIndex) and width and height of getTileWidth(imageIndex), getTileHeight(imageIndex); and subsampling factors of 1 and offsets of 0. To subsample a tile, call read with a read param specifying this region and different subsampling parameters.
trans-unit.target: 此方法仅仅是一个方便相当于调用 read(int, ImageReadParam) 与读取PARAM指定具有偏移量的源极区域 tileX*getTileWidth(imageIndex) ， tileY*getTileHeight(imageIndex) 的和的宽度和高度 getTileWidth(imageIndex) ， getTileHeight(imageIndex) ; 子采样因子为1，偏移量为0。要对图块进行子采样，请使用具有指定此区域和不同子采样参数的读取参数调用 read 。

trans-unit.source: This method is needed because the application class path can theoretically change, or additional plug-ins may become available. Rather than re-scanning the classpath on every invocation of the API, the class path is scanned automatically only on the first invocation. Clients can call this method to prompt a re-scan. Thus this method need only be invoked by sophisticated applications which dynamically make new plug-ins available at runtime.
trans-unit.target: 这个方法是需要的,因为从理论上讲,应用程序的类路径可能会发生变化,或者可能会有额外的插件可用。不是在每次调用API时重新扫描classpath,而是只在第一次调用时自动扫描类路径。客户端可以调用这个方法来提示重新扫描。因此,这个方法只需要被复杂的应用程序调用,这些应用程序在运行时动态地提供新的插件。

trans-unit.source: This method is never invoked by this implementation from 1.1 onwards
trans-unit.target: 从1.1开始,这个方法就不会被这个实现所调用。

trans-unit.source: This method is non-final for compatibility. If this method is overridden, this method must return the same name as specified when this class loader was instantiated.
trans-unit.target: 为了兼容性,这个方法是非最终的方法。如果本方法被重写,本方法必须返回与实例化本类加载器时指定的相同名称。

trans-unit.source: This method is normally called when the user has indicated that they will begin dragging a component around.
trans-unit.target: 当用户表示要开始拖动一个组件时,通常会调用这个方法。

trans-unit.source: This method is normally called when the user has indicated that they will begin dragging a component around. This method should be called prior to any dragFrame() calls to allow the DesktopManager to prepare any necessary state. Normally f will be a JInternalFrame.
trans-unit.target: 当用户指示他们将开始拖动组件时，通常会调用此方法。应该在任何dragFrame（）调用之前调用此方法，以允许DesktopManager准备任何必要的状态。通常，f将是JInternalFrame。

trans-unit.source: This method is normally called when the user has indicated that they will begin resizing the frame.
trans-unit.target: 当用户表示将开始调整帧的大小时,通常会调用此方法。

trans-unit.source: This method is normally called when the user has indicated that they will begin resizing the frame. This method should be called prior to any resizeFrame() calls to allow the DesktopManager to prepare any necessary state. Normally f will be a JInternalFrame.
trans-unit.target: 当用户指示他们将开始调整框架的大小时，通常会调用此方法。应该在任何resizeFrame（）调用之前调用此方法，以允许DesktopManager准备任何必要的状态。通常，f将是JInternalFrame。

trans-unit.source: This method is normally used to parse the encoded name value in a requested SNI extension.
trans-unit.target: 该方法通常用于解析请求的SNI扩展中的编码名称值。

trans-unit.source: This method is not called internally in response to paste operations. As such, it is recommended that implementations of importData explicitly call this method for such cases and that this method be prepared to return the suitability of paste operations as well.
trans-unit.target: 响应粘贴操作，不会在内部调用此方法。因此，建议在此类情况下 importData 的实现显式调用此方法，并且还应准备好此方法以返回粘贴操作的适用性。

trans-unit.source: This method is not called unless action events are enabled for this button. Action events are enabled when one of the following occurs:
trans-unit.target: 除非为该按钮启用了动作事件,否则此方法不会被调用。当发生以下情况之一时,动作事件被启用。

trans-unit.source: This method is not called unless action events are enabled for this component. Action events are enabled when one of the following occurs:
trans-unit.target: 除非该组件的动作事件被启用,否则本方法不会被调用。当发生以下情况之一时,动作事件被启用。

trans-unit.source: This method is not called unless adjustment events are enabled for this component. Adjustment events are enabled when one of the following occurs:
trans-unit.target: 除非该组件的调整事件被启用,否则此方法不会被调用。当发生以下情况之一时,调整事件被启用。

trans-unit.source: This method is not called unless component events are enabled for the JLayer objects, this LayerUI is set to. Component events are enabled in the overridden installUI(javax.swing.JComponent) method and should be disabled in the uninstallUI(javax.swing.JComponent) method after that.
trans-unit.target: 除非为该 LayerUI 设置为 JLayer 对象启用了组件事件，否则不会调用此方法。组件事件在覆盖的 installUI(javax.swing.JComponent) 方法中启用，之后应在 uninstallUI(javax.swing.JComponent) 方法中禁用。

trans-unit.source: This method is not called unless component events are enabled for this component. Component events are enabled when one of the following occurs:
trans-unit.target: 除非该组件的组件事件被启用,否则本方法不会被调用。当发生以下情况之一时,组件事件被启用。

trans-unit.source: This method is not called unless focus events are enabled for the JLayer objects, this LayerUI is set to. Focus events are enabled in the overridden installUI(javax.swing.JComponent) method and should be disabled in the uninstallUI(javax.swing.JComponent) method after that.
trans-unit.target: 除非为 LayerUI 设置为 JLayer 对象启用了焦点事件，否则不会调用此方法。焦点事件在重写的 installUI(javax.swing.JComponent) 方法中启用，并且此后应在 uninstallUI(javax.swing.JComponent) 方法中禁用。

trans-unit.source: This method is not called unless focus events are enabled for this component. Focus events are enabled when one of the following occurs:
trans-unit.target: 除非该组件的焦点事件被启用,否则本方法不会被调用。当出现以下情况之一时,将启用焦点事件。

trans-unit.source: This method is not called unless hierarchy bounds events are enabled for the JLayer objects, this LayerUI is set to. Hierarchy bounds events are enabled in the overridden installUI(javax.swing.JComponent) method and should be disabled in the uninstallUI(javax.swing.JComponent) method after that.
trans-unit.target: 除非为该 LayerUI 设置为 JLayer 对象启用了层次结构边界事件，否则不会调用此方法。层次结构边界事件在重写的 installUI(javax.swing.JComponent) 方法中启用，此后应在 uninstallUI(javax.swing.JComponent) 方法中禁用。

trans-unit.source: This method is not called unless hierarchy bounds events are enabled for this component. Hierarchy bounds events are enabled when one of the following occurs:
trans-unit.target: 除非该组件的分级界限事件被启用,否则本方法不会被调用。当出现以下情况之一时,将启用层次界限事件。

trans-unit.source: This method is not called unless hierarchy events are enabled for the JLayer objects, this LayerUI is set to. Hierarchy events are enabled in the overridden installUI(javax.swing.JComponent) method and should be disabled in the uninstallUI(javax.swing.JComponent) method after that.
trans-unit.target: 除非为该 LayerUI 设置为 JLayer 对象启用了层次结构事件，否则不会调用此方法。层次结构事件在重写的 installUI(javax.swing.JComponent) 方法中启用，并且此后应在 uninstallUI(javax.swing.JComponent) 方法中禁用。

trans-unit.source: This method is not called unless hierarchy events are enabled for this component. Hierarchy events are enabled when one of the following occurs:
trans-unit.target: 除非该组件的分级事件被启用,否则本方法不会被调用。当发生以下情况之一时,将启用层次事件。

trans-unit.source: This method is not called unless input events are enabled for the JLayer objects, this LayerUI is set to. Input events are enabled in the overridden installUI(javax.swing.JComponent) method and should be disabled in the uninstallUI(javax.swing.JComponent) method after that.
trans-unit.target: 除非为该 LayerUI 设置为 JLayer 对象启用了输入事件，否则不会调用此方法。输入事件在重写的 installUI(javax.swing.JComponent) 方法中启用，并且此后应在 uninstallUI(javax.swing.JComponent) 方法中禁用。

trans-unit.source: This method is not called unless input method events are enabled for this component. Input method events are enabled when one of the following occurs:
trans-unit.target: 除非该组件的输入方法事件被启用,否则该方法不会被调用。当发生以下情况之一时,输入法事件被启用。

trans-unit.source: This method is not called unless item events are enabled for this component. Item events are enabled when one of the following occurs:
trans-unit.target: 除非该组件的项目事件被启用,否则本方法不会被调用。当出现以下情况之一时,将启用项目事件。

trans-unit.source: This method is not called unless item events are enabled for this menu item. Item events are enabled when one of the following occurs:
trans-unit.target: 除非该菜单项的事件被启用,否则本方法不会被调用。当发生以下情况之一时,启用项目事件。

trans-unit.source: This method is not called unless key events are enabled for the JLayer objects, this LayerUI is set to. Key events are enabled in the overridden installUI(javax.swing.JComponent) method and should be disabled in the uninstallUI(javax.swing.JComponent) method after that.
trans-unit.target: 除非为 JLayer 对象（此 LayerUI 设置为）启用了键事件，否则不会调用此方法。在覆盖的 installUI(javax.swing.JComponent) 方法中启用了键事件，此后应在 uninstallUI(javax.swing.JComponent) 方法中将其禁用。

trans-unit.source: This method is not called unless key events are enabled for this component. Key events are enabled when one of the following occurs:
trans-unit.target: 除非该组件的关键事件被启用,否则本方法不会被调用。当发生以下情况之一时,关键事件被启用。

trans-unit.source: This method is not called unless mouse events are enabled for the JLayer objects, this LayerUI is set to. Mouse events are enabled in the overridden installUI(javax.swing.JComponent) method and should be disabled in the uninstallUI(javax.swing.JComponent) method after that.
trans-unit.target: 除非为 LayerUI 设置为 JLayer 对象启用了鼠标事件，否则不会调用此方法。鼠标事件在重写的 installUI(javax.swing.JComponent) 方法中启用，并且此后应在 uninstallUI(javax.swing.JComponent) 方法中禁用。

trans-unit.source: This method is not called unless mouse events are enabled for this component. Mouse events are enabled when one of the following occurs:
trans-unit.target: 除非该组件的鼠标事件被启用,否则本方法不会被调用。当出现以下情况之一时,鼠标事件被启用。

trans-unit.source: This method is not called unless mouse motion events are enabled for the JLayer objects, this LayerUI is set to. Mouse motion events are enabled in the overridden installUI(javax.swing.JComponent) method and should be disabled in the uninstallUI(javax.swing.JComponent) method after that.
trans-unit.target: 除非为此 LayerUI 设置为 JLayer 对象启用了鼠标移动事件，否则不会调用此方法。鼠标移动事件在重写的 installUI(javax.swing.JComponent) 方法中启用，并且此后应在 uninstallUI(javax.swing.JComponent) 方法中禁用。

trans-unit.source: This method is not called unless mouse motion events are enabled for this component. Mouse motion events are enabled when one of the following occurs:
trans-unit.target: 除非该组件的鼠标运动事件被启用,否则本方法不会被调用。当发生以下情况之一时,鼠标运动事件被启用。

trans-unit.source: This method is not called unless mouse wheel events are enabled for the JLayer objects, this LayerUI is set to. Mouse wheel events are enabled in the overridden installUI(javax.swing.JComponent) method and should be disabled in the uninstallUI(javax.swing.JComponent) method after that.
trans-unit.target: 除非为此 LayerUI 设置为 JLayer 对象启用了鼠标滚轮事件，否则不会调用此方法。鼠标滚轮事件在重写的 installUI(javax.swing.JComponent) 方法中启用，并且此后应在 uninstallUI(javax.swing.JComponent) 方法中禁用。

trans-unit.source: This method is not called unless mouse wheel events are enabled for this component. Mouse wheel events are enabled when one of the following occurs:
trans-unit.target: 除非该组件的鼠标滚轮事件被启用,否则本方法不会被调用。当发生以下情况之一时,鼠标滚轮事件被启用。

trans-unit.source: This method is not intended to encourage the development of non-JDBC compliant drivers, but is a recognition of the fact that some vendors are interested in using the JDBC API and framework for lightweight databases that do not support full database functionality, or for special databases such as document information retrieval where a SQL implementation may not be feasible.
trans-unit.target: 这种方法并不是为了鼓励开发不符合JDBC标准的驱动程序,而是认识到一些厂商有兴趣将JDBC API和框架用于不支持完整数据库功能的轻量级数据库,或者用于特殊的数据库,如文档信息检索,而在这些数据库中,SQL的实现可能是不可行的。

trans-unit.source: This method is not meant for querying the drop location from a TransferHandler, as the drop location is only set after the TransferHandler's canImport has returned and has allowed for the location to be shown.
trans-unit.target: 此方法并不用于从 TransferHandler 查询放置位置，因为仅在 TransferHandler 的 canImport 返回并允许显示位置之后才设置放置位置。

trans-unit.source: This method is not needed because a ValueExp can access the MBean server in which it is being evaluated by using QueryEval.getMBeanServer().
trans-unit.target: 不需要此方法，因为 ValueExp 可以使用 QueryEval.getMBeanServer() 访问正在对其进行评估的MBean服务器。

trans-unit.source: This method is not needed for the initial handshake, as the wrap() and unwrap() methods will implicitly call this method if handshaking has not already begun.
trans-unit.target: 初始握手不需要此方法，因为如果握手尚未开始，则 wrap() 和 unwrap() 方法将隐式调用此方法。

trans-unit.source: This method is not supported by JLayer and always throws UnsupportedOperationException
trans-unit.target: JLayer 不支持此方法，并且始终抛出 UnsupportedOperationException

trans-unit.source: This method is not used by Synth Look and Feel. Painting is handled by the paint(SynthContext,Graphics) method.
trans-unit.target: Synth Look and Feel不使用此方法。绘画是通过 paint(SynthContext,Graphics) 方法处理的。

trans-unit.source: This method is now obsolete, please use setMnemonic(int) to set the mnemonic for a button.
trans-unit.target: 现在该方法已过时，请使用 setMnemonic(int) 设置按钮的助记符。

trans-unit.source: This method is now obsolete, please use setMnemonic(int) to set the mnemonic for a button. This method is only designed to handle character values which fall between 'a' and 'z' or 'A' and 'Z'.
trans-unit.target: 现在该方法已过时，请使用 setMnemonic(int) 设置按钮的助记符。此方法仅设计用于处理介于“ a”和“ z”或“ A”和“ Z”之间的字符值。

trans-unit.source: This method is now obsolete, please use a combination of getActionMap() and getInputMap() for similar behavior.
trans-unit.target: 此方法现在已过时，请对相似的行为使用 getActionMap() 和 getInputMap() 的组合。

trans-unit.source: This method is now obsolete, please use a combination of getActionMap() and getInputMap() for similar behavior. For example, to bind the KeyStrokeaKeyStroke to the ActionanAction now use:
trans-unit.target: 此方法现在已过时，请对相似的行为使用 getActionMap() 和 getInputMap() 的组合。例如，现在要将 KeyStroke aKeyStroke 绑定到 Action anAction ,请使用：

trans-unit.source: This method is now obsolete.
trans-unit.target: 这种方法现在已经过时了。

trans-unit.source: This method is now obsolete. To unregister an existing binding you can either remove the binding from the ActionMap/InputMap, or place a dummy binding the InputMap. Removing the binding from the InputMap allows bindings in parent InputMaps to be active, whereas putting a dummy binding in the InputMap effectively disables the binding from ever happening.
trans-unit.target: 现在，此方法已过时。要注销现有绑定，您可以从 ActionMap/InputMap 中删除该绑定，也可以放置一个与 InputMap 绑定的虚拟绑定。从 InputMap 中删除绑定可以使父 InputMap 中的绑定处于活动状态，而在 InputMap 中放置虚拟绑定则可以有效地防止绑定发生。

trans-unit.source: This method is obsolete and is kept for backwards compatibility only. Use getModalityType() instead.
trans-unit.target: 此方法已过时，保留此方法仅是为了向后兼容。请改用 getModalityType() 。

trans-unit.source: This method is obsolete and is kept for backwards compatibility only. Use setModalityType() instead.
trans-unit.target: 此方法已过时，保留此方法仅是为了向后兼容。请改用 setModalityType() 。

trans-unit.source: This method is obsolete and its implementation is now a noop.
trans-unit.target: 这个方法已经过时了,它的实现现在是一个noop。

trans-unit.source: This method is obsolete and its implementation is now a noop. It's still called by setSelectionPaths and addSelectionPaths, but only for backwards compatibility.
trans-unit.target: 这个方法已经过时了,它的实现现在是一个noop。setSelectionPaths和addSelectionPaths仍然会调用它,但只是为了向后兼容。

trans-unit.source: This method is obsolete and kept for backward compatibility only. Use Window.getIconImages() instead.
trans-unit.target: 该方法已过时，保留下来只是为了向后兼容。请改用 Window.getIconImages() 。

trans-unit.source: This method is obsolete and supplied for backwards compatibility only; new code should call adjustForGravity instead. This method is the same as adjustForGravity
trans-unit.target: 该方法已过时，仅用于向后兼容。新代码应改为调用 adjustForGravity 。此方法与 adjustForGravity 相同

trans-unit.source: This method is obsolete and supplied for backwards compatibility only; new code should call arrangeGrid instead.
trans-unit.target: 该方法已过时，仅用于向后兼容。新代码应改为调用 arrangeGrid 。

trans-unit.source: This method is obsolete and supplied for backwards compatibility only; new code should call arrangeGrid instead. This method is the same as arrangeGrid
trans-unit.target: 该方法已过时，仅用于向后兼容。新代码应改为调用 arrangeGrid 。该方法与 arrangeGrid 相同

trans-unit.source: This method is obsolete and supplied for backwards compatibility only; new code should call getLayoutInfo instead.
trans-unit.target: 该方法已过时，仅用于向后兼容。新代码应改为调用 getLayoutInfo 。

trans-unit.source: This method is obsolete and supplied for backwards compatibility only; new code should call getLayoutInfo instead. Fills in an instance of GridBagLayoutInfo for the current set of managed children. This method is the same as getLayoutInfo; refer to getLayoutInfo description for details.
trans-unit.target: 该方法已过时，仅用于向后兼容。新代码应改为调用 getLayoutInfo 。填写 GridBagLayoutInfo 的实例作为当前托管子集的一部分。此方法与 getLayoutInfo 相同；有关详细信息，请参考 getLayoutInfo 描述。

trans-unit.source: This method is obsolete and supplied for backwards compatibility only; new code should call getMinSize instead.
trans-unit.target: 该方法已过时，仅用于向后兼容。新代码应改为调用 getMinSize 。

trans-unit.source: This method is obsolete and supplied for backwards compatibility only; new code should call getMinSize instead. This method is the same as getMinSize
trans-unit.target: 该方法已过时，仅用于向后兼容。新代码应改为调用 getMinSize 。此方法与 getMinSize 相同

trans-unit.source: This method is obsolete as of 1.1. Please use the method add(Component, Object) instead.
trans-unit.target: 从1.1开始，此方法已过时。请改用 add(Component, Object) 方法。

trans-unit.source: This method is often used in a loop in combination with list(State.CARD_INSERTION), for example:
trans-unit.target: 此方法通常与 list(State.CARD_INSERTION) 一起在循环中使用，例如：

trans-unit.source: This method is often used in conjunction with the compact method when transferring data from one place to another.
trans-unit.target: 当将数据从一个位置传输到另一位置时，通常将此方法与 compact 方法结合使用。

trans-unit.source: This method is often used in conjunction with the compact method when transferring data from one place to another.
trans-unit.target: 当将数据从一个位置传输到另一位置时，通常将此方法与 compact 方法结合使用。

trans-unit.source: This method is often used in conjunction with the compact method when transferring data from one place to another.
trans-unit.target: 当将数据从一个地方传输到另一个地方时，通常将此方法与 compact 方法结合使用。

trans-unit.source: This method is only appicable for received messages, it has no meaning for messages being sent.
trans-unit.target: 此方法只适用于已收到的信息,对正在发送的信息没有意义。

trans-unit.source: This method is only for use with drag and drop transfers. Calling it when isDrop() is false results in an IllegalStateException.
trans-unit.target: 此方法仅适用于拖放传输。当 isDrop() 为 false 时调用它会导致 IllegalStateException 。

trans-unit.source: This method is only guaranteed to force changes that were made to this channel's file via the methods defined in this class.
trans-unit.target: 这个方法只保证通过本类中定义的方法强制修改这个通道的文件。

trans-unit.source: This method is only guaranteed to force changes that were made to this channel's file via the methods defined in this class. It may or may not force changes that were made by modifying the content of a mapped byte buffer obtained by invoking the map method. Invoking the force method of the mapped byte buffer will force changes made to the buffer's content to be written.
trans-unit.target: 仅保证此方法强制通过此类中定义的方法对该通道的文件进行更改。它可能会或可能不会强制通过修改通过调用 map 方法获得的已 mapped byte buffer 的内容进行的更改。调用映射的字节缓冲区的 force 方法将强制更改对缓冲区内容的写入。

trans-unit.source: This method is only guaranteed to force changes that were made to this channel's file via the methods defined in this class. It may or may not force changes that were made by modifying the content of a mapped byte buffer obtained by invoking the map method. Invoking the force method of the mapped byte buffer will force changes made to the buffer's content to be written.
trans-unit.target: 仅保证此方法强制通过此类中定义的方法对该通道的文件进行更改。它可能会也可能不会强制通过修改通过调用 map 方法获得的 mapped byte buffer 的内容进行的更改。调用映射的字节缓冲区的 force 方法将强制更改对缓冲区内容的写入。

trans-unit.source: This method is only included for backwards compatibility. The caller is encouraged to use one of the alternative getInstance methods to obtain a SecureRandom object, and then call the generateSeed method to obtain seed bytes from that object.
trans-unit.target: 仅包括此方法是为了向后兼容。鼓励调用者使用替代的 getInstance 方法之一来获取 SecureRandom 对象，然后调用 generateSeed 方法来从该对象获取种子字节。

trans-unit.source: This method is only included for backwards compatibility. The caller is encouraged to use one of the alternative getInstance methods to obtain a SecureRandom object, and then call the generateSeed method to obtain seed bytes from that object.
trans-unit.target: 仅包括此方法是为了向后兼容。鼓励调用者使用替代的 getInstance 方法之一来获取SecureRandom对象，然后调用 generateSeed 方法来从该对象获取种子字节。

trans-unit.source: This method is only useful to SSLSockets or SSLEngines operating in client mode.
trans-unit.target: 此方法仅对在客户端模式下运行的 SSLSocket 或 SSLEngine 有用。

trans-unit.source: This method is only useful to SSLSockets or SSLEngines operating in server mode.
trans-unit.target: 此方法仅对在服务器模式下运行的 SSLSocket 或 SSLEngine 有用。

trans-unit.source: This method is optionally supported by the platform. A Java virtual machine implementation may not support the compilation time monitoring. The isCompilationTimeMonitoringSupported() method can be used to determine if the Java virtual machine supports this operation.
trans-unit.target: 平台可选地支持此方法。Java虚拟机实现可能不支持编译时间监视。所述 isCompilationTimeMonitoringSupported() 方法可用于确定Java虚拟机支持此操作。

trans-unit.source: This method is optionally supported by the platform. A Java virtual machine implementation may not support the compilation time monitoring. The isCompilationTimeMonitoringSupported() method can be used to determine if the Java virtual machine supports this operation.
trans-unit.target: 平台可选地支持此方法。 Java虚拟机实现可能不支持编译时间监视。所述 isCompilationTimeMonitoringSupported() 方法可用于确定Java虚拟机支持此操作。

trans-unit.source: This method is overridden by providers to initialize this signature engine with the specified parameter set.
trans-unit.target: 本方法被提供者重写,用于用指定的参数集初始化本签名引擎。

trans-unit.source: This method is overridden by providers to return the parameters used with this signature engine, or null if this signature engine does not use any parameters.
trans-unit.target: 本方法被提供者重载,以返回本签名引擎使用的参数,如果本签名引擎没有使用任何参数,则返回null。

trans-unit.source: This method is overridden by providers to return the parameters used with this signature engine.
trans-unit.target: 此方法被提供者重载,以返回使用此签名引擎的参数。

trans-unit.source: This method is overriden to map any character entities, such as < to &lt;.
trans-unit.target: 重写此方法可映射任何字符实体，例如<到＆lt;。

trans-unit.source: This method is overriden to map any character entities, such as < to <. super.output will be invoked to write the content.
trans-unit.target: 重写此方法可映射任何字符实体，例如<到＆lt;。将调用 super.output 写入内容。

trans-unit.source: This method is particularly useful when it is necessary to match a single certificate. Although other criteria can be specified in conjunction with the certificateEquals criterion, it is usually not practical or necessary.
trans-unit.target: 当需要匹配单个证书时,这个方法特别有用。虽然其他的标准可以和certificateEquals标准一起指定,但通常是不实际或不必要的。

trans-unit.source: This method is potentially much more efficient than a simple loop that reads from the source channel and writes to this channel. Many operating systems can transfer bytes directly from the source channel into the filesystem cache without actually copying them.
trans-unit.target: 这种方法有可能比从源通道读取并写入这个通道的简单循环更有效率。许多操作系统可以直接将字节从源通道传输到文件系统缓存中,而不需要实际复制它们。

trans-unit.source: This method is potentially much more efficient than a simple loop that reads from this channel and writes to the target channel. Many operating systems can transfer bytes directly from the filesystem cache to the target channel without actually copying them.
trans-unit.target: 这种方法可能比从这个通道读取并写入目标通道的简单循环更有效率。许多操作系统可以直接从文件系统缓存中传输字节到目标通道,而不需要实际复制它们。

trans-unit.source: This method is properly synchronized to allow correct use by more than one thread. However, if many threads need to generate pseudorandom numbers at a great rate, it may reduce contention for each thread to have its own pseudorandom-number generator.
trans-unit.target: 这个方法是适当同步的,允许一个以上的线程正确使用。但是,如果许多线程需要以很大的速度生成伪随机数,那么每个线程都有自己的伪随机数生成器可能会减少争夺。

trans-unit.source: This method is provided as an implementation convenience for Spliterators which store portions of their elements in arrays, and need fine control over Spliterator characteristics. Most other situations in which a Spliterator for an array is needed should use Arrays.spliterator(Object[]).
trans-unit.target: 为拆分器的实现方便提供了此方法，拆分器将其元素的一部分存储在数组中，并且需要精细控制拆分器的特性。在需要为数组使用分隔符的大多数其他情况下，应使用 Arrays.spliterator(Object[]) 。
