trans-unit.source: This method is provided because the generic URI syntax specified in RFC 2396 cannot always distinguish a malformed server-based authority from a legitimate registry-based authority. It must therefore treat some instances of the former as instances of the latter. The authority component in the URI string "//foo:bar", for example, is not a legal server-based authority but it is legal as a registry-based authority.
trans-unit.target: 之所以提供此方法，是因为RFC 2396中指定的通用URI语法不能始终将格式错误的基于服务器的权限与合法的基于注册表的权限区分开。因此，它必须将前者的某些实例视为后者的实例。例如，URI字符串 "//foo:bar" 的授权组件不是基于服务器的合法授权，但作为基于注册表的授权也是合法的。

trans-unit.source: This method is provided because the generic URI syntax specified in RFC 2396 cannot always distinguish a malformed server-based authority from a legitimate registry-based authority. It must therefore treat some instances of the former as instances of the latter. The authority component in the URI string "//foo:bar", for example, is not a legal server-based authority but it is legal as a registry-based authority.
trans-unit.target: 之所以提供此方法，是因为RFC 2396中指定的通用URI语法不能始终将格式错误的基于服务器的权限与合法的基于注册表的权限区分开。因此，它必须将前者的某些实例视为后者的实例。例如，URI字符串 "//foo:bar" 的授权组件不是基于服务器的合法授权，但作为基于注册表的授权却是合法的。

trans-unit.source: This method is provided for SAX parser writers, to allow them to build up an attribute list incrementally before delivering it to the application.
trans-unit.target: 该方法是为SAX解析器编写者提供的,允许他们在将其交付给应用程序之前,逐步建立一个属性列表。

trans-unit.source: This method is provided for implementations to provide optional type information about the associated event.
trans-unit.target: 本方法是为实现者提供相关事件的可选类型信息。

trans-unit.source: This method is provided for implementations to provide optional type information about the associated event. It is optional and will return null if no information is available.
trans-unit.target: 这个方法是为实现提供相关事件的可选类型信息。它是可选的,如果没有可用信息,将返回null。

trans-unit.source: This method is provided for the convenience. It is functionally equivalent to the following code:
trans-unit.target: 为了方便起见,提供了这个方法。它在功能上等同于下面的代码。

trans-unit.source: This method is provided for use in situations where it is known that the given string is a legal URI, for example for URI constants declared within a program, and so it would be considered a programming error for the string not to parse as such. The constructors, which throw URISyntaxException directly, should be used in situations where a URI is being constructed from user input or from some other source that may be prone to errors.
trans-unit.target: 提供此方法用于已知给定字符串是合法URI的情况，例如用于程序中声明的URI常量的情况，因此对于无法按原样解析的字符串，这将被视为编程错误。直接从用户输入或从其他易于出错的来源构造URI的情况下，应使用直接引发 URISyntaxException 的构造函数。

trans-unit.source: This method is provided for use in situations where it is known that the given string is a legal URI, for example for URI constants declared within in a program, and so it would be considered a programming error for the string not to parse as such. The constructors, which throw URISyntaxException directly, should be used situations where a URI is being constructed from user input or from some other source that may be prone to errors.
trans-unit.target: 提供此方法的目的是在已知给定字符串是合法URI的情况下使用，例如，在程序中声明的URI常量，因此对于这样无法解析的字符串将被视为编程错误。直接从用户输入或从其他可能容易出错的来源构造URI的情况下，应使用直接抛出 URISyntaxException 的构造函数。

trans-unit.source: This method is provided in Beans 1.0 as a hook to allow the addition of more flexible bean behaviour in the future.
trans-unit.target: 这个方法在Beans 1.0中作为一个钩子提供给大家,以允许在未来增加更灵活的bean行为。

trans-unit.source: This method is provided so that this class can implement the CharSequence interface.
trans-unit.target: 提供此方法是为了使此类可以实现 CharSequence 接口。

trans-unit.source: This method is public as a side effect of this class implementing the ImageProducer interface. It should not be called from user code, and its behavior if called from user code is unspecified.
trans-unit.target: 作为实现 ImageProducer 接口的此类的副作用，此方法是公共的。不应从用户代码中调用它，并且如果未从用户代码中调用它的行为，则未指定。

trans-unit.source: This method is public as an implementation side effect.
trans-unit.target: 这个方法作为实施的副作用是公开的。

trans-unit.source: This method is public as an implementation side effect. do not call or override.
trans-unit.target: 这个方法是公共的,作为一个实现的副作用,不要调用或覆盖。

trans-unit.source: This method is public but should not be called by anything other than the UI delegate.
trans-unit.target: 这个方法是公开的,但不应该被UI委托以外的任何东西调用。

trans-unit.source: This method is required to be public, but should never be called explicitly.
trans-unit.target: 这个方法是需要公开的,但绝不应该被显式调用。

trans-unit.source: This method is required to be public, but should never be called explicitly. It performs the main run loop to execute ForkJoinTasks.
trans-unit.target: 该方法必须是公共的，但决不能显式调用。它执行主运行循环以执行 ForkJoinTask 。

trans-unit.source: This method is required to conform to the MenuElement interface, but it not implemented.
trans-unit.target: 需要此方法符合 MenuElement 接口，但未实现。

trans-unit.source: This method is responsible for submitting the form data.
trans-unit.target: 本方法负责提交表格数据。

trans-unit.source: This method is responsible for submitting the form data. A thread is forked to undertake the submission.
trans-unit.target: 这个方法负责提交表单数据。一个线程被分叉来进行提交。

trans-unit.source: This method is responsible for undertaking the transfer of the data associated with the gesture. The DropTargetDropEvent provides a means to obtain a Transferable object that represents the data object(s) to be transferred.
trans-unit.target: 该方法负责进行与手势关联的数据的传输。所述 DropTargetDropEvent 提供以获得一种手段 Transferable 表示数据对象（多个）被传输的对象。

trans-unit.source: This method is safe for concurrent use and so allows multiple agents to instrument and update the same module at around the same time.
trans-unit.target: 这种方法对并发使用是安全的,因此允许多个代理在同一时间对同一模块进行仪表和更新。

trans-unit.source: This method is similar to map(Function), but the mapping function is one whose result is already an Optional, and if invoked, flatMap does not wrap it within an additional Optional.
trans-unit.target: 此方法类似于 map(Function) ，但是映射函数是其结果已经是 Optional 的函数，如果调用该函数，则 flatMap 不会将其包装在其他 Optional 中。

trans-unit.source: This method is similar to setCharacterAttributes(), but it allows you to change the attributes of paragraph Elements. It is up to the implementation of a StyledDocument to define which Elements are paragraphs. DefaultStyledDocument interprets paragraph Elements to be the parent Element of the character Element. Invoking this method does not result in a structure change; only the attributes of the paragraph Element change.
trans-unit.target: 此方法类似于 setCharacterAttributes() ，但是它允许您更改Elements段落的属性。由StyledDocument的实现来定义哪些元素是段落。 DefaultStyledDocument将段落Elements解释为字符Element的父元素。调用此方法不会导致结构更改；仅段落元素的属性会更改。

trans-unit.source: This method is similar to the wait method of one argument, but it allows finer control over the amount of time to wait for a notification before giving up. The amount of real time, measured in nanoseconds, is given by:
trans-unit.target: 此方法类似于一个参数的 wait 方法，但是它可以更好地控制放弃通知之前等待通知的时间。实时量（以纳秒为单位）由下式给出：

trans-unit.source: This method is sometimes useful when adapting a method handle that may be variable arity, to ensure that the resulting adapter is also variable arity if and only if the original handle was. For example, this code changes the first argument of a handle mh to int without disturbing its variable arity property: mh.asType(mh.type().changeParameterType(0,int.class)) .withVarargs(mh.isVarargsCollector())
trans-unit.target: 在改编可能是可变Arity的方法句柄时，此方法有时很有用，以确保当且仅当原始句柄为时，结果适配器也是可变Arity。例如，此代码将句柄 mh 的第一个参数更改为 int 而不干扰其可变arity属性： mh.asType(mh.type().changeParameterType(0,int.class)) .withVarargs(mh.isVarargsCollector())

trans-unit.source: This method is subject to removal in a future version of Java SE.
trans-unit.target: 这个方法在未来的Java SE版本中会被删除。

trans-unit.source: This method is subject to removal in a future version of Java SE. Use the system tool provider or service loader mechanisms to locate system tools as well as user-installed tools.
trans-unit.target: 将来的Java SE版本中可能会删除此方法。使用 system tool provider 或 service loader 机制来查找系统工具以及用户安装的工具。

trans-unit.source: This method is suitable for reading bytes written by the writeChar method of interface DataOutput.
trans-unit.target: 此方法适合于读取由 DataOutput 接口的 writeChar 方法写入的字节。

trans-unit.source: This method is suitable for reading bytes written by the writeInt method of interface DataOutput.
trans-unit.target: 此方法适合于读取由 DataOutput 接口的 writeInt 方法写入的字节。

trans-unit.source: This method is suitable for reading bytes written by the writeLong method of interface DataOutput.
trans-unit.target: 此方法适合于读取由 DataOutput 接口的 writeLong 方法写入的字节。

trans-unit.source: This method is suitable for reading the bytes written by the writeShort method of interface DataOutput if the argument to writeShort was intended to be a value in the range 0 through 65535.
trans-unit.target: 如果 writeShort 的参数的取值范围为 0 到 65535 ，则此方法适合于读取由 DataOutput 接口的 writeShort 方法写入的字节。

trans-unit.source: This method is suitable for reading the bytes written by the writeShort method of interface DataOutput.
trans-unit.target: 此方法适合于读取 DataOutput 接口的 writeShort 方法写入的字节。

trans-unit.source: This method is synchronous: it will not return until parsing has ended. If a client application wants to terminate parsing early, it should throw an exception.
trans-unit.target: 这个方法是同步的:它不会返回,直到解析结束。如果客户端应用程序想提前终止解析,它应该抛出一个异常。

trans-unit.source: This method is the basis for the Class.getResource, Class.getResourceAsStream, and Module.getResourceAsStream methods. It is not subject to the rules for encapsulation specified by Module.getResourceAsStream.
trans-unit.target: 此方法是 Class.getResource ， Class.getResourceAsStream 和 Module.getResourceAsStream 方法的基础。它不受 Module.getResourceAsStream 指定的封装规则的约束。

trans-unit.source: This method is the same as NamingManager.getObjectInstance except for the following differences:
trans-unit.target: 此方法与 NamingManager.getObjectInstance 相同，不同之处在于：

trans-unit.source: This method is the same as the prepareStatement method above, but it allows the default result set type, concurrency, and holdability to be overridden.
trans-unit.target: 此方法与上面的 prepareStatement 方法相同，但是它允许覆盖默认结果集类型，并发性和可保留性。

trans-unit.source: This method is thread safe, although most Swing methods are not. Please see Concurrency in Swing for more information.
trans-unit.target: 尽管大多数Swing方法都不安全，但是此方法是线程安全的。有关更多信息，请参见Swing中的并发。

trans-unit.source: This method is thread safe, although most Swing methods are not. Please see Concurrency in Swing for more information.
trans-unit.target: 尽管大多数Swing方法都不安全，但是此方法是线程安全的。有关更多信息，请参见Swing中的并发。

trans-unit.source: This method is thread-safe, although most Swing methods are not. Please see Concurrency in Swing for more information.
trans-unit.target: 尽管大多数Swing方法不是，但此方法是线程安全的。有关更多信息，请参见Swing中的并发。

trans-unit.source: This method is thread-safe, although most Swing methods are not. Please see Concurrency in Swing for more information.
trans-unit.target: 尽管大多数Swing方法不是，但此方法是线程安全的。有关更多信息，请参见Swing中的并发。

trans-unit.source: This method is to be overridden instead of JLayer.imageUpdate.
trans-unit.target: 将重写此方法，而不是 JLayer.imageUpdate 。

trans-unit.source: This method is to be overridden when extending this service to support caching and versioning.
trans-unit.target: 当扩展该服务以支持缓存和版本管理时,该方法将被重写。

trans-unit.source: This method is to be overridden when extending this service to support caching and versioning. It is called from getMBeansFromURL when the version, codebase, and jarfile have been extracted from the MLet file, and can be used to verify that it is all right to load the given MBean, or to replace the given URL with a different one.
trans-unit.target: 扩展此服务以支持缓存和版本控制时，将覆盖此方法。当从MLet文件中提取了版本，代码库和jarfile时，从 getMBeansFromURL 调用该方法，该方法可用于验证是否可以加载给定的MBean或用其他URL替换给定的URL。

trans-unit.source: This method is to be overridden when extending this service to support caching and versioning. It is called from getMBeansFromURL when the version, codebase, and jarfile have been extracted from the MLet file, and can be used to verify that it is all right to load the given MBean, or to replace the given URL with a different one.
trans-unit.target: 扩展此服务以支持缓存和版本控制时，将覆盖此方法。当从MLet文件中提取了版本，代码库和jarfile时，从 getMBeansFromURL 调用该方法，该方法可用于验证是否可以加载给定的MBean或用另一个URL替换给定的URL。

trans-unit.source: This method is to be overridden when the dirty region needs to be changed for components that are painting origins.
trans-unit.target: 当需要改变作为绘画起源的组件的脏区域时,该方法要被覆盖。

trans-unit.source: This method is to be overridden when the dirty region needs to be changed. The default implementation delegates its functionality to JComponent.paintImmediately(int, int, int, int).
trans-unit.target: 当需要更改脏区时，将覆盖此方法。默认实现将其功能委托给 JComponent.paintImmediately(int, int, int, int) 。

trans-unit.source: This method is to be used by Connection pooling managers.
trans-unit.target: 此方法由连接池管理员使用。

trans-unit.source: This method is typically
trans-unit.target: 这种方法通常是

trans-unit.source: This method is typically called a FilteredRowSet object internal methods (not public) that control the RowSet object's cursor moving from row to the next.
trans-unit.target: 此方法通常称为 FilteredRowSet 对象的内部方法（非公共方法），该方法控制 RowSet 对象的光标从行移动到下一行。

trans-unit.source: This method is typically called a FilteredRowSet object internal methods (not public) that control the RowSet object's cursor moving from row to the next. In addition, if this internal method moves the cursor onto a row that has been deleted, the internal method will continue to ove the cursor until a valid row is found.
trans-unit.target: 此方法通常称为 FilteredRowSet 对象的内部方法（非公共方法），该方法控制 RowSet 对象的光标从行移动到下一行。此外，如果此内部方法将光标移动到已删除的行上，则内部方法将继续将光标移到该行上，直到找到有效行为止。

trans-unit.source: This method is typically called from the environment in order to determine if the implementor "needs" a GUI.
trans-unit.target: 这个方法通常从环境中调用,以确定实现者是否 "需要 "一个GUI。

trans-unit.source: This method is typically invoked from within a task's run method, to determine whether the current execution of the task is sufficiently timely to warrant performing the scheduled activity:
trans-unit.target: 该方法通常从任务的运行方法中调用,以确定当前任务的执行是否足够及时,以保证执行预定活动。

trans-unit.source: This method is typically used for debugging and testing purposes.
trans-unit.target: 这种方法通常用于调试和测试目的。

trans-unit.source: This method is typically used to decide which agent to load into the target virtual machine with loadAgent, or loadAgentLibrary. For example, the java.home or user.dir properties might be use to create the path to the agent library or JAR file.
trans-unit.target: 此方法通常用于决定使用 loadAgent 或 loadAgentLibrary 将哪个代理加载到目标虚拟机中。例如，可以使用 java.home 或 user.dir 属性来创建代理程序库或JAR文件的路径。

trans-unit.source: This method is unlike others in this and related interfaces. It operates on runtime reflective information — representations of annotation types currently loaded into the VM — rather than on the representations defined by and used throughout these interfaces. Consequently, calling methods on the returned annotation object can throw many of the exceptions that can be thrown when calling methods on an annotation object returned by core reflection. This method is intended for callers that are written to operate on a known, fixed set of annotation types.
trans-unit.target: 此方法在此接口和相关接口中不同于其他方法。它对运行时反射信息（当前加载到VM中的注释类型的表示形式）进行操作，而不是对这些接口定义和使用的表示形式进行操作。因此，在返回的注释对象上调用方法可能会引发许多异常，而在对核心反射返回的注释对象上调用方法时可能会引发这些异常。此方法适用于编写为对已知的固定注释类型集进行操作的调用方。

trans-unit.source: This method is used by getUI, it's usually not necessary to call it directly.
trans-unit.target: 此方法由 getUI 使用，通常不需要直接调用它。

trans-unit.source: This method is used by a DragGestureRecognizer implementation to add an InputEvent subclass (that it believes is one in a series of events that comprise a Drag and Drop operation) to the array of events that this DragGestureRecognizer maintains internally.
trans-unit.target: DragGestureRecognizer 实现使用此方法向此 DragGestureRecognizer 内部维护的事件数组添加 InputEvent 子类（它认为是包含拖放操作的一系列事件中的一个）。

trans-unit.source: This method is used by the getProperties and setProperties methods of class System.
trans-unit.target: System 类的 getProperties 和 setProperties 方法使用此方法。

trans-unit.source: This method is used by the getProperty method of class System.
trans-unit.target: System 类的 getProperty 方法使用此方法。

trans-unit.source: This method is used by the loadClass method of class loaders.
trans-unit.target: 类加载器的 loadClass 方法使用此方法。

trans-unit.source: This method is used by the loadClass method of some class loaders.
trans-unit.target: 某些类加载器的 loadClass 方法使用此方法。

trans-unit.source: This method is used solely in conjunction with Thread.suspend and ThreadGroup.suspend, both of which have been deprecated, as they are inherently deadlock-prone.
trans-unit.target: 此方法仅与不推荐使用的 Thread.suspend 和 ThreadGroup.suspend 结合使用，因为它们固有地容易死锁。

trans-unit.source: This method is used solely in conjunction with Thread.suspend and ThreadGroup.suspend, both of which have been deprecated, as they are inherently deadlock-prone. See Thread.suspend() for details.
trans-unit.target: 此方法仅与不推荐使用的 Thread.suspend 和 ThreadGroup.suspend 结合使用，因为它们固有地容易死锁。有关详细信息，请参见 Thread.suspend() 。

trans-unit.source: This method is used to enable streaming of a HTTP request body without internal buffering, when the content length is not known in advance.
trans-unit.target: 此方法用于启用没有内部缓冲的HTTP请求正文流，当内容长度不事先已知的。

trans-unit.source: This method is used to enable streaming of a HTTP request body without internal buffering, when the content length is not known in advance. In this mode, chunked transfer encoding is used to send the request body. Note, not all HTTP servers support this mode.
trans-unit.target: 此方法用于启用没有内部缓冲的HTTP请求正文流，当内容长度不事先已知的。在这种模式下，分块传输编码用于发送请求正文。注意，并非所有HTTP服务器都支持此模式。

trans-unit.source: This method is used to enable streaming of a HTTP request body without internal buffering, when the content length is known in advance.
trans-unit.target: 该方法用于在事先知道内容长度的情况下,实现HTTP请求体的流式传输,无需内部缓冲。

trans-unit.source: This method is used to establish a relationship between the socket and the local address. Once a relationship is established then the socket remains bound until the channel is closed. This relationship may not necesssarily be with the address local as it may be removed by unbindAddress, but there will always be at least one local address bound to the channel's socket once an invocation of this method successfully completes.
trans-unit.target: 此方法用于在套接字和本地地址之间建立关系。建立关系后，套接字将保持绑定状态，直到关闭通道。这种关系可能不必与 local 地址建立关系，因为可以通过 unbindAddress 删除它，但是一旦成功完成此方法的调用，便始终有至少一个本地地址绑定到通道的套接字。

trans-unit.source: This method is used to establish a relationship between the socket and the local addresses. Once a relationship is established then the socket remains bound until the channel is closed. This relationship may not necesssarily be with the address local as it may be removed by unbindAddress, but there will always be at least one local address bound to the channel's socket once an invocation of this method successfully completes.
trans-unit.target: 此方法用于在套接字和本地地址之间建立关系。建立关系后，套接字将保持绑定状态，直到关闭通道。这种关系可能不必与 local 地址建立关系，因为可以通过 unbindAddress 删除它，但是一旦成功完成此方法的调用，便始终有至少一个本地地址绑定到通道的套接字。

trans-unit.source: This method is used to establish an association between the socket and a local address. Once an association is established then the socket remains bound until the associated channel is closed.
trans-unit.target: 该方法用于建立套接字和本地地址之间的关联。一旦建立了关联,那么套接字就会一直保持绑定,直到关联通道关闭。

trans-unit.source: This method is used to establish an association between the socket and a local address. Once an association is established then the socket remains bound until the channel is closed.
trans-unit.target: 该方法用于建立套接字和本地地址之间的关联。一旦建立了关联,那么套接字就会保持绑定,直到通道关闭。

trans-unit.source: This method is used to establish an association between the socket and a local address. Once an association is established then the socket remains bound until the channel is closed. If the local parameter has the value null then the socket will be bound to an address that is assigned automatically.
trans-unit.target: 此方法用于在套接字和本地地址之间建立关联。建立关联后，套接字将保持绑定状态，直到关闭通道。如果 local 参数的值为 null ,则套接字将绑定到自动分配的地址。

trans-unit.source: This method is used to get a float value in a specified unit.
trans-unit.target: 本方法用于获取一个指定单位的浮点数。

trans-unit.source: This method is used to get a float value in a specified unit. If this CSS value doesn't contain a float value or can't be converted into the specified unit, a DOMException is raised.
trans-unit.target: 此方法用于获取指定单位的浮点值。如果此CSS值不包含浮点值或无法转换为指定的单位，则会引发 DOMException 。

trans-unit.source: This method is used to get the Counter value.
trans-unit.target: 本方法用于获取Counter值。

trans-unit.source: This method is used to get the Counter value. If this CSS value doesn't contain a counter value, a DOMException is raised. Modification to the corresponding style property can be achieved using the Counter interface.
trans-unit.target: 此方法用于获取计数器值。如果此CSS值不包含计数器值，则会引发 DOMException 。可以使用 Counter 接口对相应的style属性进行修改。

trans-unit.source: This method is used to get the RGB color.
trans-unit.target: 此方法用于获取RGB颜色。

trans-unit.source: This method is used to get the RGB color. If this CSS value doesn't contain a RGB color value, a DOMException is raised. Modification to the corresponding style property can be achieved using the RGBColor interface.
trans-unit.target: 此方法用于获取RGB颜色。如果此CSS值不包含RGB颜色值，则引发 DOMException 。可以使用 RGBColor 接口实现对相应样式属性的修改。

trans-unit.source: This method is used to get the Rect value.
trans-unit.target: 本方法用于获取Rect值。

trans-unit.source: This method is used to get the Rect value. If this CSS value doesn't contain a rect value, a DOMException is raised. Modification to the corresponding style property can be achieved using the Rect interface.
trans-unit.target: 此方法用于获取Rect值。如果此CSS值不包含rect值，则引发 DOMException 。可以使用 Rect 接口实现对相应样式属性的修改。

trans-unit.source: This method is used to get the computed style as it is defined in [CSS2].
trans-unit.target: 此方法用于获取[ CSS2 ]中定义的计算样式。

trans-unit.source: This method is used to get the string value.
trans-unit.target: 本方法用于获取字符串值。

trans-unit.source: This method is used to get the string value. If the CSS value doesn't contain a string value, a DOMException is raised. Some properties (like 'font-family' or 'voice-family') convert a whitespace separated list of idents to a string.
trans-unit.target: 此方法用于获取字符串值。如果CSS值不包含字符串值，则会引发 DOMException 。某些属性（例如“ font-family”或“ voice-family”）会将空格分隔的标识符列表转换为字符串。

trans-unit.source: This method is used to indicate to the GSSManager that the application would like a particular provider to be used ahead of all others when support is desired for the given mechanism.
trans-unit.target: 该方法用于向GSSManager表明,当需要支持给定机制时,应用程序希望在所有其他提供者之前使用特定提供者。

trans-unit.source: This method is used to indicate to the GSSManager that the application would like a particular provider to be used ahead of all others when support is desired for the given mechanism. When a value of null is used instead of an Oid for the mechanism, the GSSManager must use the indicated provider ahead of all others no matter what the mechanism is. Only when the indicated provider does not support the needed mechanism should the GSSManager move on to a different provider.
trans-unit.target: 此方法用于向GSSManager指示，当需要给定机制的支持时，该应用程序希望在所有其他应用程序之前使用特定的提供程序。如果为该机制使用null值而不是 Oid ，则无论该机制是什么，GSSManager都必须在所有其他机制之前使用指定的提供程序。仅当指示的提供程序不支持所需的机制时，GSSManager才可以继续使用其他提供程序。

trans-unit.source: This method is used to indicate to the GSSManager that the application would like a particular provider to be used if no other provider can be found that supports the given mechanism.
trans-unit.target: 该方法用于向GSSManager表明,如果找不到支持给定机制的其他提供者,应用程序希望使用特定的提供者。

trans-unit.source: This method is used to indicate to the GSSManager that the application would like a particular provider to be used if no other provider can be found that supports the given mechanism. When a value of null is used instead of an Oid for the mechanism, the GSSManager must use the indicated provider for any mechanism.
trans-unit.target: 该方法用于向GSSManager表明,如果找不到支持给定机制的其他提供者,应用程序希望使用特定提供者。当机制的值为null而不是Oid时,GSSManager必须为任何机制使用指定的提供者。

trans-unit.source: This method is used to interrupt file loading thread.
trans-unit.target: 该方法用于中断文件加载线程。

trans-unit.source: This method is used to replace the definition of a class without reference to the existing class file bytes, as one might do when recompiling from source for fix-and-continue debugging. Where the existing class file bytes are to be transformed (for example in bytecode instrumentation) retransformClasses should be used.
trans-unit.target: 此方法用于替换类的定义，而无需引用现有的类文件字节，就像从源重新编译以进行修复并继续调试时所做的那样。如果要转换现有的类文件字节（例如，在字节码检测中），则应使用 retransformClasses 。

trans-unit.source: This method is used to replace the definition of a class without reference to the existing class file bytes, as one might do when recompiling from source for fix-and-continue debugging. Where the existing class file bytes are to be transformed (for example in bytecode instrumentation) retransformClasses should be used.
trans-unit.target: 此方法用于替换类的定义，而无需引用现有的类文件字节，就像从源重新编译以进行修复并继续调试时所做的那样。如果要转换现有的类文件字节（例如，在字节码检测中），则应使用 retransformClasses 。

trans-unit.source: This method is used to retrieve the override style declaration for a specified element and a specified pseudo-element.
trans-unit.target: 本方法用于检索指定元素和指定伪元素的覆盖样式声明。

trans-unit.source: This method is used with indirect CRLs. The default implementation always returns null. Subclasses that wish to support indirect CRLs should override it.
trans-unit.target: 本方法用于间接CRL。默认的实现总是返回null。希望支持间接CRL的子类应该重写它。

trans-unit.source: This method is useful for ComponentUI implementations that are static (i.e. shared) and get their state entirely from the JComponent.
trans-unit.target: 这个方法对于ComponentUI实现是静态的(即共享的),并且完全从JComponent中获取它们的状态是有用的。

trans-unit.source: This method is useful for clients which have only dimensions and want to find a Media which corresponds to the dimensions.
trans-unit.target: 此方法对仅具有尺寸并且要查找与尺寸对应的 Media 客户端很有用。

trans-unit.source: This method is useful for clients which have only dimensions and want to find a Media which corresponds to the dimensions.
trans-unit.target: 这种方法对于只有尺寸的客户来说很有用,因为他们想找到一个与尺寸相对应的媒体。

trans-unit.source: This method is useful for implementing Object.hashCode() on objects containing multiple fields. For example, if an object that has three fields, x, y, and z, one could write:
trans-unit.target: 此方法对于在包含多个字段的对象上实现 Object.hashCode() 很有用。例如，如果一个对象具有 x ， y 和 z 三个字段，则可以编写：

trans-unit.source: This method is useful for implementing Object.hashCode() on objects containing multiple fields. For example, if an object that has three fields, x, y, and z, one could write:
trans-unit.target: 此方法对于在包含多个字段的对象上实现 Object.hashCode() 很有用。例如，如果一个对象具有 x ， y 和 z 三个字段，则可以编写：

trans-unit.source: This method is useful for retrieving arbitrary information that is specific to the cryptographic operation that this context is used for.
trans-unit.target: 这个方法对于检索这个上下文所使用的加密操作所特有的任意信息是有用的。

trans-unit.source: This method is useful for storing arbitrary information that is specific to the cryptographic operation that this context is used for.
trans-unit.target: 这个方法对于存储这个上下文所使用的加密操作所特有的任意信息是有用的。

trans-unit.source: This method is useful to help locate a service that can print a MultiDoc in which the elements may be different flavors. An application could perform this itself by multiple lookups on each DocFlavor in turn and collating the results, but the lookup service may be able to do this more efficiently.
trans-unit.target: 此方法对于帮助查找可以打印其中元素可能具有不同风格的 MultiDoc 的服务很有用。应用程序可以通过依次在每个 DocFlavor 上进行多次查找并整理结果来自己执行此操作，但是查找服务可能能够更有效地执行此操作。

trans-unit.source: This method is useful when a client needs to "narrow" the type of a Class object to pass it to an API that restricts the Class objects that it is willing to accept. A cast would generate a compile-time warning, as the correctness of the cast could not be checked at runtime (because generic types are implemented by erasure).
trans-unit.target: 当客户端需要“缩小” Class 对象的类型以将其传递给限制其愿意接受的 Class 对象的API时，此方法很有用。强制转换会生成编译时警告，因为在运行时无法检查强制转换的正确性（因为通用类型是通过擦除实现的）。

trans-unit.source: This method is useful when a list of transforms have already been applied to the Reference. See for example, the OASIS-DSS (Digital Signature Services) specification.
trans-unit.target: 当已将一系列转换应用于“ Reference 时，此方法很有用。例如，参见OASIS-DSS（数字签名服务）规范。

trans-unit.source: This method is useful when the digest value of a Reference has been previously computed. See for example, the OASIS-DSS (Digital Signature Services) specification.
trans-unit.target: 如果先前已经计算了 Reference 的摘要值，则此方法很有用。例如，参见OASIS-DSS（数字签名服务）规范。

trans-unit.source: This method is useful when the list is too long to allow the ListUI to compute the width/height of each cell, and there is a single cell value that is known to occupy as much space as any of the others, a so-called prototype.
trans-unit.target: 当列表太长而无法允许 ListUI 计算每个单元格的宽度/高度，并且有一个单元格值与其他任何一个单元格一样占用空间时，此方法很有用，即所谓的原型。

trans-unit.source: This method is usually used to check key size and key usage.
trans-unit.target: 这种方法通常用于检查密钥大小和密钥用途。

trans-unit.source: This method iterates over the installed providers to locate the provider that is identified by the URI scheme of the given URI. URI schemes are compared without regard to case. If the provider is found then its getPath method is invoked to convert the URI.
trans-unit.target: 此方法遍历已 installed 提供程序，以找到由给定URI的URI scheme 标识的提供程序。比较URI方案时不考虑大小写。如果找到了提供程序，则将调用其 getPath 方法以转换URI。

trans-unit.source: This method iterates over the installed providers to locate the provider that is identified by the URI scheme of the given URI. URI schemes are compared without regard to case. The exact form of the URI is highly provider dependent. If found, the provider's getFileSystem method is invoked to obtain a reference to the FileSystem.
trans-unit.target: 此方法遍历已 installed 提供程序，以找到由给定URI的URI scheme 标识的提供程序。比较URI方案时不考虑大小写。URI的确切形式高度依赖于提供程序。如果找到，则调用提供程序的 getFileSystem 方法以获得对 FileSystem 的引用。

trans-unit.source: This method iterates over the installed providers to locate the provider that is identified by the URI scheme of the given URI. URI schemes are compared without regard to case. The exact form of the URI is highly provider dependent. If found, the provider's newFileSystem(URI,Map) method is invoked to construct the new file system.
trans-unit.target: 此方法遍历已 installed 提供程序，以找到由给定URI的URI scheme 标识的提供程序。比较URI方案时不考虑大小写。 URI的确切形式高度依赖于提供程序。如果找到，则调用提供程序的 newFileSystem(URI,Map) 方法来构造新文件系统。

trans-unit.source: This method iterates over the installed providers. It invokes, in turn, each provider's newFileSystem(Path,Map) method with an empty map. If a provider returns a file system then the iteration terminates and the file system is returned. If none of the installed providers return a FileSystem then an attempt is made to locate the provider using the given class loader. If a provider returns a file system then the lookup terminates and the file system is returned.
trans-unit.target: 此方法遍历已 installed 提供程序。依次调用每个提供者的具有空映射的 newFileSystem(Path,Map) 方法。如果提供者返回文件系统，则迭代终止，并返回文件系统。如果没有安装的提供者返回一个 FileSystem ，然后试图找到使用给定的类加载器的供应商。如果提供程序返回文件系统，则查找将终止并返回文件系统。

trans-unit.source: This method iterates over the installed providers. It invokes, in turn, each provider's newFileSystem(Path,Map) method. If a provider returns a file system then the iteration terminates and the file system is returned. If none of the installed providers return a FileSystem then an attempt is made to locate the provider using the given class loader. If a provider returns a file system, then the lookup terminates and the file system is returned.
trans-unit.target: 此方法遍历已 installed 提供程序。依次调用每个提供程序的 newFileSystem(Path,Map) 方法。如果提供者返回文件系统，则迭代终止，并返回文件系统。如果没有安装的提供者返回一个 FileSystem ，然后试图找到使用给定的类加载器的供应商。如果提供者返回文件系统，则查找终止，并返回文件系统。

trans-unit.source: This method iterates over the installed providers to locate the provider that is identified by the URI scheme of the given URI. URI schemes are compared without regard to case. If the provider is found then its getPath method is invoked to convert the URI.
trans-unit.target: 此方法遍历已 installed 提供程序，以找到由给定URI 的URI scheme 标识的提供程序。比较URI方案时不考虑大小写。如果找到了提供程序，则将调用其 getPath 方法以转换URI。

trans-unit.source: This method iterates over the installed providers to locate the provider that is identified by the URI scheme of the given URI. URI schemes are compared without regard to case. The exact form of the URI is highly provider dependent. If found, the provider's getFileSystem method is invoked to obtain a reference to the FileSystem.
trans-unit.target: 此方法遍历已 installed 提供程序，以找到由给定URI 的URI scheme 标识的提供程序。比较URI方案时不考虑大小写。URI的确切形式高度依赖于提供者。如果找到，则调用提供程序的 getFileSystem 方法以获得对 FileSystem 的引用。

trans-unit.source: This method iterates over the installed providers to locate the provider that is identified by the URI scheme of the given URI. URI schemes are compared without regard to case. The exact form of the URI is highly provider dependent. If found, the provider's newFileSystem(URI,Map) method is invoked to construct the new file system.
trans-unit.target: 此方法遍历已 installed 提供程序，以找到由给定URI 的URI scheme 标识的提供程序。比较URI方案时不考虑大小写。 URI的确切形式高度依赖于提供者。如果找到，将调用提供程序的 newFileSystem(URI,Map) 方法来构造新文件系统。

trans-unit.source: This method iterates over the installed providers. It invokes, in turn, each provider's newFileSystem(Path,Map) method with an empty map. If a provider returns a file system then the iteration terminates and the file system is returned. If none of the installed providers return a FileSystem then an attempt is made to locate the provider using the given class loader. If a provider returns a file system then the lookup terminates and the file system is returned.
trans-unit.target: 此方法遍历已 installed 提供程序。依次调用每个提供程序的 newFileSystem(Path,Map) 方法（带有空映射）。如果提供者返回文件系统，则迭代终止，并返回文件系统。如果没有安装的提供者返回一个 FileSystem ，然后试图找到使用给定的类加载器的供应商。如果提供程序返回文件系统，则查找将终止并返回文件系统。

trans-unit.source: This method iterates over the entire collection, hence it requires time proportional to the size of the collection.
trans-unit.target: 这种方法在整个集合上迭代,因此它需要的时间与集合的大小成正比。

trans-unit.source: This method itself does not throw any exception for null parameter but for exceptions thrown by the respective method of the listener.
trans-unit.target: 这个方法本身不会为null参数抛出任何异常,而是为监听器的各个方法抛出的异常。

trans-unit.source: This method loads the class through the system class loader (see getSystemClassLoader()). The Class object returned might have more than one ClassLoader associated with it. Subclasses of ClassLoader need not usually invoke this method, because most class loaders need to override just findClass(String).
trans-unit.target: 此方法通过系统类加载器加载该类（请参见 getSystemClassLoader() ）。返回的 Class 对象可能与一个以上的 ClassLoader 相关联。通常， ClassLoader 的子类不需要调用此方法，因为大多数类加载器仅需要覆盖 findClass(String) 。

trans-unit.source: This method loads the class through the system class loader (see getSystemClassLoader()). The Class object returned might have more than one ClassLoader associated with it. Subclasses of ClassLoader need not usually invoke this method, because most class loaders need to override just findClass(String).
trans-unit.target: 此方法通过系统类加载器加载该类（请参见 getSystemClassLoader() ）。返回的 Class 对象可能与一个以上的 ClassLoader 相关联。通常， ClassLoader 的子类不需要调用此方法，因为大多数类加载器仅需要覆盖 findClass(String) 。

trans-unit.source: This method locates the implementation class by locating configuration files that have the name:
trans-unit.target: 本方法通过定位具有该名称的配置文件来定位实现类。

trans-unit.source: This method looks up the prefix in the current context. Use the empty string ("") for the default Namespace.
trans-unit.target: 本方法在当前上下文中查找前缀。使用空字符串("")作为默认的命名空间。

trans-unit.source: This method makes a best effort to ensure that this segment's contents are are no longer resident in physical memory. Accessing this segment's contents after invoking this method may cause some number of page faults and I/O operations to occur (as this segment's contents might need to be paged back in).
trans-unit.target: 这个方法尽最大努力确保这个段的内容不再驻留在物理内存中。在调用此方法后访问此段的内容可能会导致一些页面错误和I/O操作的发生(因为此段的内容可能需要被分页回来)。

trans-unit.source: This method makes a best effort to ensure that, when it returns, this buffer's content is resident in physical memory. Invoking this method may cause some number of page faults and I/O operations to occur.
trans-unit.target: 这个方法尽最大努力确保当它返回时,这个缓冲区的内容是驻留在物理内存中的。调用此方法可能会导致一些页面故障和I/O操作的发生。

trans-unit.source: This method makes a best effort to ensure that, when it returns, this segment's contents is resident in physical memory. Invoking this method may cause some number of page faults and I/O operations to occur.
trans-unit.target: 这个方法尽最大努力确保当它返回时,这个段的内容是驻留在物理内存中的。调用此方法可能会导致一些页面故障和I/O操作的发生。

trans-unit.source: This method makes a copy of the input
trans-unit.target: 本方法将输入的

trans-unit.source: This method makes a copy of the input password before storing it.
trans-unit.target: 此方法在存储输入 password 之前先对其进行复制。

trans-unit.source: This method makes use of CellRendererPane to handle the actual painting, and is only recommended if you use one component for rendering. If you make use of multiple components to handle the rendering, as JTable does, use CellRendererPane directly. Otherwise, as described below, you could end up with a CellRendererPane per Component.
trans-unit.target: 此方法利用 CellRendererPane 处理实际的绘画，仅在使用一个组件进行渲染时才建议使用此方法。如果像 JTable 一样使用多个组件来处理呈现，请直接使用 CellRendererPane 。否则，如下所述，您最终可能会遇到每个 Component 都带有 CellRendererPane 的情况。

trans-unit.source: This method makes use of specialized providers that create pseudo file systems where the contents of one or more files is treated as a file system.
trans-unit.target: 这种方法利用专门的提供者创建伪文件系统,其中一个或多个文件的内容被视为一个文件系统。

trans-unit.source: This method marks the group as shutdown. Further attempts to construct channel that binds to this group will throw ShutdownChannelGroupException. The group terminates when all asynchronous channels in the group are closed, all actively executing completion handlers have run to completion, and all resources have been released. This method has no effect if the group is already shutdown.
trans-unit.target: 此方法将组标记为关闭。进一步尝试构造绑定到此组的通道将引发 ShutdownChannelGroupException 。当组中的所有异步通道都关闭，所有有效执行的完成处理程序运行完毕并且所有资源都已释放时，该组终止。如果该组已经关闭，则此方法无效。

trans-unit.source: This method matches the signature of the functional interface TemporalQuery allowing it to be used as a query via method reference, ChronoLocalDate::from.
trans-unit.target: 此方法与功能接口 TemporalQuery 的签名匹配，从而可以通过方法引用 ChronoLocalDate::from 用作查询。

trans-unit.source: This method matches the signature of the functional interface TemporalQuery allowing it to be used as a query via method reference, ChronoLocalDateTime::from.
trans-unit.target: 此方法与功能接口 TemporalQuery 的签名匹配，从而可以通过方法引用 ChronoLocalDateTime::from 用作查询。

trans-unit.source: This method matches the signature of the functional interface TemporalQuery allowing it to be used as a query via method reference, ZonedDateTime::from.
trans-unit.target: 此方法与功能接口 TemporalQuery 的签名匹配，从而可以通过方法引用 ZonedDateTime::from 用作查询。

trans-unit.source: This method may also be used to read database-specific abstract data types.
trans-unit.target: 这个方法也可以用来读取数据库特定的抽象数据类型。

trans-unit.source: This method may also be used to read database-specific abstract data types. In the JDBC 2.0 API, the behavior of method getObject is extended to materialize data of SQL user-defined types.
trans-unit.target: 此方法也可以用于读取特定于数据库的抽象数据类型。在JDBC 2.0 API中，方法 getObject 的行为被扩展为实现SQL用户定义类型的数据。

trans-unit.source: This method may be called at most once.
trans-unit.target: 本方法最多可以调用一次。

trans-unit.source: This method may be called from multiple threads in parallel. It must be thread-safe when invoked.
trans-unit.target: 这个方法可以从多个线程并行调用。调用时必须是线程安全的。

trans-unit.source: This method may be called repeatedly; the second and subsequent calls have no effect.
trans-unit.target: 本方法可以重复调用,第二次及以后的调用没有效果。

trans-unit.source: This method may be invoked at any time. If a send or receive operation upon this channel is invoked while an invocation of this method is in progress then that operation will first block until this invocation is complete. If a connection attempt fails, that is, if an invocation of this method throws a checked exception, then the channel will be closed.
trans-unit.target: 可以随时调用此方法。如果在进行此方法的调用时调用了此通道上的 send 或 receive 操作，则该操作将首先阻塞，直到此调用完成。如果连接尝试失败，即，如果此方法的调用引发了已检查的异常，则该通道将被关闭。

trans-unit.source: This method may be invoked at any time. If a send or receive operation upon this channel is invoked while an invocation of this method is in progress then that operation will first block until this invocation is complete. If a connection attempt is initiated but fails, that is, if an invocation of this method throws a checked exception, then the channel will be closed.
trans-unit.target: 可以随时调用此方法。如果在进行此方法的调用时调用了此通道上的 send 或 receive 操作，则该操作将首先阻塞，直到此调用完成。如果连接尝试已启动但失败，也就是说，如果此方法的调用引发了已检查的异常，则该通道将被关闭。

trans-unit.source: This method may be invoked at any time. If a read or write operation upon this channel is invoked while an invocation of this method is in progress then that operation will first block until this invocation is complete. If a connection attempt fails, that is, if an invocation of this method throws a checked exception, then the channel will be closed.
trans-unit.target: 这个方法可以在任何时候被调用。如果在本方法的调用进行中时调用了本通道的读或写操作,那么该操作将首先阻塞,直到本调用完成。如果连接尝试失败,也就是说,如果本方法的调用引发了一个检查异常,那么通道将被关闭。

trans-unit.source: This method may be invoked at any time. If a read or write operation upon this channel is invoked while an invocation of this method is in progress then that operation will first block until this invocation is complete. If a connection attempt is initiated but fails, that is, if an invocation of this method throws a checked exception, then the channel will be closed.
trans-unit.target: 这个方法可以在任何时候被调用。如果在本方法的调用进行中,调用了本通道的读或写操作,那么该操作将首先阻塞,直到本调用完成。如果一个连接尝试被发起但失败了,也就是说,如果这个方法的调用引发了一个检查异常,那么这个通道将被关闭。

trans-unit.source: This method may be invoked at any time. If another thread has already initiated a readPacket on this connection then the invocation of this method will block until the first operation is complete.
trans-unit.target: 可以随时调用此方法。如果另一个线程已经在该连接上启动了 readPacket ，则该方法的调用将被阻止，直到完成第一个操作为止。

trans-unit.source: This method may be invoked at any time. If another thread has already initiated a read operation upon this channel, however, then an invocation of this method will block until the first operation is complete.
trans-unit.target: 这个方法可以在任何时候被调用。但是,如果另一个线程已经在这个通道上发起了一个读操作,那么对这个方法的调用将被阻塞,直到第一个操作完成。

trans-unit.source: This method may be invoked at any time. If another thread has already initiated a read operation upon this channel, however, then an invocation of this method will block until the first operation is complete. If this channel's socket is not bound then this method will first cause the socket to be bound to an address that is assigned automatically, as if invoking the bind method with a parameter of null.
trans-unit.target: 可以随时调用此方法。但是，如果另一个线程已经在此通道上启动了读取操作，则该方法的调用将被阻塞，直到第一个操作完成为止。如果未绑定此通道的套接字，则此方法将首先使套接字绑定到自动分配的地址，就像使用参数 null 调用 bind 方法一样。

trans-unit.source: This method may be invoked at any time. If another thread has already initiated a read operation upon this channel, however, then an invocation of this method will block until the first operation is complete. If this channel's socket is not bound then this method will first cause the socket to be bound to an address that is assigned automatically, as if invoking the bind method with a parameter of null.
trans-unit.target: 可以随时调用此方法。但是，如果另一个线程已经在该通道上启动了读取操作，则该方法的调用将被阻塞，直到第一个操作完成为止。如果未绑定此通道的套接字，则此方法将首先导致将套接字绑定到自动分配的地址，就像使用参数 null 调用 bind 方法一样。

trans-unit.source: This method may be invoked at any time. If another thread has already initiated a read or write operation upon this channel, then an invocation of this method will block until any such operation is complete.
trans-unit.target: 这个方法可以在任何时候被调用。如果另一个线程已经在这个通道上发起了一个读或写操作,那么对这个方法的调用将被阻塞,直到任何这样的操作完成。

trans-unit.source: This method may be invoked at any time. If another thread has already initiated a read or write operation upon this channel, then an invocation of this method will block until any such operation is complete. If this channel's socket is not bound then this method will first cause the socket to be bound to an address that is assigned automatically, as if invoking the bind method with a parameter of null.
trans-unit.target: 可以随时调用此方法。如果另一个线程已经在此通道上启动了读取或写入操作，则该方法的调用将被阻止，直到完成任何此类操作为止。如果未绑定此通道的套接字，则此方法将首先使套接字绑定到自动分配的地址，就像使用参数 null 调用 bind 方法一样。

trans-unit.source: This method may be invoked at any time. If another thread has already initiated a receive operation upon this channel, then an invocation of this method will block until the first operation is complete. The given handler is invoked without holding any locks used to enforce the above synchronization policy, that way handlers will not stall other threads from receiving. A handler should not invoke the receive method of this channel, if it does an IllegalReceiveException will be thrown.
trans-unit.target: 可以随时调用此方法。如果另一个线程已经在此通道上发起了接收操作，则该方法的调用将被阻塞，直到第一个操作完成为止。调用给定的处理程序时，不保留用于实施上述同步策略的任何锁，这样，处理程序不会使其他线程停止接收。处理程序不应调用此通道的 receive 方法， IllegalReceiveException 将抛出IllegalReceiveException。

trans-unit.source: This method may be invoked at any time. If another thread has already initiated a send operation upon this channel, then an invocation of this method will block until the first operation is complete.
trans-unit.target: 这个方法可以在任何时候被调用。如果另一个线程已经在这个通道上发起了发送操作,那么对这个方法的调用将阻塞,直到第一个操作完成。

trans-unit.source: This method may be invoked at any time. If another thread has already initiated a write operation upon this Connection then a subsequent invocation of this method will block until the first operation is complete.
trans-unit.target: 这个方法可以在任何时候被调用。如果另一个线程已经在这个Connection上发起了一个写操作,那么后续对这个方法的调用将阻塞,直到第一个操作完成。

trans-unit.source: This method may be invoked at any time. If another thread has already initiated a write operation upon this channel, however, then an invocation of this method will block until the first operation is complete.
trans-unit.target: 这个方法可以在任何时候被调用。但是,如果另一个线程已经在这个通道上发起了写操作,那么对这个方法的调用将阻塞,直到第一个操作完成。

trans-unit.source: This method may be invoked at any time. If another thread has already initiated a write operation upon this channel, however, then an invocation of this method will block until the first operation is complete. If this channel's socket is not bound then this method will first cause the socket to be bound to an address that is assigned automatically, as if by invoking the bind method with a parameter of null.
trans-unit.target: 可以随时调用此方法。但是，如果另一个线程已经在该通道上启动了写操作，则该方法的调用将被阻塞，直到第一个操作完成为止。如果未绑定此通道的套接字，则此方法将首先使套接字绑定到自动分配的地址，就像通过使用参数 null 调用 bind 方法一样。

trans-unit.source: This method may be invoked at any time. If another thread has already initiated a write operation upon this channel, however, then an invocation of this method will block until the first operation is complete. If this channel's socket is not bound then this method will first cause the socket to be bound to an address that is assigned automatically, as if by invoking the bind method with a parameter of null.
trans-unit.target: 可以随时调用此方法。但是，如果另一个线程已经在该通道上启动了写操作，则该方法的调用将被阻塞，直到第一个操作完成为止。如果未绑定此通道的套接字，则此方法将首先使套接字绑定到自动分配的地址，就像通过使用参数 null 调用 bind 方法一样。

trans-unit.source: This method may be invoked at any time. If some other thread has already invoked it, however, then another invocation will block until the first invocation is complete, after which it will return without effect.
trans-unit.target: 这个方法可以在任何时候被调用。但是,如果其他线程已经调用了它,那么另一个调用将阻塞,直到第一个调用完成,之后它将无效果地返回。

trans-unit.source: This method may be invoked at any time. If this method is invoked while a selection operation is in progress then it has no effect upon that operation; the change to the key's interest set will be seen by the next selection operation.
trans-unit.target: 此方法可在任何时候被调用。如果在选择操作进行时调用此方法,则对该操作没有影响;键的兴趣集的变化将被下一个选择操作看到。

trans-unit.source: This method may be invoked at any time. If this method is invoked while a selection operation is in progress then it has no effect upon that operation; the new registration or change to the key's interest set will be seen by the next selection operation. If this method is invoked while an invocation of configureBlocking is in progress then it will block until the channel's blocking mode has been adjusted.
trans-unit.target: 可以随时调用此方法。如果在选择操作进行时调用此方法，则该方法对该操作无效；否则，该方法将无效。新的注册或对密钥兴趣集的更改将在下一个选择操作中看到。如果在调用 configureBlocking 的过程中调用了此方法，则它将一直阻塞，直到调整了通道的阻塞模式为止。

trans-unit.source: This method may be invoked at any time. If this method is invoked while another invocation of this method or of the configureBlocking method is in progress then it will first block until the other operation is complete. This method will then synchronize on the selector's key set and therefore may block if invoked concurrently with another registration or selection operation involving the same selector.
trans-unit.target: 可以随时调用此方法。如果在此方法或 configureBlocking 方法的另一次调用正在进行时调用此方法，则它将首先阻塞，直到其他操作完成。然后，此方法将在选择器的键集上同步，因此如果与涉及同一选择器的另一个注册或选择操作同时调用，则可能会阻塞。

trans-unit.source: This method may be invoked at any time. It synchronizes on the selector's cancelled-key set, and therefore may block briefly if invoked concurrently with a cancellation or selection operation involving the same selector.
trans-unit.target: 这个方法可以在任何时候被调用,它在选择器的取消键集上同步,因此,如果与同一选择器的取消或选择操作同时被调用,可能会短暂阻塞。它在选择器的取消键集上同步,因此如果与涉及同一选择器的取消或选择操作同时调用,可能会短暂阻塞。

trans-unit.source: This method may be invoked at any time. It will not have any effect on read or write operations that are already in progress at the moment that it is invoked.
trans-unit.target: 这个方法可以在任何时候被调用。它不会对被调用时已经在进行的读写操作产生任何影响。

trans-unit.source: This method may be invoked at any time. It will not have any effect on read or write operations that are already in progress at the moment that it is invoked. If this channel's socket is not bound then this method will first cause the socket to be bound to an address that is assigned automatically, as if invoking the bind method with a parameter of null.
trans-unit.target: 可以随时调用此方法。调用它时，它不会对正在进行的读取或写入操作产生任何影响。如果未绑定此通道的套接字，则此方法将首先使套接字绑定到自动分配的地址，就像使用参数 null 调用 bind 方法一样。

trans-unit.source: This method may be invoked at any time. It will not have any effect on read or write operations that are already in progress at the moment that it is invoked. If this channel's socket is not bound then this method will first cause the socket to be bound to an address that is assigned automatically, as if invoking the bind method with a parameter of null.
trans-unit.target: 可以随时调用此方法。调用它时，它不会对正在进行的读取或写入操作产生任何影响。如果未绑定此通道的套接字，则此方法将首先导致将套接字绑定到自动分配的地址，就像使用参数 null 调用 bind 方法一样。

trans-unit.source: This method may be invoked at any time. Some channel types may not allow more than one read to be outstanding at any given time. If a thread initiates a read operation before a previous read operation has completed then a ReadPendingException will be thrown.
trans-unit.target: 可以随时调用此方法。某些通道类型可能不允许在任何给定时间进行多个读取。如果线程在上一个读取操作完成之前启动了读取操作，则将引发 ReadPendingException 。

trans-unit.source: This method may be invoked at any time. Some channel types may not allow more than one write to be outstanding at any given time. If a thread initiates a write operation before a previous write operation has completed then a WritePendingException will be thrown.
trans-unit.target: 可以随时调用此方法。某些通道类型可能不允许在任何给定时间进行一次以上的写操作。如果线程在上一个写操作完成之前启动了写操作，则将引发 WritePendingException 。

trans-unit.source: This method may be invoked at any time. The new blocking mode will only affect I/O operations that are initiated after this method returns. For some implementations this may require blocking until all pending I/O operations are complete.
trans-unit.target: 这个方法可以在任何时候被调用。新的阻塞模式将只影响在本方法返回后启动的I/O操作。对于某些实现来说,这可能需要阻塞,直到所有待定的I/O操作完成。

trans-unit.source: This method may be invoked at any time. Whether or not it blocks, and for how long, is implementation-dependent.
trans-unit.target: 这个方法可以在任何时候被调用。它是否阻塞,以及阻塞多久,取决于实现。

trans-unit.source: This method may be invoked before the publisher is subscribed to. This method may be invoked more than once by the HTTP client implementation, and MUST return the same constant value each time.
trans-unit.target: 这个方法可以在订阅发布者之前被调用。这个方法可以被HTTP客户端实现调用一次以上,并且每次必须返回相同的常量值。

trans-unit.source: This method may be overridden by a provider to return the digest length.
trans-unit.target: 本方法可以被提供者重写,以返回摘要长度。

trans-unit.source: This method may be overridden by subclasses to provide their own initialization behaviors.
trans-unit.target: 该方法可以被子类重载,以提供自己的初始化行为。

trans-unit.source: This method may be overridden by subclasses to provide their own initialization behaviors. When invoked any resources required by the BeanContextChild should be obtained from the current BeanContext.
trans-unit.target: 这个方法可以被子类重载,以提供他们自己的初始化行为。当调用该方法时,BeanContextChild所需的任何资源都应该从当前BeanContext中获取。

trans-unit.source: This method may be overridden by subclasses to provide their own release behaviors.
trans-unit.target: 该方法可以被子类重载,以提供自己的释放行为。

trans-unit.source: This method may be overridden by subclasses to provide their own release behaviors. When invoked any resources held by this instance obtained from its current BeanContext property should be released since the object is no longer nested within that BeanContext.
trans-unit.target: 这个方法可以被子类重载以提供自己的释放行为。当调用时,这个实例从其当前BeanContext属性获得的任何资源都应该被释放,因为对象不再嵌套在该BeanContext中。

trans-unit.source: This method may be overridden in subclasses, but if so, must still ensure that these properties hold. In particular, the cancel method itself must not throw exceptions.
trans-unit.target: 子类中可能会覆盖此方法，但是如果是这样，则必须仍然确保这些属性成立。特别是， cancel 方法本身不能抛出异常。

trans-unit.source: This method may be overridden in subclasses. The default behavior in this base class is that the first call is reported to System.err, and subsequent calls are ignored.
trans-unit.target: 这个方法可以在子类中被重载。这个基类的默认行为是第一次调用会被报告给System.err,随后的调用会被忽略。

trans-unit.source: This method may be used by a caller in class C to enable access to a member of declaring classD if any of the following hold:
trans-unit.target: 如果满足以下任一条件，则类 C 中的调用者可以使用此方法来启用对 declaring class D 的 member 的访问：

trans-unit.source: This method may be used by the isReadable, isWritable and isExecutable methods to check the accessibility of a file.
trans-unit.target: isReadable ， isWritable 和 isExecutable 方法可以使用此方法来检查文件的可访问性。

trans-unit.source: This method may be used by the isReadable, isWritable and isExecutable methods to check the accessibility of a file.
trans-unit.target: isReadable ， isWritable 和 isExecutable 方法可以使用此方法来检查文件的可访问性。

trans-unit.source: This method may be used multiple times to add multiple JAR files to be searched in the order that this method was invoked.
trans-unit.target: 本方法可以多次使用,按照本方法被调用的顺序添加多个JAR文件进行搜索。

trans-unit.source: This method may be used to enable access to all reflected objects in the array when access to each reflected object can be enabled as specified by setAccessible(boolean).
trans-unit.target: 当可以通过 setAccessible(boolean) 指定启用对每个反射对象的访问时，可以使用此方法来访问数组中的所有反射对象。

trans-unit.source: This method may be used to iterate over the JapaneseEras as follows:
trans-unit.target: 这个方法可以用来遍历JapaneseEras,具体如下。

trans-unit.source: This method may be used to strip white space from the beginning and end of a string.
trans-unit.target: 该方法可用于剥离 white space 从一开始和一字符串的结尾。

trans-unit.source: This method may be used to strip white space from the beginning and end of a string.
trans-unit.target: 该方法可用于剥离的白色空间从一开始和一字符串的结尾。

trans-unit.source: This method may be used to trim white space from the beginning of a string.
trans-unit.target: 此方法可用于从字符串开头修剪 white space 。

trans-unit.source: This method may be used to trim white space from the end of a string.
trans-unit.target: 此方法可用于从字符串的末尾修剪 white space 。

trans-unit.source: This method may be used to trim white space from the beginning of a string.
trans-unit.target: 此方法可用于从字符串开头修剪空白。

trans-unit.source: This method may be used to trim white space from the end of a string.
trans-unit.target: 此方法可用于从字符串的末尾修剪空白。

trans-unit.source: This method may be used to trim space (as defined above) from the beginning and end of a string.
trans-unit.target: 此方法可用于修剪字符串开头和结尾的空间(如上所述)。

trans-unit.source: This method may be used to trim whitespace (as defined above) from the beginning and end of a string.
trans-unit.target: 这个方法可以用来修剪字符串的开头和结尾的空格(如上文所定义)。

trans-unit.source: This method may be useful as one part of a cancellation scheme. It may fail to remove tasks that have been converted into other forms before being placed on the internal queue. For example, a task entered using submit might be converted into a form that maintains Future status. However, in such cases, method purge() may be used to remove those Futures that have been cancelled.
trans-unit.target: 该方法作为取消方案的一部分可能有用。在放入内部队列之前，它可能无法删除已转换为其他形式的任务。例如，使用“ submit 输入的任务可能会转换为维护“ Future 状态的表单。但是，在这种情况下，可以使用方法 purge() 删除已取消的那些期货。

trans-unit.source: This method may be useful as one part of a cancellation scheme. It may fail to remove tasks that have been converted into other forms before being placed on the internal queue. For example, a task entered using submit might be converted into a form that maintains Future status. However, in such cases, method purge() may be used to remove those Futures that have been cancelled.
trans-unit.target: 此方法可能可用作取消方案的一部分。在放入内部队列之前，它可能无法删除已转换为其他形式的任务。例如，使用“ submit 输入的任务可能会转换为维护“ Future 状态的表单。但是，在这种情况下，可以使用方法 purge() 删除已取消的那些期货。

trans-unit.source: This method may be useful when forcing completion as soon as any one (versus all) of several subtask results are obtained. However, in the common (and recommended) case in which setRawResult is not overridden, this effect can be obtained more simply using quietlyCompleteRoot().
trans-unit.target: 一旦获得几个子任务结果中的任何一个（相对于全部），就强制完成时，此方法可能会很有用。但是，在不重写 setRawResult 的常见（推荐）情况下，可以使用 quietlyCompleteRoot() 更简单地获得此效果。

trans-unit.source: This method may be useful when forcing completion as soon as any one (versus all) of several subtask results are obtained. However, in the common (and recommended) case in which setRawResult is not overridden, this effect can be obtained more simply using quietlyCompleteRoot();.
trans-unit.target: 一旦获得几个子任务结果中的任何一个（相对于全部），就强制执行完成时，此方法可能很有用。但是，在不覆盖 setRawResult 的常见（推荐）情况下，可以使用 quietlyCompleteRoot(); 更简单地获得此效果。。

trans-unit.source: This method may be useful when processing repeating annotations by looking for an annotation type and its containing annotation type at the same time.
trans-unit.target: 当处理重复的注解时,通过同时查找注解类型及其包含的注解类型,该方法可能很有用。

trans-unit.source: This method may be utilized to create a new buffer where unit size bytes from index, that is a multiple of the unit size, may be accessed atomically, if supported by the native platform.
trans-unit.target: 如果本机平台支持的话,可以利用该方法创建一个新的缓冲区,在该缓冲区中,可以原子地访问来自索引的单位大小字节,即单位大小的倍数。

trans-unit.source: This method may be utilized to determine if unit size bytes from an index can be accessed atomically, if supported by the native platform.
trans-unit.target: 如果本机平台支持的话,可以利用这种方法来确定是否可以原子地访问索引的单位大小字节。

trans-unit.source: This method may block indefinitely reading from the input stream (or writing to the file). The behavior for the case that the input stream is

trans-unit.source: This method may only be invoked if this channel's socket is connected, and it only accepts datagrams from the socket's peer. If there are more bytes in the datagram than remain in the given buffer then the remainder of the datagram is silently discarded. Otherwise this method behaves exactly as specified in the ReadableByteChannel interface.
trans-unit.target: 仅在连接此通道的套接字的情况下才可以调用此方法，并且该方法仅接受来自套接字对等方的数据报。如果数据报中的字节数超过给定缓冲区中剩余的字节数，则数据报的其余部分将被静默丢弃。否则，此方法的行为与 ReadableByteChannel 接口中指定的行为完全相同。

trans-unit.source: This method may only be invoked if this channel's socket is connected, and it only accepts datagrams from the socket's peer. If there are more bytes in the datagram than remain in the given buffers then the remainder of the datagram is silently discarded. Otherwise this method behaves exactly as specified in the ScatteringByteChannel interface.
trans-unit.target: 仅在连接此通道的套接字的情况下才可以调用此方法，并且该方法仅接受来自套接字对等方的数据报。如果数据报中的字节数超过给定缓冲区中剩余的字节数，则数据报的其余部分将被静默丢弃。否则，此方法的行为与 ScatteringByteChannel 接口中指定的行为完全相同。

trans-unit.source: This method may only be invoked if this channel's socket is connected, in which case it sends datagrams directly to the socket's peer. Otherwise it behaves exactly as specified in the GatheringByteChannel interface.
trans-unit.target: 仅当此通道的套接字已连接时才可以调用此方法，在这种情况下，它将直接向套接字的对等方发送数据报。否则，它的行为与 GatheringByteChannel 接口中指定的行为完全相同。

trans-unit.source: This method may only be invoked if this channel's socket is connected, in which case it sends datagrams directly to the socket's peer. Otherwise it behaves exactly as specified in the WritableByteChannel interface.
trans-unit.target: 仅当此通道的套接字已连接时才可以调用此方法，在这种情况下，它将直接向套接字的对等方发送数据报。否则，它的行为与 WritableByteChannel 接口中指定的行为完全相同。

trans-unit.source: This method may return null for any reason, including emptiness, inability to split after traversal has commenced, data structure constraints, and efficiency considerations.
trans-unit.target: 此方法可能出于任何原因返回 null ，包括空性，遍历开始后无法拆分，数据结构约束以及效率方面的考虑。

trans-unit.source: This method may return null for any reason, including emptiness, inability to split after traversal has commenced, data structure constraints, and efficiency considerations. This implementation permits limited parallelism.

trans-unit.source: This method may return a Referenceable object. The service provider obtaining this object may choose to store it directly, or to extract its reference (using Referenceable.getReference()) and store that instead.
trans-unit.target: 此方法可以返回 Referenceable 对象。获得此对象的服务提供商可以选择直接存储它，或提取其引用（使用 Referenceable.getReference() ）并存储它。

trans-unit.source: This method may return different results at different times if new charset providers are dynamically made available to the current Java virtual machine. In the absence of such changes, the charsets returned by this method are exactly those that can be retrieved via the forName method.
trans-unit.target: 如果新的字符集提供程序可动态提供给当前Java虚拟机，则此方法可能在不同的时间返回不同的结果。在没有此类更改的情况下，此方法返回的字符集正是可以通过 forName 方法检索的字符集。

trans-unit.source: This method may return different results at different times if new charset providers are dynamically made available to the current Java virtual machine. In the absence of such changes, the charsets returned by this method are exactly those that can be retrieved via the forName method.
trans-unit.target: 如果新的字符集提供程序动态地可用于当前Java虚拟机，则此方法可能在不同的时间返回不同的结果。在没有此类更改的情况下，此方法返回的字符集正是可以通过 forName 方法检索的字符集。

trans-unit.source: This method may skip more bytes than what are remaining in the backing file. This produces no exception and the number of bytes skipped may include some number of bytes that were beyond the EOF of the backing file. Attempting to read from the stream after skipping past the end will result in -1 indicating the end of the file.
trans-unit.target: 这种方法跳过的字节数可能会超过备份文件中剩余的字节数。这不会产生异常,跳过的字节数可能包括一些超出支持文件EOF的字节数。跳过结束后试图从流中读取将导致-1表示文件的结束。

trans-unit.source: This method may skip over some smaller number of bytes, possibly zero. This may result from any of a number of conditions; reaching end of file before n bytes have been skipped is only one possibility. This method never throws an EOFException. The actual number of bytes skipped is returned. If n is negative, no bytes are skipped.
trans-unit.target: 此方法可能会跳过一些较小的字节，可能为零。这可能是由多种条件引起的；在跳过 n 个字节之前到达文件末尾只是一种可能。此方法从不抛出 EOFException 。返回跳过的实际字节数。如果 n 为负，则不跳过任何字节。

trans-unit.source: This method may throw a ClassCastException if any Object in keystrokes is not an AWTKeyStroke.
trans-unit.target: 这种方法可能会引发一个 ClassCastException 异常，如果任何 Object 在 keystrokes 不是 AWTKeyStroke 中。

trans-unit.source: This method merely returns its input argument, and should be overridden if a different behavior is desired.
trans-unit.target: 这个方法只是返回它的输入参数,如果需要不同的行为,应该被重写。

trans-unit.source: This method might be called often, so it should work fast.
trans-unit.target: 这个方法可能会经常被调用,所以它应该快速工作。

trans-unit.source: This method might block waiting for more input.
trans-unit.target: 这个方法可能会阻止等待更多的输入。

trans-unit.source: This method modifies the Rectangle so that it is h units larger on both the left and right side, and v units larger at both the top and bottom.
trans-unit.target: 此方法会修改 Rectangle ，以便它是 h 左侧两个，右侧，和更大的单位 v 单元的顶部和底部都增加。

trans-unit.source: This method modifies the failure handling of native method resolution by allowing retry with a prefix applied to the name.
trans-unit.target: 这个方法修改了本地方法解析的失败处理,允许重试,并在名称上加上前缀。

trans-unit.source: This method modifies the failure handling of native method resolution by allowing retry with a prefix applied to the name. When used with the ClassFileTransformer, it enables native methods to be instrumented.
trans-unit.target: 该方法通过允许重命名使用前缀来修改本机方法解析的失败处理。与 ClassFileTransformer 结合使用时，它可以检测本机方法。

trans-unit.source: This method must be called before any handshaking occurs. Once handshaking has begun, the mode can not be reset for the life of this engine.
trans-unit.target: 本方法必须在任何握手发生之前被调用。一旦开始握手,在这个引擎的生命周期内,模式不能被重置。

trans-unit.source: This method must be overridden by a subclass if that subclass is designed to translate pixel sample values to color component values in a non-default way. The default translations implemented by this class is described in the class comments. Any subclass implementing a non-default translation must follow the constraints on allowable translations defined there.
trans-unit.target: 如果一个子类被设计成以非默认的方式将像素样本值翻译成颜色分量值,那么这个方法必须被子类重写。该类实现的默认翻译在类注释中进行了描述。任何实现非默认翻译的子类必须遵循其中定义的允许翻译的约束。

trans-unit.source: This method must be used within a try-with-resources statement or similar control structure to ensure that the stream's open directories are closed promptly after the stream's operations have completed.
trans-unit.target: 该方法必须在try-with-resources语句或类似的控制结构中使用,以确保在流的操作完成后,流的开放目录被迅速关闭。

trans-unit.source: This method must be used within a try-with-resources statement or similar control structure to ensure that the stream's open directory is closed promptly after the stream's operations have completed.

trans-unit.source: This method never returns null. For a set with no attributes, it returns an empty Enumeration.
trans-unit.target: 此方法从不返回 null 。对于没有属性的集合，它将返回一个空的 Enumeration 。

trans-unit.source: This method notifies the DragSource that the drop transfer(s) are completed.
trans-unit.target: 此方法通知 DragSource 拖放传输已完成。

trans-unit.source: This method object may conservatively return false in cases where the specified rectangular area intersects a segment of the path, but that segment does not represent a boundary between the interior and exterior of the path. Such segments could lie entirely within the interior of the path if they are part of a path with a WIND_NON_ZERO winding rule or if the segments are retraced in the reverse direction such that the two sets of segments cancel each other out without any exterior area falling between them. To determine whether segments represent true boundaries of the interior of the path would require extensive calculations involving all of the segments of the path and the winding rule and are thus beyond the scope of this implementation.
trans-unit.target: 在指定的矩形区域与路径的某个部分相交的情况下，此方法对象可能保守地返回false，但该部分不代表路径的内部和外部之间的边界。如果这些段是具有 WIND_NON_ZERO 缠绕规则的路径的一部分，或者如果这些段在相反方向上回溯，则这样的段可能完全位于路径的内部，以使两组段彼此抵消而没有任何外部区域落入他们。要确定段是否代表路径内部的真实边界，将需要进行大量计算，其中涉及路径的所有段和缠绕规则，因此超出了此实现的范围。

trans-unit.source: This method object may conservatively return true in cases where the specified rectangular area intersects a segment of the path, but that segment does not represent a boundary between the interior and exterior of the path. Such a case may occur if some set of segments of the path are retraced in the reverse direction such that the two sets of segments cancel each other out without any interior area between them. To determine whether segments represent true boundaries of the interior of the path would require extensive calculations involving all of the segments of the path and the winding rule and are thus beyond the scope of this implementation.
trans-unit.target: 如果指定的矩形区域与路径的某段相交,但该段并不代表路径内部和外部的边界,那么这个方法对象可能会保守地返回true。这种情况可能会发生,如果路径的某些片段按相反的方向回溯,使两组片段相互抵消,没有任何内部区域。要确定段是否代表路径内部的真正边界,需要对路径的所有段和缠绕规则进行大量计算,因此超出了本实施例的范围。

trans-unit.target: 本方法获取每个线程的线程信息快照,包括。

trans-unit.source: This method obtains the keyChar from a KeyTyped event, and the keyCode from a KeyPressed or KeyReleased event. The KeyEvent modifiers are obtained for all three types of KeyEvent.
trans-unit.target: 此方法从 KeyTyped 事件获取keyChar ，并从 KeyPressed 或 KeyReleased 事件获取keyCode 。该 KeyEvent 的修饰符所有这三种类型的获得 KeyEvent 。

trans-unit.source: This method obtains the keyChar from a KeyTyped event, and the keyCode from a KeyPressed or KeyReleased event. The KeyEvent modifiers are obtained for all three types of KeyEvent.
trans-unit.target: 该方法从KeyTyped事件中获取keyChar,从KeyPressed或KeyReleased事件中获取keyCode。这三种类型的KeyEvent修饰符都可以获得。

trans-unit.source: This method obtains the list of attach providers by invoking the AttachProvider.providers() method. It then iterates overs the list and invokes each provider's attachVirtualMachine method in turn. If a provider successfully attaches then the iteration terminates, and the VirtualMachine created by the provider that successfully attached is returned by this method. If the attachVirtualMachine method of all providers throws AttachNotSupportedException then this method also throws AttachNotSupportedException. This means that AttachNotSupportedException is thrown when the identifier provided to this method is invalid, or the identifier corresponds to a Java virtual machine that does not exist, or none of the providers can attach to it. This exception is also thrown if AttachProvider.providers() returns an empty list.
trans-unit.target: 此方法通过调用 AttachProvider.providers() 方法来获取附加提供程序的列表。然后，它遍历列表，并依次调用每个提供程序的 attachVirtualMachine 方法。如果提供程序成功附加，则迭代终止，并且此方法返回由成功附加的提供程序创建的VirtualMachine。如果所有提供程序的 attachVirtualMachine 方法都抛出 AttachNotSupportedException ,则此方法也会抛出 AttachNotSupportedException 。这意味着 AttachNotSupportedException 当提供给此方法的标识符无效，或者该标识符对应于不存在的Java虚拟机，或者任何提供者都不能附加到该虚拟机时，抛出。如果 AttachProvider.providers() 返回一个空列表，也会引发此异常。

trans-unit.source: This method only applies to certificate-based server authentication. An X509ExtendedTrustManager will use the returned value for server certificate validation.
trans-unit.target: 此方法仅适用于基于证书的服务器身份验证。一个 X509ExtendedTrustManager 将使用服务器证书验证返回值。

trans-unit.source: This method only considers the position of the two date-times on the local time-line. It does not take into account the chronology, or calendar system. This is different from the comparison in compareTo(ChronoLocalDateTime), but is the same approach as ChronoLocalDateTime.timeLineOrder().
trans-unit.target: 此方法仅考虑两个日期时间在本地时间轴上的位置。它没有考虑时间顺序或日历系统。这与 compareTo(ChronoLocalDateTime) 中的比较不同，但是与 ChronoLocalDateTime.timeLineOrder() 相同。

trans-unit.source: This method only considers the position of the two date-times on the local time-line. It does not take into account the chronology, or calendar system. This is different from the comparison in compareTo(ChronoLocalDateTime), but is the same approach as ChronoLocalDateTime.timeLineOrder().

trans-unit.source: This method only considers the position of the two dates on the local time-line. It does not take into account the chronology, or calendar system. This is different from the comparison in compareTo(ChronoLocalDate) but is the same approach as ChronoLocalDate.timeLineOrder().

trans-unit.target: 此方法仅考虑两个日期在本地时间轴上的位置。它没有考虑时间顺序或日历系统。这与 compareTo(ChronoLocalDate) 中的比较不同，但是与 ChronoLocalDate.timeLineOrder() 相同。

trans-unit.source: This method only considers the position of the two dates on the local time-line. It does not take into account the chronology, or calendar system. This is different from the comparison in compareTo(ChronoLocalDate) but is the same approach as ChronoLocalDate.timeLineOrder().

trans-unit.target: 此方法仅考虑两个日期在本地时间轴上的位置。它没有考虑时间顺序或日历系统。这与 compareTo(ChronoLocalDate) 中的比较不同，但与 ChronoLocalDate.timeLineOrder() 相同。

trans-unit.source: This method only has any effect when the local time-line overlaps, such as at an autumn daylight savings cutover. In this scenario, there are two valid offsets for the local date-time. Calling this method will return a zoned date-time with the earlier of the two selected.
trans-unit.target: 这种方法只有在本地时间线重叠时才有效果,比如在秋季夏令时的交接期。在这种情况下,当地的日期-时间有两个有效的偏移。调用此方法将返回一个选择了两个中较早的一个的分区日期时间。

trans-unit.source: This method only has any effect when the local time-line overlaps, such as at an autumn daylight savings cutover. In this scenario, there are two valid offsets for the local date-time. Calling this method will return a zoned date-time with the later of the two selected.
trans-unit.target: 这种方法只有在本地时间线重叠时才有效果,比如在秋季夏令时的交接期。在这种情况下,当地的日期-时间有两个有效的偏移。调用此方法将返回一个选择了两个偏移量中较后一个的区间日期时间。

trans-unit.source: This method only needs to be invoked by subclasses of Component which desire to have the specified event types delivered to processEvent regardless of whether or not a listener is registered.
trans-unit.target: 此方法仅需要由 Component 的子类调用，而无论是否注册了侦听器，该子类都希望将指定的事件类型传递给 processEvent 。

trans-unit.source: This method only validates the reference the first time it is invoked. On subsequent invocations, it returns a cached result.
trans-unit.target: 这个方法只在第一次被调用时验证引用。在随后的调用中,它会返回一个缓存结果。

trans-unit.source: This method opens or creates a file in exactly the manner specified by the newByteChannel method with the exception that the READ option may not be present in the array of options. If no options are present then this method works as if the CREATE, TRUNCATE_EXISTING, and WRITE options are present. In other words, it opens the file for writing, creating the file if it doesn't exist, or initially truncating an existing regular-file to a size of 0 if it exists.
trans-unit.target: 此方法完全按照 newByteChannel 方法指定的方式打开或创建文件，但选项数组中可能不存在 READ 选项。如果不存在任何选项，则此方法就像存在 CREATE ， TRUNCATE_EXISTING 和 WRITE 选项一样工作。换句话说，它打开文件进行写入，如果不存在则创建文件，或者如果存在则将最初的 regular-file 截短为 0 。

trans-unit.source: This method opens or creates a file in exactly the manner specified by the newByteChannel method.
trans-unit.target: 此方法完全按照 newByteChannel 方法指定的方式打开或创建文件。

trans-unit.source: This method opens or creates a file in exactly the manner specified by the newByteChannel method with the exception that the READ option may not be present in the array of options. If no options are present then this method works as if the CREATE, TRUNCATE_EXISTING, and WRITE options are present. In other words, it opens the file for writing, creating the file if it doesn't exist, or initially truncating an existing regular-file to a size of 0 if it exists.
trans-unit.target: 此方法完全按照 newByteChannel 方法指定的方式打开或创建文件，但选项数组中可能不存在 READ 选项。如果不存在任何选项，则此方法将像存在 CREATE ， TRUNCATE_EXISTING 和 WRITE 选项一样工作。换句话说，它打开文件进行写入，如果不存在则创建文件，或者如果存在则将最初的 regular-file 截短为 0 。

trans-unit.source: This method opens or creates a file in exactly the manner specified by the newByteChannel method.

trans-unit.source: This method operates on a set in order to allow interdependent changes to more than one class at the same time (a redefinition of class A can require a redefinition of class B).

trans-unit.source: This method operates on the two input streams and binds each stream to its source. As a result subsequent modifications to an input stream source may not be reflected in the concatenated stream result.

trans-unit.source: This method parses the ID producing a ZoneId or ZoneOffset. A ZoneOffset is returned if the ID is 'Z', or starts with '+' or '-'. The result will always be a valid ID for which ZoneRules can be obtained.
trans-unit.target: 此方法解析ID产生 ZoneId 或 ZoneOffset 。甲 ZoneOffset 返回如果ID是“Z”，或者与“+”或“ - ”开始。结果将始终是可获取 ZoneRules 的有效ID 。

trans-unit.source: This method parses the identifier and maps the identifier to a Java virtual machine (in an implementation dependent manner). If the identifier cannot be parsed by the provider then an AttachNotSupportedException is thrown. Once parsed this method attempts to attach to the Java virtual machine. If the provider detects that the identifier corresponds to a Java virtual machine that does not exist, or it corresponds to a Java virtual machine that does not support the attach mechanism implemented by this provider, or it detects that the Java virtual machine is a version to which this provider cannot attach, then an AttachNotSupportedException is thrown.
trans-unit.target: 此方法解析标识符并将标识符映射到Java虚拟机（以实现相关的方式）。如果提供者无法解析标识符， AttachNotSupportedException 引发AttachNotSupportedException。解析后，此方法将尝试附加到Java虚拟机。如果提供程序检测到标识符对应于不存在的Java虚拟机，或者对应于不支持该提供程序实现的附加机制的Java虚拟机，或者检测到该Java虚拟机是以下版本：此提供程序无法附加的内容，则引发 AttachNotSupportedException 。
