trans-unit.source: This method performs a blocking selection operation. It returns only after at least one channel is selected, this selector's wakeup method is invoked, or the current thread is interrupted, whichever comes first.
trans-unit.target: 此方法执行块选择操作。仅在选择了至少一个通道，调用此选择器的 wakeup 方法或中断当前线程之后（以先到者为准），它才返回。

trans-unit.source: This method performs a blocking selection operation. It returns only after at least one channel is selected, this selector's wakeup method is invoked, the current thread is interrupted, or the given timeout period expires, whichever comes first.
trans-unit.target: 此方法执行块选择操作。仅在选择了至少一个通道，调用此选择器的 wakeup 方法，当前线程被中断或给定的超时时间到期之后（以先到者为准），它才返回。

trans-unit.source: This method performs a blocking selection operation. It returns only after at least one channel is selected, this selector's wakeup method is invoked, or the current thread is interrupted, whichever comes first.
trans-unit.target: 此方法执行块选择操作。仅在选择了至少一个通道，调用此选择器的 wakeup 方法或中断当前线程之后（以先到者为准），它才返回。

trans-unit.source: This method performs a blocking selection operation. It returns only after at least one channel is selected, this selector's wakeup method is invoked, the current thread is interrupted, or the given timeout period expires, whichever comes first.
trans-unit.target: 此方法执行块选择操作。仅在选择了至少一个通道，调用此选择器的 wakeup 方法，当前线程被中断或给定的超时时间到期之后（以先到者为准），它才返回。

trans-unit.source: This method performs a blocking selection operation. It wakes up from querying the operating system only when at least one channel is selected, this selector's wakeup method is invoked, or the current thread is interrupted, whichever comes first.
trans-unit.target: 此方法执行块选择操作。它从查询只在选择的至少一个信道的操作系统被唤醒时，此选择器的 wakeup 方法被调用，或者当前的线程被中断，以先到者为准。

trans-unit.source: This method performs a blocking selection operation. It wakes up from querying the operating system only when at least one channel is selected, this selector's wakeup method is invoked, the current thread is interrupted, or the given timeout period expires, whichever comes first.
trans-unit.target: 此方法执行块选择操作。它从查询只在选择的至少一个信道的操作系统被唤醒时，此选择器的 wakeup 方法被调用时，当前线程被中断，或者给定的超时期满，以先到者为准。

trans-unit.source: This method performs a non-blocking selection operation.
trans-unit.target: 该方法执行非阻塞选择操作。

trans-unit.source: This method performs a non-blocking selection operation. If no channels have become selectable since the previous selection operation then this method immediately returns zero.
trans-unit.target: 该方法执行非阻塞选择操作。如果自上一次选择操作以来没有通道变为可选择通道，则此方法立即返回零。

trans-unit.source: This method performs a syntactic check for each language range in the given ranges but doesn't do validation using the IANA Language Subtag Registry.
trans-unit.target: 该方法对给定 ranges 每种语言范围执行语法检查，但不使用IANA语言子标签注册表进行验证。

trans-unit.source: This method performs exactly the same security checks as the connect method of the DatagramSocket class. That is, if a security manager has been installed then this method verifies that its checkAccept and checkConnect methods permit datagrams to be received from and sent to, respectively, the given remote address.
trans-unit.target: 此方法执行与 DatagramSocket 类的 connect 方法完全相同的安全检查。也就是说，如果已安装安全管理器，则此方法将验证其 checkAccept 和 checkConnect 方法是否允许分别从给定的远程地址接收数据报或将数据报发送到给定的远程地址。

trans-unit.source: This method performs exactly the same security checks as the connect method of the DatagramSocket class. That is, if a security manager has been installed then this method verifies that its checkAccept and checkConnect methods permit datagrams to be received from and sent to, respectively, the given remote address. Once connected, no further security checks are performed for datagrams received from, or sent to, the given remote address. Care should be taken to ensure that a connected datagram channel is not shared with untrusted code.
trans-unit.target: 此方法执行与 DatagramSocket 类的 connect 方法完全相同的安全检查。也就是说，如果已安装安全管理器，则此方法将验证其 checkAccept 和 checkConnect 方法是否允许分别从给定的远程地址接收数据报或将数据报发送到给定的远程地址。连接后，将不再对从给定远程地址接收或发送给给定远程地址的数据报执行进一步的安全检查。应注意确保不与不受信任的代码共享连接的数据报通道。

trans-unit.source: This method performs exactly the same security checks as the connect method of the DatagramSocket class. That is, if a security manager has been installed then this method verifies that its checkAccept and checkConnect methods permit datagrams to be received from and sent to, respectively, the given remote address.
trans-unit.target: 此方法执行与 DatagramSocket 类的 connect 方法完全相同的安全检查。也就是说，如果已安装安全管理器，则此方法将验证其 checkAccept 和 checkConnect 方法是否允许分别从给定的远程地址接收数据报并将其发送到给定的远程地址。

trans-unit.source: This method performs exactly the same security checks as the receive method of the DatagramSocket class. That is, if the socket is not connected to a specific remote address and a security manager has been installed then for each datagram received this method verifies that the source's address and port number are permitted by the security manager's checkAccept method. Datagrams that are not permitted by the security manager are silently discarded. The overhead of this security check can be avoided by first connecting the socket via the connect method.
trans-unit.target: 此方法执行与 DatagramSocket 类的 receive 方法完全相同的安全检查。也就是说，如果套接字未连接到特定的远程地址，并且已经安装了安全管理器，则对于接收到的每个数据报，此方法都会验证安全管理器的 checkAccept 方法是否允许源的地址和端口号。安全管理器不允许的数据报将被静默丢弃。通过首先通过 connect 方法连接套接字，可以避免此安全检查的开销。

trans-unit.source: This method performs exactly the same security checks as the receive method of the DatagramSocket class. That is, if the socket is not connected to a specific remote address and a security manager has been installed then for each datagram received this method verifies that the source's address and port number are permitted by the security manager's checkAccept method. The overhead of this security check can be avoided by first connecting the socket via the connect method.
trans-unit.target: 此方法执行与 DatagramSocket 类的 receive 方法完全相同的安全检查。也就是说，如果套接字未连接到特定的远程地址，并且已经安装了安全管理器，则对于接收到的每个数据报，此方法都会验证安全管理器的 checkAccept 方法是否允许源的地址和端口号。通过首先通过 connect 方法连接套接字，可以避免此安全检查的开销。

trans-unit.source: This method performs exactly the same security checks as the receive method of the DatagramSocket class. That is, if the socket is not connected to a specific remote address and a security manager has been installed then for each datagram received this method verifies that the source's address and port number are permitted by the security manager's checkAccept method. The overhead of this security check can be avoided by first connecting the socket via the connect method.
trans-unit.target: 此方法执行与 DatagramSocket 类的 receive 方法完全相同的安全检查。也就是说，如果套接字未连接到特定的远程地址并且已经安装了安全管理器，则对于接收到的每个数据报，此方法都会验证安全管理器的 checkAccept 方法是否允许源地址和端口号。通过首先通过 connect 方法连接套接字，可以避免此安全检查的开销。

trans-unit.source: This method performs exactly the same security checks as the send method of the DatagramSocket class. That is, if the socket is not connected to a specific remote address and a security manager has been installed then for each datagram sent this method verifies that the target address and port number are permitted by the security manager's checkConnect method. The overhead of this security check can be avoided by first connecting the socket via the connect method.
trans-unit.target: 此方法执行与 DatagramSocket 类的 send 方法完全相同的安全检查。也就是说，如果套接字未连接到特定的远程地址，并且已经安装了安全管理器，则对于发送的每个数据报，此方法都会验证安全管理器的 checkConnect 方法是否允许目标地址和端口号。通过首先通过 connect 方法连接套接字，可以避免此安全检查的开销。

trans-unit.source: This method performs exactly the same security checks as the send method of the DatagramSocket class. That is, if the socket is not connected to a specific remote address and a security manager has been installed then for each datagram sent this method verifies that the target address and port number are permitted by the security manager's checkConnect method. The overhead of this security check can be avoided by first connecting the socket via the connect method.
trans-unit.target: 此方法执行与 DatagramSocket 类的 send 方法完全相同的安全检查。也就是说，如果套接字未连接到特定的远程地址，并且已经安装了安全管理器，则对于发送的每个数据报，此方法都会验证安全管理器的 checkConnect 方法是否允许目标地址和端口号。通过首先通过 connect 方法连接套接字，可以避免此安全检查的开销。

trans-unit.source: This method performs exactly the same security checks as the accept method of the ServerSocket class. That is, if a security manager has been installed then for each new connection this method verifies that the address and port number of the connection's remote endpoint are permitted by the security manager's checkAccept method.
trans-unit.target: 此方法执行与 ServerSocket 类的 accept 方法完全相同的安全检查。也就是说，如果已安装安全管理器，则对于每个新连接，此方法都会验证安全管理器的 checkAccept 方法是否允许连接的远程端点的地址和端口号。

trans-unit.source: This method performs exactly the same security checks as the accept method of the ServerSocket class. That is, if a security manager has been installed then for each new connection this method verifies that the address and port number of the connection's remote endpoint are permitted by the security manager's checkAccept method.
trans-unit.target: 此方法执行与 ServerSocket 类的 accept 方法完全相同的安全检查。也就是说，如果已安装安全管理器，则对于每个新连接，此方法都会验证安全管理器的 checkAccept 方法是否允许连接的远程端点的地址和端口号。

trans-unit.source: This method performs exactly the same security checks as the Socket class. That is, if a security manager has been installed then this method verifies that its checkConnect method permits connecting to the address and port number of the given remote endpoint.
trans-unit.target: 此方法执行与 Socket 类完全相同的安全性检查。也就是说，如果已安装安全管理器，则此方法将验证其 checkConnect 方法是否允许连接到给定远程端点的地址和端口号。

trans-unit.source: This method performs exactly the same security checks as the Socket class. That is, if a security manager has been installed then this method verifies that its checkConnect method permits connecting to the address and port number of the given remote endpoint.
trans-unit.target: 此方法执行与 Socket 类完全相同的安全性检查。也就是说，如果已安装安全管理器，则此方法将验证其 checkConnect 方法是否允许连接到给定远程端点的地址和端口号。

trans-unit.source: This method propagates any exception thrown by the nullary constructor, including a checked exception.
trans-unit.target: 本方法传播nullary构造函数抛出的任何异常,包括检查异常。

trans-unit.source: This method propagates any exception thrown by the nullary constructor, including a checked exception. Use of this method effectively bypasses the compile-time exception checking that would otherwise be performed by the compiler. The Constructor.newInstance method avoids this problem by wrapping any exception thrown by the constructor in a (checked) InvocationTargetException.
trans-unit.target: 此方法传播由nullary构造函数引发的任何异常，包括已检查的异常。这种方法的使用有效地绕过了编译时异常检查，否则检查将由编译器执行。该 Constructor.newInstance 方法，通过包裹由构造在（选中）抛出的任何异常避免了这个问题 InvocationTargetException 。

trans-unit.source: This method provides a basic facility for implementors of the Shape interface to implement support for the Shape.contains(double, double) method.

trans-unit.target: 此方法在基础 Path2D 类上提供了双精度 lineTo() 方法的单精度变体。

trans-unit.source: This method provides a single precision variant of the double precision moveTo() method on the base Path2D class.
trans-unit.target: 此方法在基础 Path2D 类上提供了双精度 moveTo() 方法的单精度变体。

trans-unit.source: This method provides a single precision variant of the double precision quadTo() method on the base Path2D class.
trans-unit.target: 此方法在基础 Path2D 类上提供了双精度 quadTo() 方法的单精度变体。

trans-unit.source: This method provides a way for an edit to replace an existing edit.
trans-unit.target: 此方法提供了一种编辑替换现有编辑的方法。

trans-unit.source: This method provides a way to determine whether two Node references returned by the implementation reference the same object. When two Node references are references to the same object, even if through a proxy, the references may be used completely interchangeably, such that all attributes have the same values and calling the same DOM method on either reference always has exactly the same effect.
trans-unit.target: 此方法提供一种确定实现返回的两个 Node 引用是否引用同一对象的方法。当两个 Node 引用是对同一对象的引用时，即使通过代理，这些引用也可以完全互换使用，以使所有属性具有相同的值，并且在两个引用上调用相同的DOM方法始终具有完全相同的效果。

trans-unit.source: This method provides a way to wrap an existing array:
trans-unit.target: 本方法提供了一种包裹现有数组的方法。

trans-unit.source: This method provides access to locale sensitive decimal style symbols.
trans-unit.target: 本方法提供了对区位敏感的十进制风格符号的访问。

trans-unit.source: This method provides access to locale sensitive decimal style symbols. If the locale contains "nu" (Numbering System) and/or "rg" (Region Override) Unicode extensions, returned instance will reflect the values specified with those extensions. If both "nu" and "rg" are specified, the value from the "nu" extension supersedes the implicit one from the "rg" extension.
trans-unit.target: 此方法提供对区域设置敏感的十进制样式符号的访问。如果语言环境包含“ nu”（编号系统）和/或“ rg”（区域覆盖）Unicode扩展名，则返回的实例将反映使用这些扩展名指定的值。如果同时指定了“ nu”和“ rg”，则“ nu”扩展名中的值将取代“ rg”扩展名中的隐式值。

trans-unit.source: This method provides better performance than split("\R") by supplying elements lazily and by faster search of new line terminators.
trans-unit.target: 这种方法比split("\R")提供了更好的性能,因为它提供了懒惰的元素和更快地搜索新的行结束符。

trans-unit.source: This method provides early access to the SSLSession being constructed. Depending on how far the handshake has progressed, some data may not yet be available for use. For example, if a remote server will be sending a Certificate chain, but that chain has yet not been processed, the getPeerCertificates method of SSLSession will throw a SSLPeerUnverifiedException. Once that chain has been processed, getPeerCertificates will return the proper value.
trans-unit.target: 此方法提供对正在构造的 SSLSession 的早期访问。根据握手进展的程度，某些数据可能无法使用。例如，如果远程服务器将发送证书链，但尚未处理该证书链，则 SSLSession 的 getPeerCertificates 方法将抛出SSLPeerUnverifiedException。处理 getPeerCertificates 该链后，getPeerCertificates将返回正确的值。

trans-unit.source: This method provides for the application the most precise control over which Font instance is used to render text. If a font in this GraphicsEnvironment has multiple programmable variations, only one instance of that Font is returned in the array, and other variations must be derived by the application.
trans-unit.target: 此方法为应用程序提供最精确的控制，以控制使用哪个 Font 实例呈现文本。如果此 GraphicsEnvironment 中的字体具有多个可编程的变体，则在数组中仅返回该 Font 的一个实例，并且其他变体必须由应用程序派生。

trans-unit.source: This method provides full control of the numeric formatting, including zero-padding and the positive/negative sign.
trans-unit.target: 该方法提供了对数字格式的完全控制,包括零填充和正/负号。

trans-unit.source: This method provides information necessary for a DocumentBuilder to determine what the DOM tree should return from the Attr.getSpecified() method.
trans-unit.target: 此方法提供 DocumentBuilder 确定从 Attr.getSpecified() 方法返回什么DOM树所需的信息。

trans-unit.source: This method provides nanosecond precision, but not necessarily nanosecond resolution (that is, how frequently the value changes) - no guarantees are made except that the resolution is at least as good as that of currentTimeMillis().
trans-unit.target: 此方法提供纳秒级精度，但不一定提供纳秒级分辨率（即值更改的频率）-除了分辨率至少与 currentTimeMillis() 一样好之外，不做任何保证。

trans-unit.source: This method provides nanosecond precision, but not necessarily nanosecond resolution (that is, how frequently the value changes) - no guarantees are made except that the resolution is at least as good as that of currentTimeMillis().
trans-unit.target: 此方法提供纳秒级精度，但不一定提供纳秒级分辨率（即值更改的频率）-除了分辨率至少与 currentTimeMillis() 一样好之外，不做任何保证。

trans-unit.source: This method provides only part of a temporary-file facility. To arrange for a file created by this method to be deleted automatically, use the deleteOnExit() method.
trans-unit.target: 此方法仅提供临时文件工具的一部分。若要安排自动删除通过此方法创建的文件，请使用 deleteOnExit() 方法。

trans-unit.source: This method provides only part of a temporary-file facility. To arrange for a file created by this method to be deleted automatically, use the deleteOnExit() method.
trans-unit.target: 此方法仅提供临时文件功能的一部分。若要安排自动删除通过此方法创建的文件，请使用 deleteOnExit() 方法。

trans-unit.source: This method provides ordering which is consistent with equalsIgnoreOptional().
trans-unit.target: 此方法提供与 equalsIgnoreOptional() 一致的排序。

trans-unit.source: This method provides the crucial behavioral difference between invokeExact and plain, inexact invoke. The two methods perform the same steps when the caller's type descriptor exactly matches the callee's, but when the types differ, plain invoke also calls asType (or some internal equivalent) in order to match up the caller's and callee's types.
trans-unit.target: 此方法提供了 invokeExact 和普通的，不精确的 invoke 之间的关键行为差异。当调用方的类型描述符与被调用方的类型完全匹配时，这两种方法执行相同的步骤，但是当类型不同时，普通 invoke 还会调用 asType （或一些内部等效项）以匹配调用方和被调用方的类型。

trans-unit.source: This method provides the crucial behavioral difference between invokeExact and plain, inexact invoke. The two methods perform the same steps when the caller's type descriptor exactly m atches the callee's, but when the types differ, plain invoke also calls asType (or some internal equivalent) in order to match up the caller's and callee's types.
trans-unit.target: 此方法提供了 invokeExact 和普通的，不精确的 invoke 之间的关键行为差异。当调用方的类型描述符恰好匹配被调用方时，这两种方法执行相同的步骤，但是当类型不同时，普通 invoke 还会调用 asType （或一些内部等效项）以匹配调用方和被调用方的类型。

trans-unit.source: This method provides the opportunity for a provider to dynamically recheck the underlying data provider to find the latest rules. This could be used to load new rules without stopping the JVM. Dynamic behavior is entirely optional and most providers do not support it.
trans-unit.target: 该方法为提供者提供了动态地重新检查底层数据提供者以找到最新规则的机会。这可以用来加载新的规则而无需停止JVM。动态行为完全是可选的,大多数提供者不支持它。

trans-unit.source: This method quietly returns if the access request is permitted, or throws a suitable AccessControlException otherwise.
trans-unit.target: 如果访问请求被允许,这个方法会悄悄返回,否则会抛出一个合适的AccessControlException。

trans-unit.source: This method reads all content including the line separators in the middle and/or at the end. The resulting string will contain line separators as they appear in the file.
trans-unit.target: 本方法读取所有内容,包括中间和/或末尾的换行符。生成的字符串将包含文件中出现的换行符。

trans-unit.source: This method reads characters from the input sequence, starting at the append position, and appends them to the given string buffer. It is intended to be invoked after one or more invocations of the appendReplacement method in order to copy the remainder of the input sequence.
trans-unit.target: 此方法从输入序列中的追加位置开始读取字符，并将其追加到给定的字符串缓冲区。它打算在一次或多次调用 appendReplacement 方法之后被调用，以复制输入序列的其余部分。

trans-unit.source: This method reads characters from the input sequence, starting at the append position, and appends them to the given string buffer. It is intended to be invoked after one or more invocations of the appendReplacement method in order to copy the remainder of the input sequence.
trans-unit.target: 此方法从输入序列读取字符，从附加位置开始，然后将它们附加到给定的字符串缓冲区。它打算在一次或多次调用 appendReplacement 方法之后被调用，以复制输入序列的其余部分。

trans-unit.source: This method reads characters from the input sequence, starting at the append position, and appends them to the given string builder. It is intended to be invoked after one or more invocations of the appendReplacement method in order to copy the remainder of the input sequence.
trans-unit.target: 此方法从输入序列读取字符，从附加位置开始，然后将它们附加到给定的字符串生成器中。它打算在一次或多次调用 appendReplacement 方法之后被调用，以复制输入序列的其余部分。

trans-unit.source: This method reads the new configuration and calls the updateConfiguration(ins, mapper) method to update the configuration.
trans-unit.target: 此方法读取新配置，并调用 updateConfiguration(ins, mapper) 方法以更新配置。

trans-unit.source: This method reads the value of the attribute into the given buffer as a sequence of bytes, failing if the number of bytes remaining in the buffer is insufficient to read the complete attribute value. The number of bytes transferred into the buffer is n, where n is the size of the attribute value. The first byte in the sequence is at index p and the last byte is at index p + n - 1, where p is the buffer's position. Upon return the buffer's position will be equal to p + n; its limit will not have changed.
trans-unit.target: 此方法将属性值作为字节序列读取到给定的缓冲区中，如果缓冲区中剩余的字节数不足以读取完整的属性值，则此方法将失败。传输到缓冲区的字节数为 n ，其中 n 是属性值的大小。序列中的第一个字节在索引 p 处，最后一个字节在索引 p + n - 1 ，其中 p 是缓冲区的位置。返回时，缓冲区的位置将等于 p + n ；它的限制不会改变。

trans-unit.source: This method recognizes the following as line terminators:
trans-unit.target: 本方法将以下内容识别为行终止符。

trans-unit.source: This method releases the resources that the Clob object holds.
trans-unit.target: 此方法释放 Clob 对象拥有的资源。

trans-unit.source: This method releases the resources that the Clob object holds. The object is invalid once the free method is called.
trans-unit.target: 此方法释放 Clob 对象拥有的资源。一旦调用 free 方法，则该对象无效。

trans-unit.source: This method relies on time-zone data provider files that are configured. These are loaded using a ServiceLoader.
trans-unit.target: 此方法依赖于配置的时区数据提供程序文件。这些是使用 ServiceLoader 加载的。

trans-unit.source: This method removes one or more NotificationListeners from a given MBean in the MBean server.
trans-unit.target: 此方法从MBean服务器中的给定MBean 移除一个或多个 NotificationListener 。

trans-unit.source: This method removes the Krb5Principal that was added by the commit method.
trans-unit.target: 该方法删除由 commit 方法添加的 Krb5Principal 。

trans-unit.source: This method removes the NTUserPrincipal, NTDomainPrincipal, NTSidUserPrincipal, NTSidDomainPrincipal, NTSidGroupPrincipals, and NTSidPrimaryGroupPrincipal that may have been added by the commit method.
trans-unit.target: 此方法将删除可能由 commit 方法添加的 NTUserPrincipal ， NTDomainPrincipal ， NTSidUserPrincipal ， NTSidDomainPrincipal ， NTSidGroupPrincipal 和 NTSidPrimaryGroupPrincipal 。

trans-unit.source: This method removes the Principals associated with the Subject.
trans-unit.target: 此方法删除与 Subject 关联的Principals 。

trans-unit.source: This method removes the Principals that were added by the commit method.
trans-unit.target: 此方法删除由 commit 方法添加的主体。

trans-unit.source: This method removes the Principals, public credentials and the private credentials that were added by the commit method.
trans-unit.target: 此方法删除由 commit 方法添加的主体，公共凭据和私有凭据。

trans-unit.source: This method repeatedly calls blocker.isReleasable() and blocker.block() until either method returns true. Every call to blocker.block() is preceded by a call to blocker.isReleasable() that returned false.
trans-unit.target: 此方法反复调用 blocker.isReleasable() 和 blocker.block() ,直到任一方法返回 true 为止。对每一个呼叫 blocker.block() 是通过将呼叫之前 blocker.isReleasable() 传回 false 。

trans-unit.source: This method represents a convenience accessor to infinite precision fractional second value returned by getFractionalSecond(). The returned value is the rounded down to milliseconds value of getFractionalSecond(). When getFractionalSecond() returns null, this method must return DatatypeConstants.FIELD_UNDEFINED.
trans-unit.target: 此方法表示 getFractionalSecond() 返回的无限精度小数秒值的便捷访问器。返回的值将四舍五入到 getFractionalSecond() 的毫秒值。当 getFractionalSecond() 返回 null 时，此方法必须返回 DatatypeConstants.FIELD_UNDEFINED 。

trans-unit.source: This method requests the Java virtual machine to make a best-effort estimate of the current memory usage of this memory pool. For some memory pools, this method may be an expensive operation that requires some computation to determine the estimate. An implementation should document when this is the case.
trans-unit.target: 该方法请求Java虚拟机对该内存池当前的内存使用情况进行尽力估计。对于某些内存池来说,这个方法可能是一个昂贵的操作,需要进行一些计算来确定估计值。在这种情况下,实现应该记录下来。

trans-unit.source: This method requires a fully initialized Cipher object, initialized with the exact same algorithm, key, padding scheme, etc., that were used to seal the object.
trans-unit.target: 此方法需要完全初始化的 Cipher 对象，并使用与密封对象完全相同的算法，键，填充方案等进行初始化。

trans-unit.source: This method resets charset-independent state and also invokes the implReset method in order to perform any charset-specific reset actions.
trans-unit.target: 此方法重置独立于字符集的状态，并调用 implReset 方法以执行任何特定于字符集的重置操作。

trans-unit.source: This method resets charset-independent state and also invokes the implReset method in order to perform any charset-specific reset actions.
trans-unit.target: 此方法重置独立于字符集的状态，并调用 implReset 方法以执行任何特定于字符集的重置操作。

trans-unit.source: This method resets charset-independent state and also invokes the implReset method in order to perform any charset-specific reset actions.
trans-unit.target: 此方法重置独立于字符集的状态，并调用 implReset 方法以执行任何特定于字符集的重置操作。

trans-unit.source: This method resets the encapsulated cipher object to its initial state and calls the close method of the underlying output stream.
trans-unit.target: 此方法将封装的密码对象重置为其初始状态，并调用基础输出流的 close 方法。

trans-unit.source: This method resets this KeyAgreement object to the state that it was in after the most recent call to one of the init methods. After a call to generateSecret, the object can be reused for further key agreement operations by calling doPhase to supply new keys, and then calling generateSecret to produce a new secret. In this case, the private information and algorithm parameters supplied to init will be used for multiple key agreement operations. The init method can be called after generateSecret to change the private information used in subsequent operations.
trans-unit.target: 此方法将此 KeyAgreement 对象重置为在最近一次调用 init 方法之一之后所处的状态。调用 generateSecret 之后，可以通过调用 doPhase 提供新的密钥，然后调用 generateSecret 产生新的秘密，将该对象重用于进一步的密钥协商操作。在这种情况下，提供给 init 的私有信息和算法参数将用于多个密钥协商操作。该 init 方法之后就可以称为 generateSecret 改变在后续操作中使用的私人信息。

trans-unit.source: This method resets this KeyAgreement object, so that it can be reused for further key agreements. Unless this key agreement is reinitialized with one of the init methods, the same private information and algorithm parameters will be used for subsequent key agreements.
trans-unit.target: 此方法重置此 KeyAgreement 对象，以便可以将其重新用于其他密钥协议。除非使用一种 init 方法重新初始化此密钥协议，否则相同的私有信息和算法参数将用于后续的密钥协议。

trans-unit.source: This method resets this KeyAgreementSpi object to the state that it was in after the most recent call to one of the init methods. After a call to generateSecret, the object can be reused for further key agreement operations by calling doPhase to supply new keys, and then calling generateSecret to produce a new secret. In this case, the private information and algorithm parameters supplied to init will be used for multiple key agreement operations. The init method can be called after generateSecret to change the private information used in subsequent operations.
trans-unit.target: 此方法将这个 KeyAgreementSpi 对象重置为在最近一次调用 init 方法之一之后所处的状态。调用 generateSecret 之后，可以通过调用 doPhase 提供新的密钥，然后调用 generateSecret 产生新的秘密，将该对象重用于进一步的密钥协商操作。在这种情况下，提供给 init 的私有信息和算法参数将用于多个密钥协商操作。该 init 方法之后就可以称为 generateSecret 改变在后续操作中使用的私人信息。

trans-unit.source: This method resets this KeyAgreementSpi object, so that it can be reused for further key agreements. Unless this key agreement is reinitialized with one of the engineInit methods, the same private information and algorithm parameters will be used for subsequent key agreements.
trans-unit.target: 此方法重置此 KeyAgreementSpi 对象，以便可以将其重新用于其他密钥协议。除非使用 engineInit 方法之一重新初始化此密钥协议，否则相同的私有信息和算法参数将用于后续的密钥协议。

trans-unit.source: This method reshapes the components in the specified target container in order to satisfy the constraints of the GridLayout object.
trans-unit.target: 此方法可重塑指定目标容器中的组件，以满足 GridLayout 对象的约束。

trans-unit.source: This method resumes the thread that called the enter() method and exits the secondary loop that was created when the enter() method was invoked.
trans-unit.target: 该方法恢复调用 enter() 方法的线程，并退出在调用 enter() 方法时创建的辅助循环。

trans-unit.source: This method retrieves a Node using a name.
trans-unit.target: 此方法使用名称检索 Node 。

trans-unit.source: This method retrieves a Node using a name. It first searches for a Node with a matching id attribute. If it doesn't find one, it then searches for a Node with a matching name attribute, but only on those elements that are allowed a name attribute.
trans-unit.target: 此方法使用名称检索 Node 。它首先搜索具有匹配 id 属性的 Node 。如果找不到，则搜索具有匹配 name 属性的 Node ，但仅在允许使用名称属性的那些元素上搜索。

trans-unit.source: This method retrieves a node specified by ordinal index.
trans-unit.target: 本方法检索由序数索引指定的节点。

trans-unit.source: This method retrieves a node specified by ordinal index. Nodes are numbered in tree order (depth-first traversal order).
trans-unit.target: 本方法检索一个由序数索引指定的节点,节点按树的顺序编号(深度优先遍历顺序)。节点按照树的顺序编号(深度优先遍历顺序)。

trans-unit.source: This method retrieves an exception that this exception wraps.
trans-unit.target: 这个方法检索这个异常所封装的异常。

trans-unit.source: This method returns -1. Subclasses that have a meaningful baseline should override appropriately.
trans-unit.target: 此方法返回-1。有意义的基线的子类应该适当地重写。

trans-unit.source: This method returns 13 elements since Calendar.UNDECIMBER is supported.
trans-unit.target: 由于支持 Calendar.UNDECIMBER ,因此此方法返回13个元素。

trans-unit.source: This method returns "null" if the specified array is null.
trans-unit.target: 如果指定的数组为 null ,则此方法返回 "null" 。

trans-unit.source: This method returns BaselineResizeBehavior.OTHER. Subclasses that support a baseline should override appropriately.
trans-unit.target: 此方法返回 BaselineResizeBehavior.OTHER 。支持基线的子类应适当覆盖。

trans-unit.source: This method returns false if the given character is a surrogate character; such characters can be interpreted only when they are members of a pair consisting of a high surrogate followed by a low surrogate. The canEncode(CharSequence) method may be used to test whether or not a character sequence can be encoded.
trans-unit.target: 如果给定字符是代理字符，则此方法返回 false ;否则，该方法返回false。只有当这些字符是由高替代词和低替代词组成的一对中的成员时，才能解释这些字符。所述 canEncode(CharSequence) 方法可以被用来测试一个字符序列是否能够进行编码。

trans-unit.source: This method returns false if the given character is a surrogate character; such characters can be interpreted only when they are members of a pair consisting of a high surrogate followed by a low surrogate. The canEncode(CharSequence) method may be used to test whether or not a character sequence can be encoded.
trans-unit.target: 如果给定字符是代理字符，则此方法返回 false ;否则，该方法返回false。只有当这些字符是由高替代词和低替代词组成的配对中的成员时，才能解释这些字符。所述 canEncode(CharSequence) 方法可以被用来测试一个字符序列是否能够进行编码。

trans-unit.source: This method returns newC. If oldC is not equal to newC and is non-null, it will be removed from its parent.
trans-unit.target: 此方法返回 newC 。如果 oldC 不等于 newC 且非 null ，它将从其父级中删除。

trans-unit.source: This method returns null during startup and before the boot layer is fully initialized.
trans-unit.target: 在启动过程中以及完全初始化引导层之前，此方法返回 null 。

trans-unit.source: This method returns null if and only if inForkJoinPool() returns false.
trans-unit.target: 当且仅当 inForkJoinPool() 返回 false 时,此方法才返回 null 。

trans-unit.source: This method returns null if the resource is not in this module, the resource is encapsulated and cannot be located by the caller, or access to the resource is denied by the security manager.
trans-unit.target: 如果资源不在此模块中，资源被封装且不能被调用者定位，或者安全管理器拒绝对资源的访问，则此方法返回 null 。

trans-unit.source: This method returns null if the thread is not in any of the above conditions.
trans-unit.target: 如果线程不在以上任何条件下，则此方法返回 null 。

trans-unit.source: This method returns null on failure rather than throwing a ClassNotFoundException, as is done by the forName(String, boolean, ClassLoader) method. The security check is a stack-based permission check if the caller loads a class in another module.
trans-unit.target: 此方法在失败时返回 null ，而不是像 forName(String, boolean, ClassLoader) 方法那样抛出 ClassNotFoundException 。安全检查是调用者是否在另一个模块中加载类的基于堆栈的权限检查。

trans-unit.source: This method returns null rather than throwing ClassNotFoundException if the class could not be found.
trans-unit.target: 如果找不到该类，则此方法返回 null 而不是抛出 ClassNotFoundException 。

trans-unit.source: This method returns true if and only if obj is not null and obj's class name is the same as the className field defined for this SimpleType instance (ie the class name returned by the getClassName method).
trans-unit.target: 当且仅当 obj 不为null且 obj 的类名与此 SimpleType 实例定义的className字段相同（即 getClassName 方法返回的类名）时，此方法返回 true 。

trans-unit.source: This method returns true if and only if obj is not null and obj's class name is the same as the className field defined for this SimpleType instance (ie the class name returned by the getClassName method).
trans-unit.target: 当且仅当 obj 不为null且 obj 的类名与此 SimpleType 实例定义的className字段相同（即 getClassName 方法返回的类名）时，此方法返回 true 。

trans-unit.source: This method returns true if and only if obj is not null, obj is an array and any one of the following is true:
trans-unit.target: 当且仅当 obj 不为null， obj 是一个数组且以下任意一项为 true 时，此方法返回 true ：

trans-unit.source: This method returns true if invoked to test if a package in this module is exported to itself. It always returns true when invoked on an unnamed module. A package that is open to the given module is considered exported to that module at run-time and so this method returns true if the package is open to the given module.
trans-unit.target: 如果调用此方法以测试此模块中的包是否导出到其自身，则此方法返回 true 。在未命名的模块上调用时，它始终返回 true 。对给定模块 open 的包被视为在运行时导出到该模块，因此，如果对给定模块打开了包，则此方法返回 true 。

trans-unit.source: This method returns true if invoked to test if a package in this module is open to itself. It returns true when invoked on an open module with a package in the module. It always returns true when invoked on an unnamed module.
trans-unit.target: 如果调用此方法以测试此模块中的包是否对自身开放，则此方法返回 true 。在带有模块中的包的 open 模块上调用时，它返回 true 。在未命名的模块上调用时，它始终返回 true 。

trans-unit.source: This method returns true if the accessible flag is set to true, i.e. the checks for Java language access control are suppressed, or if the caller can access the member as specified in
trans-unit.target: 如果将 accessible 标志设置为 true ，则该方法返回 true ，即，禁止Java语言访问控制的检查，或者调用方可以按照中指定的方式访问成员。

trans-unit.source: This method returns true if this matcher uses
trans-unit.target: 如果此匹配器使用此方法，则返回 true

trans-unit.source: This method returns Strings in the format as specified in getName(String) and also emits additional attribute type keywords for OIDs that have entries in the oidMap parameter. OID entries in the oidMap take precedence over the default OIDs recognized by getName(String). Improperly specified OIDs are ignored; however if an OID in the name maps to an improperly specified keyword, an IllegalArgumentException is thrown.
trans-unit.target: 此方法以 getName(String) 中指定的格式返回String，并且还为在 oidMap 参数中具有条目的OID发出其他属性类型关键字。oidMap中的OID条目优先于 getName(String) 识别的默认OID 。指定不正确的OID会被忽略；但是，如果名称中的OID映射到指定不正确的关键字，则会引发 IllegalArgumentException 。

trans-unit.source: This method returns Strings in the format as specified in getName(String) and also emits additional attribute type keywords for OIDs that have entries in the oidMap parameter. OID entries in the oidMap take precedence over the default OIDs recognized by getName(String). Improperly specified OIDs are ignored; however if an OID in the name maps to an improperly specified keyword, an IllegalArgumentException is thrown.
trans-unit.target: 此方法以 getName(String) 中指定的格式返回String，并且还为在 oidMap 参数中具有条目的OID发出其他属性类型关键字。 oidMap中的OID条目优先于 getName(String) 识别的默认OID 。指定不正确的OID将被忽略；但是，如果名称中的OID映射到指定不正确的关键字，则会引发 IllegalArgumentException 。

trans-unit.source: This method returns a Graphics2D, but is here for backwards compatibility.
trans-unit.target: 此方法返回 Graphics2D ，但此处是为了向后兼容。

trans-unit.source: This method returns a Graphics2D, but is here for backwards compatibility. createGraphics is more convenient, since it is declared to return a Graphics2D.
trans-unit.target: 此方法返回 Graphics2D ，但此处是为了向后兼容。 createGraphics 更加方便，因为它被声明为返回 Graphics2D 。

trans-unit.source: This method returns a CoderResult object to describe its reason for termination, in the same manner as the decode method. Most implementations of this method will handle decoding errors by returning an appropriate result object for interpretation by the decode method. An optimized implementation may instead examine the relevant error action and implement that action itself.
trans-unit.target: 此方法以与 decode 方法相同的方式返回 CoderResult 对象，以描述其终止原因。此方法的大多数实现都将通过返回适当的结果对象以供 decode 方法进行解释的方式来处理解码错误。优化的实现可以替代地检查相关的错误动作并自行执行该动作。

trans-unit.source: This method returns a CoderResult object to describe its reason for termination, in the same manner as the encode method. Most implementations of this method will handle encoding errors by returning an appropriate result object for interpretation by the encode method. An optimized implementation may instead examine the relevant error action and implement that action itself.
trans-unit.target: 此方法以与 encode 方法相同的方式返回 CoderResult 对象，以描述其终止原因。此方法的大多数实现都将通过返回适当的结果对象以供 encode 方法解释的方式来处理编码错误。优化的实现可以替代地检查相关的错误动作并自行执行该动作。

trans-unit.source: This method returns a CoderResult object to describe its reason for termination, in the same manner as the decode method. Most implementations of this method will handle decoding errors by returning an appropriate result object for interpretation by the decode method. An optimized implementation may instead examine the relevant error action and implement that action itself.
trans-unit.target: 此方法以与 decode 方法相同的方式返回 CoderResult 对象以描述其终止原因。此方法的大多数实现将通过返回适当的结果对象以供 decode 方法进行解释的方式来处理解码错误。优化的实现可以代替地检查相关的错误动作并自己执行该动作。

trans-unit.source: This method returns a CoderResult object to describe its reason for termination, in the same manner as the encode method. Most implementations of this method will handle encoding errors by returning an appropriate result object for interpretation by the encode method. An optimized implementation may instead examine the relevant error action and implement that action itself.
trans-unit.target: 此方法以与 encode 方法相同的方式返回 CoderResult 对象，以描述其终止原因。此方法的大多数实现都将通过返回适当的结果对象以供 encode 方法解释的方式来处理编码错误。优化的实现可以代替地检查相关的错误动作并自己执行该动作。

trans-unit.source: This method returns a Point indicating the Cursor's current location in the Component's coordinates.
trans-unit.target: 此方法返回一个 Point ，该Point指示 Cursor 在 Component 坐标中的当前位置。

trans-unit.source: This method returns a Point indicating the Cursor's current location within the Component's coordinates.
trans-unit.target: 此方法返回一个 Point ，该Point指示 Cursor 在 Component' 坐标内的当前位置。

trans-unit.source: This method returns a Point indicating the cursor location in screen coordinates at the moment this event occurred, or null if the cursor location is not specified for this event.
trans-unit.target: 此方法返回指示事件发生时屏幕坐标中光标位置的 Point ;如果未为此事件指定光标位置，则返回 null 。

trans-unit.source: This method returns a ThreadInfo object representing the thread information for the thread of the specified ID. The stack trace, locked monitors, and locked synchronizers in the returned ThreadInfo object will be empty. If a thread of the given ID is not alive or does not exist, this method will return null. A thread is alive if it has been started and has not yet died.
trans-unit.target: 此方法返回一个 ThreadInfo 对象，该对象表示指定ID的线程的线程信息。返回的 ThreadInfo 对象中的堆栈跟踪，锁定的监视器和锁定的同步器将为空。如果给定ID的线程不存在或不存在，则此方法将返回 null 。如果线程已经启动但尚未死亡，则该线程是活动的。

trans-unit.source: This method returns a boolean indicating if the drop was successful.
trans-unit.target: 此方法返回一个 boolean 指示删除是否成功。

trans-unit.source: This method returns a boolean indicating if the given DataFlavor is supported by this DropTargetContext.
trans-unit.target: 此方法返回一个 boolean 指示此 DropTargetContext 是否支持给定的 DataFlavor 。

trans-unit.source: This method returns a boolean indicating if the specified DataFlavor is available from the source.
trans-unit.target: 此方法返回一个 boolean 指示指定的 DataFlavor 是否可从源中获得。

trans-unit.source: This method returns a boolean indicating if the specified DataFlavor is supported.
trans-unit.target: 此方法返回一个 boolean 指示是否支持指定的 DataFlavor 。

trans-unit.source: This method returns a Java object whose type corresponds to the JDBC type that was registered for this parameter using the method registerOutParameter. By registering the target JDBC type as java.sql.Types.OTHER, this method can be used to read database-specific abstract data types.
trans-unit.target: 此方法返回一个Java对象，该对象的类型与使用方法 registerOutParameter 为此参数注册的JDBC类型相对应。通过将目标JDBC类型注册为 java.sql.Types.OTHER ，可以使用此方法读取特定于数据库的抽象数据类型。

trans-unit.source: This method returns a boolean value. If false is returned, the request is guaranteed to fail. If true is returned, the request will succeed unless it is vetoed, or an extraordinary event, such as disposal of the Component's peer, occurs before the request can be granted by the native windowing system. Again, while a return value of true indicates that the request is likely to succeed, developers must never assume that this Component is the focus owner until this Component receives a FOCUS_GAINED event.
trans-unit.target: 此方法返回一个布尔值。如果返回 false ，则保证请求失败。如果返回 true ，则请求将被成功，除非请求被否决，或者在本机窗口系统可以授予请求之前发生了非常规事件（例如，处置Component的对等对象）。同样，尽管返回值 true 表示请求可能会成功，但是开发人员在此组件收到FOCUS_GAINED事件之前，永远不能假定此组件是焦点所有者。

trans-unit.source: This method returns a boolean value. If false is returned, the request is guaranteed to fail. If true is returned, the request will succeed unless it is vetoed, or an extraordinary event, such as disposal of the component's peer, occurs before the request can be granted by the native windowing system. Again, while a return value of true indicates that the request is likely to succeed, developers must never assume that this component is the focus owner until this component receives a FOCUS_GAINED event.
trans-unit.target: 此方法返回一个布尔值。如果返回 false ，则保证请求失败。如果返回 true ，则请求将被成功，除非请求被否决，或者在本机窗口系统可以授予该请求之前发生了异常事件（如组件对等对象的处置）。同样，虽然返回值 true 表示请求可能会成功，但是开发人员在此组件收到FOCUS_GAINED事件之前，永远不能假定此组件是焦点所有者。

trans-unit.source: This method returns a copy of the internally stored list, so all operations on the returned object will not affect the window's behavior.
trans-unit.target: 此方法返回内部存储的列表的副本,因此对返回对象的所有操作都不会影响窗口的行为。

trans-unit.source: This method returns a copy of the retrieved password.
trans-unit.target: 本方法返回检索到的密码的副本。

trans-unit.source: This method returns a historically correct offset if an underlying TimeZone implementation subclass supports historical Daylight Saving Time schedule and GMT offset changes.
trans-unit.target: 如果基础 TimeZone 实现子类支持历史夏时制时间表和GMT偏移量更改，则此方法将返回历史上正确的偏移量。

trans-unit.source: This method returns a historically correct offset value if an underlying TimeZone implementation subclass supports historical Daylight Saving Time schedule and GMT offset changes.
trans-unit.target: 如果底层的TimeZone实现子类支持历史上的夏令时时间表和GMT偏移量变化,则该方法返回一个历史上正确的偏移值。

trans-unit.source: This method returns a list of VirtualMachineDescriptor elements. Each VirtualMachineDescriptor describes a Java virtual machine to which this provider can
trans-unit.target: 此方法返回 VirtualMachineDescriptor 元素的列表。每个 VirtualMachineDescriptor 都描述了该提供程序可以在其上访问的Java虚拟机。

trans-unit.source: This method returns a list of Java VirtualMachineDescriptor elements. The list is an aggregation of the virtual machine descriptor lists obtained by invoking the listVirtualMachines method of all installed attach providers. If there are no Java virtual machines known to any provider then an empty list is returned.
trans-unit.target: 此方法返回Java VirtualMachineDescriptor 元素的列表。该列表是通过调用所有已安装的 attach providers 的 listVirtualMachines 方法获得的虚拟机描述符列表的集合。如果没有任何提供者知道的Java虚拟机，则返回一个空列表。

trans-unit.source: This method returns a new object based on this one with the specified period added. For example, on a LocalDate, this could be used to add a number of years, months or days. The returned object will have the same observable type as this object.
trans-unit.target: 此方法基于添加了指定时间的该对象返回一个新对象。例如，在 LocalDate 上，这可以用于添加若干年，数月或数天。返回的对象将具有与此对象相同的可观察类型。

trans-unit.source: This method returns a new object based on this one with the specified period subtracted. For example, on a LocalDate, this could be used to subtract a number of years, months or days. The returned object will have the same observable type as this object.
trans-unit.target: 此方法基于此对象返回一个新对象，并减去指定的周期。例如，在 LocalDate 上，这可用于减去若干年，数月或数天。返回的对象将具有与此对象相同的可观察类型。

trans-unit.source: This method returns a positive duration by effectively removing the sign from any negative total length. For example, PT-1.3S will be returned as PT1.3S.
trans-unit.target: 该方法通过有效地从任何负的总长度中删除符号来返回正的持续时间。例如， PT-1.3S 将作为 PT1.3S 返回。

trans-unit.source: This method returns a reference to a FileSystem that was created by invoking the newFileSystem(URI,Map) method. File systems created the newFileSystem(Path,Map) method are not returned by this method. The file system is identified by its URI. Its exact form is highly provider dependent. In the case of the default provider the URI's path component is "/" and the authority, query and fragment components are undefined (Undefined components are represented by null).
trans-unit.target: 此方法返回对通过调用 newFileSystem(URI,Map) 方法创建的 FileSystem 的引用。此方法不返回创建 newFileSystem(Path,Map) 方法的文件系统。文件系统由其 URI 标识。其确切形式高度依赖于提供者。对于默认提供程序，URI的路径组件为 "/" ，并且权限，查询和片段组件是未定义的（未定义的组件由 null 表示）。

trans-unit.source: This method returns a reference to a FileSystem that was created by invoking the newFileSystem(URI,Map) method. File systems created the newFileSystem(Path,Map) method are not returned by this method. The file system is identified by its URI. Its exact form is highly provider dependent. In the case of the default provider the URI's path component is "/" and the authority, query and fragment components are undefined (Undefined components are represented by null).
trans-unit.target: 此方法返回对通过调用 newFileSystem(URI,Map) 方法创建的 FileSystem 的引用。此方法不返回创建 newFileSystem(Path,Map) 方法的文件系统。文件系统由其 URI 标识。其确切形式高度依赖于提供者。对于默认提供程序，URI的路径组件为 "/" ，并且权限，查询和片段组件未定义（未定义的组件由 null 表示）。

trans-unit.source: This method returns a specialized object which implements the specialized APIs of the specified feature and version, as specified in .
trans-unit.target: 这个方法返回一个专门的对象,它实现了指定特性和版本的专门的API,如在.NET中指定的那样。

trans-unit.source: This method returns a specialized object which implements the specialized APIs of the specified feature and version, as specified in . The specialized object may also be obtained by using binding-specific casting methods but is not necessarily expected to, as discussed in . This method also allow the implementation to provide specialized objects which do not support the Node interface.
trans-unit.target: 此方法返回一个专用对象，该对象实现所指定功能和版本的专用API，如中所指定。专用对象也可以通过使用绑定特定的转换方法来获得，但不一定是预期的，如所讨论。此方法还允许实现提供不支持 Node 接口的专用对象。

trans-unit.source: This method returns a specialized object which implements the specialized APIs of the specified feature and version, as specified in DOM Features.
trans-unit.target: 此方法返回一个专用对象，该对象实现DOM Features中指定的指定功能和版本的专用API 。

trans-unit.source: This method returns a specialized object which implements the specialized APIs of the specified feature and version, as specified in DOM Features. The specialized object may also be obtained by using binding-specific casting methods but is not necessarily expected to, as discussed in . This method also allow the implementation to provide specialized objects which do not support the DOMImplementation interface.
trans-unit.target: 此方法返回一个专用对象，该对象实现DOM Features中指定的指定功能和版本的专用API 。专用对象也可以通过使用绑定特定的转换方法来获得，但不一定是预期的，如所讨论。此方法还允许实现提供不支持 DOMImplementation 接口的专用对象。

trans-unit.source: This method returns a specialized object which implements the specialized APIs of the specified feature and version, as specified in DOM Features.
trans-unit.target: 此方法返回一个专用对象，该对象实现DOM Features中指定的指定功能和版本的专用API 。

trans-unit.source: This method returns a specialized object which implements the specialized APIs of the specified feature and version, as specified in DOM Features. The specialized object may also be obtained by using binding-specific casting methods but is not necessarily expected to, as discussed in . This method also allow the implementation to provide specialized objects which do not support the DOMImplementation interface.
trans-unit.target: 此方法返回一个专用对象，该对象实现DOM Features中指定的指定功能和版本的专用API 。专用对象也可以通过使用绑定特定的转换方法来获得，但不一定是预期的，如所讨论。此方法还允许实现提供不支持 DOMImplementation 接口的专用对象。

trans-unit.source: This method returns a status indicator: If negative, it represents the (negative) number of drops (failed attempts to issue the item to a subscriber). Otherwise it is an estimate of the maximum lag (number of items submitted but not yet consumed) among all current subscribers. This value is at least one (accounting for this submitted item) if there are any subscribers, else zero.
trans-unit.target: 此方法返回一个状态指示器。如果为负数,则表示(负数)的掉落次数(向用户发放物品的尝试失败)。否则,它是对当前所有订阅者中最大滞后(已提交但尚未消耗的物品数量)的估计。如果有任何订阅者,该值至少为1(占本次提交的物品),否则为0。

trans-unit.source: This method returns a the currently available DataFlavors of the Transferable operand as a java.util.List.
trans-unit.target: 该方法返回的当前可用的DataFlavor Transferable 操作数为 java.util.List 的。

trans-unit.source: This method returns a valid rectangle, even if the specified node is not currently displayed.
trans-unit.target: 此方法返回一个有效的矩形,即使指定的节点当前没有显示。

trans-unit.source: This method returns all the printing attribute categories this print service supports for any possible job. Some categories may not be supported in a particular context (ie for a particular DocFlavor). Use one of the methods that include a DocFlavor to validate the request before submitting it, such as getSupportedAttributeValues(..).
trans-unit.target: 此方法返回此打印服务支持的所有可能的作业的所有打印属性类别。在特定上下文中（例如，特定 DocFlavor ）可能不支持某些类别。使用包含 DocFlavor 的方法之一在提交之前验证请求，例如 getSupportedAttributeValues(..) 。

trans-unit.source: This method returns an Object because different printing attribute categories indicate the supported attribute values in different ways. The documentation for each printing attribute in package javax.print.attribute.standard describes how each attribute indicates its supported values. Possible ways of indicating support include:
trans-unit.target: 此方法返回一个 Object ,因为不同的打印属性类别以不同的方式指示支持的属性值。包 javax.print.attribute.standard 中有关每个打印属性的文档描述了每个属性如何指示其支持的值。表示支持的可能方式包括：

trans-unit.source: This method returns an int indicating if the source is in the same JVM as the target.
trans-unit.target: 此方法返回一个 int 值，该值指示源是否与目标位于同一JVM中。

trans-unit.source: This method returns an int representing the action performed by the target on the subject of the drop.
trans-unit.target: 此方法返回一个 int 值，该值表示目标在放置主题上执行的操作。

trans-unit.source: This method returns an int representing the current actions this DropTarget will accept.
trans-unit.target: 此方法返回一个表示此 DropTarget 将接受的当前操作的 int 。

trans-unit.source: This method returns an int representing the current state of the input device extended modifiers associated with the user's gesture.
trans-unit.target: 此方法返回一个 int ,它表示与用户手势相关联的输入设备扩展修饰符的当前状态。

trans-unit.source: This method returns an int representing the current state of the input device extended modifiers associated with the user's gesture. See InputEvent.getModifiersEx()
trans-unit.target: 此方法返回一个 int ,它表示与用户手势相关联的输入设备扩展修饰符的当前状态。请参见 InputEvent.getModifiersEx()

trans-unit.source: This method returns an int representing the current state of the input device modifiers associated with the user's gesture.
trans-unit.target: 此方法返回一个 int ,它表示与用户手势相关联的输入设备修改器的当前状态。

trans-unit.source: This method returns an int representing the current state of the input device modifiers associated with the user's gesture. Typically these would be mouse buttons or keyboard modifiers.
trans-unit.target: 此方法返回一个 int ,它表示与用户手势相关联的输入设备修改器的当前状态。通常，这些将是鼠标按钮或键盘修饰符。

trans-unit.source: This method returns an Object because different printing attribute categories indicate the supported attribute values in different ways. The documentation for each printing attribute in package javax.print.attribute.standard describes how each attribute indicates its supported values. Possible ways of indicating support include:
trans-unit.target: 此方法返回一个Object，因为不同的打印属性类别以不同的方式指示支持的属性值。软件包 javax.print.attribute.standard 中有关每个打印属性的文档描述了每个属性如何指示其支持的值。表示支持的可能方式包括：

trans-unit.source: This method returns an array containing the sub-menu components for this menu component.
trans-unit.target: 该方法返回一个包含该菜单组件的子菜单组件的数组。

trans-unit.source: This method returns an array of ThreadInfo objects as specified in the getThreadInfo(long[], boolean, boolean, int) method.
trans-unit.target: 此方法返回在 getThreadInfo(long[], boolean, boolean, int) 方法中指定的 ThreadInfo 对象数组。

trans-unit.source: This method returns an array of ThreadInfo objects as specified in the getThreadInfo(long[], boolean, boolean) method.
trans-unit.target: 此方法返回 getThreadInfo(long[], boolean, boolean) 方法中指定的 ThreadInfo 对象数组。

trans-unit.source: This method returns an array of File objects that denote the root directories of the available filesystem roots. It is guaranteed that the canonical pathname of any file physically present on the local machine will begin with one of the roots returned by this method.
trans-unit.target: 此方法返回一个 File 对象数组，这些对象表示可用文件系统根目录的根目录。可以确保本地计算机上物理上存在的任何文件的规范路径名都将从此方法返回的根目录之一开始。

trans-unit.source: This method returns an array of KeyBindings, one for each alternating key-action pair in keyBindingList. A key can either be a String in the format specified by the KeyStroke.getKeyStroke method, or a KeyStroke. The action part of the pair is a String that corresponds to the name of the Action.
trans-unit.target: 此方法返回一个 KeyBindings 数组，每个数组对应于 keyBindingList 中的每个交替的 key-action 对。甲 key 可以是一个 String 中由指定的格式 KeyStroke.getKeyStroke 法或 KeyStroke 。该对中的 action 部分是一个 String ，它与 Action 的名称相对应。

trans-unit.source: This method returns an array of the ThreadInfo objects, each is the thread information about the thread with the same index as in the ids array. If a thread of the given ID is not alive or does not exist, null will be set in the corresponding element in the returned array. A thread is alive if it has been started and has not yet died.
trans-unit.target: 此方法返回 ThreadInfo 对象的数组，每个对象都是有关线程的线程信息，其索引与 ids 数组中的索引相同。如果给定ID的线程不存在或不存在，则将在返回数组的相应元素中设置 null 。如果线程已经启动但尚未死亡，则该线程是活动的。

trans-unit.source: This method returns an array of the ThreadInfo objects. The stack trace, locked monitors, and locked synchronizers in each ThreadInfo object will be empty. If a thread of a given ID is not alive or does not exist, the corresponding element in the returned array will contain null. A thread is alive if it has been started and has not yet died.
trans-unit.target: 此方法返回 ThreadInfo 对象的数组。每个 ThreadInfo 对象中的堆栈跟踪，锁定的监视器和锁定的同步器将为空。如果给定ID的线程不存在或不存在，则返回数组中的相应元素将包含 null 。如果线程已经启动但尚未死亡，则该线程是活动的。

trans-unit.source: This method returns an array rather than a Set or Stream for consistency with the existing getPackages() method.
trans-unit.target: 为了与现有的 getPackages() 方法保持一致，此方法返回一个数组而不是 Set 或 Stream 。

trans-unit.source: This method returns an asynchronous server socket channel that is bound to the default group. This method is equivalent to evaluating the expression:
trans-unit.target: 此方法返回绑定到默认组的异步服务器套接字通道。此方法等效于评估表达式：

trans-unit.source: This method returns an asynchronous socket channel that is bound to the default group.This method is equivalent to evaluating the expression:
trans-unit.target: 此方法返回绑定到默认组的异步套接字通道。此方法等效于评估表达式：

trans-unit.source: This method returns an enumeration of the results. Each element in the enumeration contains the name of the object and other information about the object (see SearchResult). The name is either relative to the target context of the search (which is named by the name parameter), or it is a URL string. If the target context is included in the enumeration (as is possible when cons specifies a search scope of SearchControls.OBJECT_SCOPE or SearchControls.SUBSTREE_SCOPE), its name is the empty string.
trans-unit.target: 此方法返回结果的枚举。枚举中的每个元素都包含对象的名称以及有关该对象的其他信息（请参阅 SearchResult ）。该名称或者相对于搜索的目标上下文（由 name 参数命名），或者是URL字符串。如果目标上下文包含在枚举中（当 cons 指定 SearchControls.OBJECT_SCOPE 或 SearchControls.SUBSTREE_SCOPE 的搜索范围时，则可能是这样），其名称为空字符串。

trans-unit.source: This method returns an int representing the type of action(s) this Drag and Drop operation will support.
trans-unit.target: 此方法返回一个 int,表示此拖放操作将支持的操作类型。

trans-unit.source: This method returns an object with the same LocalDateTime and the specified ZoneOffset. No calculation is needed or performed. For example, if this time represents 2007-12-03T10:30+02:00 and the offset specified is +03:00, then this method will return 2007-12-03T10:30+03:00.
trans-unit.target: 此方法返回一个具有相同 LocalDateTime 和指定的 ZoneOffset 的对象。无需计算或执行任何计算。例如，如果此时间表示 2007-12-03T10:30+02:00 且指定的偏移量为 +03:00 ，则此方法将返回 2007-12-03T10:30+03:00 。

trans-unit.source: This method returns an object with the same LocalTime and the specified ZoneOffset. No calculation is needed or performed. For example, if this time represents 10:30+02:00 and the offset specified is +03:00, then this method will return 10:30+03:00.
trans-unit.target: 该方法返回与同一个对象 LocalTime 和指定的 ZoneOffset 。无需计算或执行任何计算。例如，如果此时间表示 +03:00 10:30+02:00 且指定的偏移量为+03：00，则此方法将返回10：30 10:30+03:00 。

trans-unit.source: This method returns an object with the specified ZoneOffset and a LocalDateTime adjusted by the difference between the two offsets. This will result in the old and new objects representing the same instant. This is useful for finding the local time in a different offset. For example, if this time represents 2007-12-03T10:30+02:00 and the offset specified is +03:00, then this method will return 2007-12-03T11:30+03:00.
trans-unit.target: 此方法返回一个具有指定 ZoneOffset 和 LocalDateTime 的对象，该对象通过两个偏移量之间的差值进行调整。这将导致旧对象和新对象表示相同的瞬间。这对于查找其他偏移量的本地时间很有用。例如，如果此时间表示 2007-12-03T10:30+02:00 ,并且指定的偏移量为 +03:00 ，则此方法将返回 2007-12-03T11:30+03:00 。

trans-unit.source: This method returns an object with the specified ZoneOffset and a LocalTime adjusted by the difference between the two offsets. This will result in the old and new objects representing the same instant on an implied day. This is useful for finding the local time in a different offset. For example, if this time represents 10:30+02:00 and the offset specified is +03:00, then this method will return 11:30+03:00.
trans-unit.target: 该方法返回与指定的对象 ZoneOffset 和 LocalTime 由两个偏移之间的差进行调整。这将导致旧对象和新对象在一个隐含的日期代表相同的瞬间。这对于查找其他偏移量的本地时间很有用。例如，如果此时间表示 +03:00 10:30+02:00 并且指定的偏移量为+03：00，则此方法将返回11：30 11:30+03:00 。

trans-unit.source: This method returns false by default. Keystore implementations should override this method to peek at the data stream directly or to use other content detection mechanisms.
trans-unit.target: 这个方法默认返回false。Keystore的实现应该覆盖这个方法来直接窥视数据流,或者使用其他内容检测机制。

trans-unit.source: This method returns if there is a derivation between the reference type definition, i.e. the TypeInfo on which the method is being called, and the other type definition, i.e. the one passed as parameters.
trans-unit.target: 如果引用类型定义（即在其上调用该方法的 TypeInfo )与另一个类型定义（即作为参数传递的类型）之间存在派生关系，则此方法返回。

trans-unit.source: This method returns immediately in all cases, even if the complete image has not yet been loaded, and it has not been dithered and converted for the current output device.
trans-unit.target: 该方法在所有情况下都会立即返回,即使尚未加载完整的图像,也没有对当前输出设备进行抖动和转换。

trans-unit.source: This method returns immediately in all cases, even if the entire image has not yet been scaled, dithered, and converted for the current output device. If the current output representation is not yet complete then drawImage returns false. As more of the image becomes available, the process that loads the image notifies the specified image observer.
trans-unit.target: 即使尚未为当前输出设备缩放，抖动和转换整个图像，此方法在所有情况下都将立即返回。如果当前输出表示尚未完成，则 drawImage 返回 false 。随着更多图像可用，加载图像的过程会通知指定的图像观察者。

trans-unit.source: This method returns immediately in all cases, even if the entire image has not yet been scaled, dithered, and converted for the current output device. If the current output representation is not yet complete, then drawImage returns false. As more of the image becomes available, the process that loads the image notifies the image observer by calling its imageUpdate method.
trans-unit.target: 即使尚未为当前输出设备缩放，抖动和转换整个图像，此方法在所有情况下都将立即返回。如果当前输出表示尚未完成，则 drawImage 返回 false 。随着更多图像可用，加载图像的过程通过调用其 imageUpdate 方法来通知图像观察者。

trans-unit.source: This method returns immediately in all cases, even if the image area to be drawn has not yet been scaled, dithered, and converted for the current output device. If the current output representation is not yet complete then drawImage returns false. As more of the image becomes available, the process that loads the image notifies the specified image observer.
trans-unit.target: 即使在当前输出设备尚未缩放，抖动和转换要绘制的图像区域的情况下，此方法在所有情况下都将立即返回。如果当前输出表示尚未完成，则 drawImage 返回 false 。随着更多图像可用，加载图像的过程会通知指定的图像观察者。

trans-unit.source: This method returns prefixes mapped to a specific Namespace URI. The xml: prefix will be included. If you want only one prefix that's mapped to the Namespace URI, and you don't care which one you get, use the getPrefix method instead.
trans-unit.target: 此方法返回映射到特定命名空间URI的前缀。xml：前缀将包括在内。如果只希望将一个前缀映射到命名空间URI，并且不关心要获取哪个前缀，请改用 getPrefix 方法。

trans-unit.source: This method returns silently if the provider is not installed or if name is null.
trans-unit.target: 如果提供者没有安装或name为空,本方法将无声返回。

trans-unit.source: This method returns the Component associated with this DropTargetContext.
trans-unit.target: 此方法返回与此 DropTargetContext 关联的 Component 。

trans-unit.source: This method returns the Component that is to be "observed" by the DragGestureRecognizer for drag initiating gestures.
trans-unit.target: 此方法返回 DragGestureRecognizer 将“观察”到的 Component ，以进行拖动启动手势。

trans-unit.source: This method returns the DragSource this DragGestureRecognizer will use in order to process the Drag and Drop operation.
trans-unit.target: 此方法返回 DragSource ,此 DragGestureRecognizer 将使用它来处理拖放操作。

trans-unit.source: This method returns the DragSourceContext that originated the event.
trans-unit.target: 此方法返回 DragSourceContext 事件的DragSourceContext。

trans-unit.source: This method returns the DropTarget associated with this DropTargetContext.
trans-unit.target: 此方法返回 DropTarget 与此相关 DropTargetContext 。

trans-unit.source: This method returns the DropTargetContext associated with this DropTargetEvent.
trans-unit.target: 此方法返回 DropTargetContext 与此相关 DropTargetEvent 。

trans-unit.source: This method returns the FlavorMap for this DragSource.
trans-unit.target: 此方法返回此 DragSource 的 FlavorMap 。

trans-unit.source: This method returns the Insets describing the autoscrolling region or border relative to the geometry of the implementing Component.
trans-unit.target: 此方法返回 Insets 这些插图描述了相对于实现组件的几何形状的自动滚动区域或边框。

trans-unit.source: This method returns the Transferable object associated with the drop.
trans-unit.target: 此方法返回与放置关联的 Transferable 对象。

trans-unit.source: This method returns the Transferable object that represents the data associated with the current drag operation.
trans-unit.target: 此方法返回代表与当前拖动操作相关联的数据的可传输对象。

trans-unit.source: This method returns the agent properties whose key and value is a String. Properties whose key or value is not a String are omitted. If there are no agent properties maintained in the target virtual machine then an empty property list is returned.
trans-unit.target: 此方法返回其键和值是 String 的代理属性。键或值不是 String 的属性将被省略。如果目标虚拟机中未保留任何代理程序属性，则返回一个空的属性列表。

trans-unit.source: This method returns the channel obtained by invoking the inheritedChannel method of the system-wide default SelectorProvider object.
trans-unit.target: 此方法返回通过调用系统范围的默认 SelectorProvider 对象的 inheritedChannel 方法获得的通道。

trans-unit.source: This method returns the current DataFlavors as a java.util.List
trans-unit.target: 此方法返回当前 DataFlavor S作为 java.util.List 的

trans-unit.source: This method returns the current DataFlavors from the DropTargetContext.
trans-unit.target: 此方法从 DropTargetContext 返回当前的 DataFlavor 。

trans-unit.source: This method returns the current DataFlavors.
trans-unit.target: 本方法返回当前的DataFlavors。

trans-unit.source: This method returns the currently available DataFlavors as a java.util.List.
trans-unit.target: 这个方法返回当前可用 DataFlavor S作为 java.util.List 的。

trans-unit.source: This method returns the enum DayOfWeek for the day-of-week. This avoids confusion as to what int values mean. If you need access to the primitive int value then the enum provides the int value.
trans-unit.target: 此方法返回星期几的枚举 DayOfWeek 。这样可以避免对 int 值的含义感到困惑。如果需要访问原始 int 值，则枚举将提供 int value 。

trans-unit.source: This method returns the enum DayOfWeek for the day-of-week. This avoids confusion as to what int values mean. If you need access to the primitive int value then the enum provides the int value.
trans-unit.target: 此方法返回星期几的枚举 DayOfWeek 。这样可以避免对 int 值的含义感到困惑。如果需要访问原始 int 值，则枚举将提供 int value 。

trans-unit.source: This method returns the enum Month for the month. This avoids confusion as to what int values mean. If you need access to the primitive int value then the enum provides the int value.
trans-unit.target: 此方法返回该 Month 的枚举月。这样可以避免对 int 值的含义感到困惑。如果需要访问原始 int 值，则枚举将提供 int value 。

trans-unit.source: This method returns the enum Month for the month. This avoids confusion as to what int values mean. If you need access to the primitive int value then the enum provides the int value.
trans-unit.target: 此方法返回该 Month 的枚举月。这样可以避免对 int 值的含义感到困惑。如果需要访问原始 int 值，则枚举将提供 int value 。

trans-unit.source: This method returns the first event in the series of events that initiated the Drag and Drop operation.
trans-unit.target: 此方法返回发起拖放操作的一系列事件中的第一个事件。

trans-unit.source: This method returns the horizontal coordinate of the cursor location in screen coordinates at the moment this event occurred, or zero if the cursor location is not specified for this event.
trans-unit.target: 该方法以屏幕坐标返回该事件发生时光标位置的水平坐标,如果没有为该事件指定光标位置,则返回零。

trans-unit.source: This method returns the logical intersection of the target drop action and the set of drop actions supported by the drag source.
trans-unit.target: 此方法返回目标投放动作与拖动源支持的投放动作集的逻辑交集。

trans-unit.source: This method returns the major tick spacing.
trans-unit.target: 本方法返回主要的刻度线间距。

trans-unit.source: This method returns the major tick spacing. The number that is returned represents the distance, measured in values, between each major tick mark. If you have a slider with a range from 0 to 50 and the major tick spacing is set to 10, you will get major ticks next to the following values: 0, 10, 20, 30, 40, 50.
trans-unit.target: 此方法返回主要的刻度线间距。返回的数字代表每个主要刻度线之间的距离,以数值来衡量。如果您有一个范围为0到50的滑块,并且主要刻度线间距设置为10,您将得到下列数值旁边的主要刻度线:0、10、20、30、40、50。0,10,20,30,40,50.

trans-unit.source: This method returns the minor tick spacing.
trans-unit.target: 此方法返回小刻度线的间距。

trans-unit.source: This method returns the minor tick spacing. The number that is returned represents the distance, measured in values, between each minor tick mark. If you have a slider with a range from 0 to 50 and the minor tick spacing is set to 10, you will get minor ticks next to the following values: 0, 10, 20, 30, 40, 50.
trans-unit.target: 此方法返回小刻度线的间距。返回的数字代表每个小刻度线之间的距离,以数值来衡量。如果您的滑块的范围是0到50,并且小刻度间距设置为10,那么您将得到下列数值旁边的小刻度。0,10,20,30,40,50.

trans-unit.source: This method returns the month as an int from 1 to 12. Application code is frequently clearer if the enum Month is used by calling getMonth().
trans-unit.target: 此方法以1到12之间的 int 返回月份。如果通过调用 getMonth() 使用枚举 Month ,则应用程序代码通常会更清晰。

trans-unit.source: This method returns the month as an int from 1 to 12. Application code is frequently clearer if the enum Month is used by calling getMonth().
trans-unit.target: 此方法以1到12之间的 int 返回月份。如果通过调用 getMonth() 使用枚举 Month ,则应用程序代码通常会更清晰。

trans-unit.source: This method returns the month as an int from 1 to 12. Application code is frequently clearer if the enum Month is used by calling getMonth().
trans-unit.target: 此方法以1到12之间的 int 返回月份。如果通过调用 getMonth() 使用枚举 Month ,则应用程序代码通常会更清晰。

trans-unit.source: This method returns the month as an int from 1 to 12. Application code is frequently clearer if the enum Month is used by calling getMonth().
trans-unit.target: 此方法以1到12之间的 int 返回月份。如果通过调用 getMonth() 使用枚举 Month ,则应用程序代码通常会更清晰。

trans-unit.source: This method returns the month as an int from 1 to 12. Application code is frequently clearer if the enum Month is used by calling getMonth().
trans-unit.target: 此方法以1到12之间的 int 返回月份。如果通过调用 getMonth() 使用枚举 Month ,则应用程序代码通常会更清晰。

trans-unit.source: This method returns the month as an int from 1 to 12. Application code is frequently clearer if the enum Month is used by calling getMonth().
trans-unit.target: 此方法以1到12之间的 int 返回月份。如果通过调用 getMonth() 使用枚举 Month ,则应用程序代码通常会更清晰。

trans-unit.source: This method returns the month as an int from 1 to 12. Application code is frequently clearer if the enum Month is used by calling getMonth().
trans-unit.target: 此方法以1到12之间的 int 返回月份。如果通过调用 getMonth() 使用枚举 Month ,则应用程序代码通常会更清晰。

trans-unit.source: This method returns the most recently pushed-back byte, if there is one, and otherwise calls the read method of its underlying input stream and returns whatever value that method returns.
trans-unit.target: 如果有一个，此方法将返回最近被推回的字节，否则调用其基础输入流的 read 方法，并返回该方法返回的任何值。

trans-unit.source: This method returns the nearest extant parent in the namespace. Thus if a Logger is called "a.b.c.d", and a Logger called "a.b" has been created but no logger "a.b.c" exists, then a call of getParent on the Logger "a.b.c.d" will return the Logger "a.b".
trans-unit.target: 该方法返回命名空间中最近的现存父代。因此,如果一个名为 "a.b.c.d "的记录仪已经创建了名为 "a.b "的记录仪,但没有 "a.b.c "的记录仪存在,那么对记录仪 "a.b.c.d "的getParent调用将返回记录仪 "a.b"。

trans-unit.source: This method returns the node which received the replacement text. The returned node is:
trans-unit.target: 本方法返回接收替换文本的节点。返回的节点是:

trans-unit.source: This method returns the number of bytes available in accelerated memory on this device.
trans-unit.target: 此方法返回此设备上加速内存的可用字节数。

trans-unit.source: This method returns the number of bytes available in accelerated memory on this device. Some images are created or cached in accelerated memory on a first-come, first-served basis. On some operating systems, this memory is a finite resource. Calling this method and scheduling the creation and flushing of images carefully may enable applications to make the most efficient use of that finite resource.
trans-unit.target: 此方法返回此设备上加速内存中可用的字节数。有些图像是以先到先得的方式在加速内存中创建或缓存的。在某些操作系统上,此内存是有限的资源。调用此方法并仔细安排图像的创建和刷新,可以使应用程序最有效地利用该有限资源。

trans-unit.source: This method returns the number of units to scroll when scroll type is MouseWheelEvent.WHEEL_UNIT_SCROLL, and should only be called if getScrollType returns MouseWheelEvent.WHEEL_UNIT_SCROLL.
trans-unit.target: 当滚动类型为MouseWheelEvent.WHEEL_UNIT_SCROLL时，此方法返回滚动单位，并且仅当 getScrollType 返回MouseWheelEvent.WHEEL_UNIT_SCROLL时才应调用此方法。

trans-unit.source: This method returns the object on which it is called. A subclass can override it to return another object provided the contract is respected.
trans-unit.target: 这个方法返回被调用的对象。一个子类可以重写它来返回另一个对象,前提是合同得到尊重。

trans-unit.source: This method returns the object that was last set through the getContentHandler() method, or null if that method has never been called since this ValidatorHandler has created.
trans-unit.target: 此方法返回通过 getContentHandler() 方法最后设置的对象；如果自创建此 ValidatorHandler 以来从未调用过该方法，则返回null 。

trans-unit.source: This method returns the object that was last set through the setErrorHandler(ErrorHandler) method, or null if that method has never been called since this SchemaFactory has created.
trans-unit.target: 此方法返回通过 setErrorHandler(ErrorHandler) 方法最后设置的对象；如果自创建此 SchemaFactory 以来从未调用过该方法，则返回null 。

trans-unit.source: This method returns the object that was last set through the setErrorHandler(ErrorHandler) method, or null if that method has never been called since this Validator has created.
trans-unit.target: 此方法返回通过 setErrorHandler(ErrorHandler) 方法最后设置的对象；如果自创建此 Validator 以来从未调用过该方法，则返回null 。

trans-unit.source: This method returns the object that was last set through the setErrorHandler(ErrorHandler) method, or null if that method has never been called since this ValidatorHandler has created.
trans-unit.target: 此方法返回通过 setErrorHandler(ErrorHandler) 方法最后设置的对象；如果自创建此 ValidatorHandler 以来从未调用过该方法，则返回null 。

trans-unit.source: This method returns the object that was last set through the setResourceResolver(LSResourceResolver) method, or null if that method has never been called since this SchemaFactory has created.
trans-unit.target: 此方法返回通过 setResourceResolver(LSResourceResolver) 方法最后设置的对象；如果自创建此 SchemaFactory 以来从未调用过该方法，则返回null 。

trans-unit.source: This method returns the object that was last set through the setResourceResolver(LSResourceResolver) method, or null if that method has never been called since this Validator has created.
trans-unit.target: 此方法返回通过 setResourceResolver(LSResourceResolver) 方法最后设置的对象；如果自创建此 Validator 以来从未调用过该方法，则返回null 。

trans-unit.source: This method returns the object that was last set through the setResourceResolver(LSResourceResolver) method, or null if that method has never been called since this ValidatorHandler has created.
trans-unit.target: 此方法返回通过 setResourceResolver(LSResourceResolver) 方法最后设置的对象；如果自创建此 ValidatorHandler 以来从未调用过该方法，则返回null 。

trans-unit.source: This method returns the primitive int value for the day-of-month.
trans-unit.target: 此方法返回月份中的原始 int 值。

trans-unit.source: This method returns the primitive int value for the day-of-year.
trans-unit.target: 此方法返回年份的原始 int 值。

trans-unit.source: This method returns the primitive int value for the year.
trans-unit.target: 此方法返回年份的原始 int 值。

trans-unit.source: This method returns the range of the field in the ISO-8601 calendar system. This range may be incorrect for other calendar systems. Use Chronology.range(ChronoField) to access the correct range for a different calendar system.
trans-unit.target: 此方法返回ISO-8601日历系统中的字段范围。对于其他日历系统，此范围可能不正确。使用 Chronology.range(ChronoField) 访问不同日历系统的正确范围。

trans-unit.source: This method returns the range of the field in the ISO-8601 calendar system. This range may be incorrect for other calendar systems. Use Chronology.range(ChronoField) to access the correct range for a different calendar system.
trans-unit.target: 此方法返回ISO-8601日历系统中的字段范围。对于其他日历系统，此范围可能不正确。使用 Chronology.range(ChronoField) 访问不同日历系统的正确范围。

trans-unit.source: This method returns the result of in.available().
trans-unit.target: 此方法返回的结果 in .available（）。

trans-unit.source: This method returns the result of in.available().
trans-unit.target: 此方法返回的结果 in .available（）。

trans-unit.source: This method returns the root of the schema information tree that is applicable to the named object. Several named objects (or even an entire directory) might share the same schema.
trans-unit.target: 本方法返回适用于命名对象的模式信息树的根。多个命名对象(甚至整个目录)可能共享同一个模式。

trans-unit.source: This method returns the same result as the two-argument versions of setScale, but saves the caller the trouble of specifying a rounding mode in cases where it is irrelevant.
trans-unit.target: 此方法返回与 setScale 的两个参数版本相同的结果，但是避免了调用方在不相关时指定舍入模式的麻烦。

trans-unit.source: This method returns the singleton era of the correct type for the specified era value.
trans-unit.target: 本方法返回指定时代值的正确类型的单人时代。

trans-unit.source: This method returns the source drop actions.
trans-unit.target: 本方法返回源头投放动作。

trans-unit.source: This method returns the string "BIG_ENDIAN" for BIG_ENDIAN and "LITTLE_ENDIAN" for LITTLE_ENDIAN.
trans-unit.target: 该方法返回字符串 "BIG_ENDIAN" 为 BIG_ENDIAN 和 "LITTLE_ENDIAN" 为 LITTLE_ENDIAN 。

trans-unit.source: This method returns the string "BIG_ENDIAN" for BIG_ENDIAN and "LITTLE_ENDIAN" for LITTLE_ENDIAN.
trans-unit.target: 该方法返回字符串 "BIG_ENDIAN" 为 BIG_ENDIAN 和 "LITTLE_ENDIAN" 为 LITTLE_ENDIAN 。

trans-unit.source: This method returns the sum of the number of bytes remaining to be read in the buffer (count - pos) and the result of calling the in.available().
trans-unit.target: 此方法返回剩余在缓冲（要读取的字节的数目的总和 count - pos ）并调用的结果 in ）.available（。

trans-unit.source: This method returns the system properties in the target virtual machine. Properties whose key or value is not a String are omitted. The method is approximately equivalent to the invocation of the method System.getProperties in the target virtual machine except that properties with a key or value that is not a String are not included.
trans-unit.target: 此方法返回目标虚拟机中的系统属性。键或值不是 String 的属性将被省略。该方法与在目标虚拟机中调用 System.getProperties 大致等效，所不同的是，不包括键或值不是 String 的属性。

trans-unit.source: This method returns the target drop action.
trans-unit.target: 本方法返回目标投放动作。

trans-unit.source: This method returns the user drop action.
trans-unit.target: 本方法返回用户的放弃操作。

trans-unit.source: This method returns the vertical coordinate of the cursor location in screen coordinates at the moment this event occurred, or zero if the cursor location is not specified for this event.
trans-unit.target: 该方法以屏幕坐标返回该事件发生时光标位置的垂直坐标,如果没有为该事件指定光标位置,则返回零。

trans-unit.source: This method returns true if this DelegationPermission is equal to p, and returns false otherwise.
trans-unit.target: 如果此 DelegationPermission 等于 p ，则此方法返回true ，否则返回false。

trans-unit.source: This method returns true if:
trans-unit.target: 在以下情况下,本方法返回true:

trans-unit.source: This method returns whether or not the Caret is currently in a blinking state. It does not provide information as to whether it is currently blinked on or off. To determine if the caret is currently painted use the isVisible method.
trans-unit.target: 此方法返回 Caret 当前是否处于闪烁状态。它不提供有关当前是否闪烁的信息。要确定插入符当前是否已绘制，请使用 isVisible 方法。

trans-unit.source: This method runs in linear time.
trans-unit.target: 这种方法以线性时间运行。

trans-unit.source: This method runs in linear time. If the specified list does not implement the RandomAccess interface and is large, this implementation dumps the specified list into an array before shuffling it, and dumps the shuffled array back into the list. This avoids the quadratic behavior that would result from shuffling a "sequential access" list in place.
trans-unit.target: 此方法以线性时间运行。如果指定的列表未实现 RandomAccess 接口且很大，则此实现将指定的列表转储到数组中，然后再将其重新排序，然后将经过改组的数组转储回列表中。这避免了因将“顺序访问”列表改组到位而导致的二次行为。

trans-unit.source: This method runs in log(n) time for a "random access" list (which provides near-constant-time positional access). If the specified list does not implement the RandomAccess interface and is large, this method will do an iterator-based binary search that performs O(n) link traversals and O(log n) element comparisons.
trans-unit.target: 此方法在log（n）时间中运行以获取“随机访问”列表（该列表提供了近恒定时间的位置访问）。如果指定的列表没有实现 RandomAccess 接口并且很大，则此方法将执行基于迭代器的二进制搜索，该搜索执行O（n）链接遍历和O（log n）元素比较。

trans-unit.source: This method satisfies the general contract of Object.equals(Object)
trans-unit.target: 此方法满足 Object.equals(Object) 的常规协定
