trans-unit.source: This method searches through the input up to the specified search horizon, ignoring delimiters. If the pattern is found the scanner advances past the input that matched and returns the string that matched the pattern. If no such pattern is detected then the null is returned and the scanner's position remains unchanged. This method may block waiting for input that matches the pattern.
trans-unit.target: 本方法在指定的搜索范围内搜索输入,忽略定界符。如果找到了模式,扫描器就会前进到与之匹配的输入,并返回与模式匹配的字符串。如果没有检测到这样的模式,则返回null,扫描器的位置保持不变。这个方法可能会阻止等待匹配模式的输入。

trans-unit.source: This method sets all of the model's data with a single method call.
trans-unit.target: 该方法通过一个方法调用来设置模型的所有数据。

trans-unit.source: This method sets all of the model's data with a single method call. The method results in a single change event being generated. This is convenient when you need to adjust all the model data simultaneously and do not want individual change events to occur.
trans-unit.target: 该方法通过一个方法调用设置模型的所有数据。该方法的结果是生成一个变化事件。当您需要同时调整所有的模型数据,并且不希望发生单个变化事件时,这很方便。

trans-unit.source: This method sets the component's state such that the double buffer will not be used: painting will be done directly on the passed in Graphics.
trans-unit.target: 此方法设置组件的状态，以便不使用双缓冲区：绘画将直接在传入的 Graphics 中完成。

trans-unit.source: This method sets the current actions acceptable to this DropTarget.
trans-unit.target: 此方法设置此 DropTarget 可接受的当前操作。

trans-unit.source: This method sets the major tick spacing.
trans-unit.target: 此方法设置主要的刻度线间距。

trans-unit.source: This method sets the major tick spacing. The number that is passed in represents the distance, measured in values, between each major tick mark. If you have a slider with a range from 0 to 50 and the major tick spacing is set to 10, you will get major ticks next to the following values: 0, 10, 20, 30, 40, 50.
trans-unit.target: 此方法设置主要的刻度线间距。传入的数字代表每个主要刻度线之间的距离,以数值衡量。如果您有一个范围为0到50的滑块,并且主要刻度线间距设置为10,您将在以下数值旁边得到主要刻度线。0,10,20,30,40,50.

trans-unit.source: This method sets the minor tick spacing.
trans-unit.target: 此方法设置小刻度线的间距。

trans-unit.source: This method sets the minor tick spacing. The number that is passed in represents the distance, measured in values, between each minor tick mark. If you have a slider with a range from 0 to 50 and the minor tick spacing is set to 10, you will get minor ticks next to the following values: 0, 10, 20, 30, 40, 50.
trans-unit.target: 此方法设置小刻度线的间距。传入的数字代表每个小刻度线之间的距离,以数值衡量。如果您的滑块范围为0到50,并且小刻度间距设置为10,那么您将在以下数值旁边得到小刻度。0,10,20,30,40,50.

trans-unit.source: This method sets the permitted source drag action(s) for this Drag and Drop operation.
trans-unit.target: 此方法为此拖放操作设置允许的源拖动操作。

trans-unit.source: This method sets the specified sharding key but does not require a round trip to the database to validate that the sharding key is valid for the Connection.
trans-unit.target: 此方法设置指定的分片密钥，但不需要往返数据库即可验证该分片密钥对 Connection 有效。

trans-unit.source: This method sets the specified sharding keys but does not require a round trip to the database to validate that the sharding keys are valid for the Connection.
trans-unit.target: 此方法设置指定的分片密钥，但不需要往返数据库即可验证分片密钥对 Connection 是否有效。

trans-unit.source: This method sets the start and end positions of the selected text, enforcing the restriction that the start position must be greater than or equal to zero. The end position must be greater than or equal to the start position, and less than or equal to the length of the text component's text.
trans-unit.target: 此方法设置所选文本的起始和结束位置,强制执行起始位置必须大于或等于零的限制。结束位置必须大于或等于起始位置,并小于或等于文本组件的文本长度。

trans-unit.source: This method sets the start and end positions of the selected text, enforcing the restriction that the start position must be greater than or equal to zero. The end position must be greater than or equal to the start position, and less than or equal to the length of the text component's text. The character positions are indexed starting with zero. The length of the selection is endPosition - startPosition, so the character at endPosition is not selected. If the start and end positions of the selected text are equal, all text is deselected.
trans-unit.target: 此方法设置所选文本的开始和结束位置，从而限制了开始位置必须大于或等于零的限制。结束位置必须大于或等于开始位置，并且小于或等于文本组件文本的长度。字符位置从零开始索引。选择的长度为 endPosition - startPosition ，因此未选择 endPosition 处的字符。如果所选文本的开始位置和结束位置相等，则取消选择所有文本。

trans-unit.source: This method sets the state for the supplementary information flags and the minor status in MessageProp.
trans-unit.target: 该方法设置MessageProp中补充信息标志和小状态的状态。

trans-unit.source: This method sets the state for the supplementary information flags and the minor status in MessageProp. It is not used by the application but by the GSS implementation to return this information to the caller of a per-message context method.
trans-unit.target: 该方法为MessageProp中的补充信息标志和次要状态设置状态,它不被应用程序使用,而是由GSS实现将这些信息返回给每个消息上下文方法的调用者。

trans-unit.source: This method sets this column's width to width. If width exceeds the minimum or maximum width, it is adjusted to the appropriate limiting value.
trans-unit.target: 此方法将此列的width设置为 width 。如果 width 超过最小或最大宽度，则将其调整为适当的极限值。

trans-unit.source: This method sets this context's connCtls to be its new connection request controls. This context's context request controls are not affected. After this method has been invoked, any subsequent implicit reconnections will be done using connCtls. connCtls are also used as connection request controls for new context instances derived from this context. These connection request controls are not affected by setRequestControls().
trans-unit.target: 此方法将此上下文的 connCtls 设置为其新的连接请求控件。此上下文的上下文请求控件不受影响。调用此方法后，将使用 connCtls 完成任何后续的隐式重新连接。 connCtls 也用作从该上下文派生的新上下文实例的连接请求控件。这些连接请求控件不受 setRequestControls() 的影响。

trans-unit.source: This method should NOT be called by user code.
trans-unit.target: 此方法应该不是由用户代码调用。

trans-unit.source: This method should NOT be called by user code. This method is public for this class to properly implement Adjustable interface.
trans-unit.target: 此方法应该不是由用户代码调用。此方法是公共的，此类可以正确实现 Adjustable 接口。

trans-unit.source: This method should be called by TLS server applications before the TLS handshake begins. Also, this SSLEngine should be configured with parameters that are compatible with the application protocol selected by the callback function. For example, enabling a poor choice of cipher suites could result in no suitable application protocol. See SSLParameters.
trans-unit.target: TLS握手开始之前，TLS服务器应用程序应调用此方法。另外，应使用与回调函数选择的应用程序协议兼容的参数来配置此 SSLEngine 。例如，启用错误的密码套件选择可能会导致没有合适的应用程序协议。请参阅 SSLParameters 。

trans-unit.source: This method should be called by TLS server applications before the TLS handshake begins. Also, this SSLSocket should be configured with parameters that are compatible with the application protocol selected by the callback function. For example, enabling a poor choice of cipher suites could result in no suitable application protocol. See SSLParameters.
trans-unit.target: TLS握手开始之前，TLS服务器应用程序应调用此方法。另外，此 SSLSocket 应该配置有与回调函数选择的应用程序协议兼容的参数。例如，启用错误的密码套件选择可能会导致没有合适的应用程序协议。请参阅 SSLParameters 。

trans-unit.source: This method should be called during construction or initialization of this instance, and before the MBean is registered with the MBeanServer.
trans-unit.target: 这个方法应该在这个实例的构造或初始化过程中,在MBean向MBeanServer注册之前被调用。

trans-unit.source: This method should be called immediately after the MemoryImageSource is constructed and before an image is created with it to ensure that all ImageConsumers will receive the correct multi-frame data. If an ImageConsumer is added to this ImageProducer before this flag is set then that ImageConsumer will see only a snapshot of the pixel data that was available when it connected.
trans-unit.target: 这个方法应该在MemoryImageSource被构造后和用它创建图像之前立即被调用,以确保所有ImageConsumers将收到正确的多帧数据。如果一个ImageConsumer在这个标志设置之前被添加到这个ImageProducer中,那么这个ImageConsumer将只能看到它连接时可用的像素数据的快照。

trans-unit.source: This method should be called immediately after the MemoryImageSource is constructed and before an image is created with it to ensure that all ImageConsumers will receive the correct pixel delivery hints.
trans-unit.target: 这个方法应该在MemoryImageSource被构造后和用它创建图像之前立即被调用,以确保所有ImageConsumers将收到正确的像素交付提示。

trans-unit.source: This method should be called when a caller frame is present. If it is called from the bottom most frame on the stack, IllegalCallerException will be thrown.
trans-unit.target: 存在呼叫者框架时应调用此方法。如果从堆栈最底部的帧调用它，则将抛出 IllegalCallerException 。

trans-unit.source: This method should be implemented consistently with equals(Object).
trans-unit.target: 此方法应与 equals(Object) 一致地实现。

trans-unit.target: 该方法应与串联调用 begin 方法，使用 try ... finally 块，如图以上，为了实现此通道异步关闭和中断。

trans-unit.source: This method should be overridden by subclasses.
trans-unit.target: 这个方法应该被子类重写。

trans-unit.source: This method should be overridden when the spliterator() method cannot return a spliterator that is IMMUTABLE, CONCURRENT, or late-binding. (See spliterator() for details.)
trans-unit.target: 当 spliterator() 方法无法返回 IMMUTABLE ， CONCURRENT 或late-binding的拆分器时，应重写此方法。（有关详细信息，请参见 spliterator() 。）

trans-unit.source: This method should be overridden when the spliterator() method cannot return a spliterator that is IMMUTABLE, CONCURRENT, or late-binding. (See spliterator() for details.)
trans-unit.target: 当 spliterator() 方法无法返回 IMMUTABLE ， CONCURRENT 或late-binding的拆分器时，应重写此方法。（有关详细信息，请参见 spliterator() 。）

trans-unit.source: This method should be used instead of the other two overloaded forms when the caller needs to supply request controls for creating the referral context. It might need to do this, for example, when it needs to supply special controls relating to authentication.
trans-unit.target: 当调用者需要提供创建引用上下文的请求控制时,应该使用这个方法而不是其他两个重载形式。例如,当它需要提供与认证有关的特殊控制时,它可能需要这样做。

trans-unit.source: This method should be used only when auto-commit has been disabled.
trans-unit.target: 此方法只能在禁用自动提交时使用。

trans-unit.source: This method should be used only when the given RowSet object already has a match column that was set with the Joinable method setMatchColumn.
trans-unit.target: 应该使用此方法仅当给定 RowSet 对象已经有一个设置与匹配列 Joinable 的方法 setMatchColumn 。

trans-unit.source: This method should be used sparingly, as it alters the pattern of garbage collection in the target VM and, consequently, may result in application behavior under the debugger that differs from its non-debugged behavior.
trans-unit.target: 此方法应尽量少用,因为它改变了目标虚拟机中的垃圾收集模式,因此,可能会导致调试器下的应用程序行为与其非调试行为不同。

trans-unit.source: This method should be used when
trans-unit.target: 此方法应在以下情况下使用

trans-unit.source: This method should be used when Statement.executeLargeBatch is invoked and the returned update count may exceed Integer.MAX_VALUE.
trans-unit.target: 当调用 Statement.executeLargeBatch 且返回的更新计数可能超过 Integer.MAX_VALUE 时，应使用此方法。

trans-unit.source: This method should be used when an SQL structured type has been mapped to a Struct object in the Java programming language (the standard mapping). The method writeObject should be used if an SQL structured type has been custom mapped to a class in the Java programming language.
trans-unit.target: 当将SQL结构化类型以Java编程语言（标准映射）映射到 Struct 对象时，应使用此方法。如果已将SQL结构化类型自定义映射到Java编程语言中的类，则应使用 writeObject 方法。

trans-unit.source: This method should be used when the given RowSet object does not already have a match column.
trans-unit.target: 当给定的 RowSet 对象还没有匹配列时，应使用此方法。

trans-unit.source: This method should be used when the given RowSet object(s) does not already have a match column.
trans-unit.target: 当给定的 RowSet 对象尚未具有匹配列时，应使用此方法。

trans-unit.source: This method should be used when the returned row count may exceed Integer.MAX_VALUE.
trans-unit.target: 当返回的行数可能超过 Integer.MAX_VALUE 时，应使用此方法。

trans-unit.source: This method should be used when the returned row limit may exceed Integer.MAX_VALUE.
trans-unit.target: 当返回的行限制可能超过 Integer.MAX_VALUE 时，应使用此方法。

trans-unit.source: This method should be used when the row limit may exceed Integer.MAX_VALUE.
trans-unit.target: 当行数限制可能超过 Integer.MAX_VALUE 时，应使用此方法。

trans-unit.source: This method should be used with extreme caution. Unlike the exit method, this method does not cause shutdown hooks to be started. If the shutdown sequence has already been initiated then this method does not wait for any running shutdown hooks to finish their work.
trans-unit.target: 使用此方法时应格外小心。与 exit 方法不同，此方法不会导致启动关闭挂钩。如果关闭序列已经启动，则此方法不会等待任何正在运行的关闭钩子完成其工作。

trans-unit.source: This method should be used with extreme caution. Unlike the exit method, this method does not cause shutdown hooks to be started and does not run uninvoked finalizers if finalization-on-exit has been enabled. If the shutdown sequence has already been initiated then this method does not wait for any running shutdown hooks or finalizers to finish their work.
trans-unit.target: 使用此方法时应格外小心。与 exit 方法不同，此方法不会导致启动关闭挂钩，并且如果启用了退出时终结处理，则不会运行未调用的终结器。如果关闭序列已经启动，则此方法不会等待任何正在运行的关闭挂钩或终结器完成其工作。

trans-unit.source: This method should have no side effects, because the caller might cache values. This method should never return null or throw an exception. If a value is not valid for this setting control, the value should be ignored.
trans-unit.target: 此方法应该没有副作用，因为调用者可能会缓存值。此方法永远不要返回 null 或引发异常。如果该设置控件的值无效，则应忽略该值。

trans-unit.source: This method should normally only be called by the scanner's visit methods, as part of an ongoing scan initiated by scan(TreePath, P). The one exception is that it may also be called to initiate a full scan of a CompilationUnitTree.
trans-unit.target: 通常，此方法仅应由扫描程序的 visit 方法调用，这是由 scan(TreePath, P) 发起的正在进行的扫描的一部分。一个例外是也可以调用它来启动 CompilationUnitTree 的完整扫描。

trans-unit.source: This method should not be used to set the widths of columns in the JTable, use setPreferredWidth instead.
trans-unit.target: 不应使用此方法设置 JTable 中列的宽度，而应使用 setPreferredWidth 。

trans-unit.source: This method should not be used to set the widths of columns in the JTable, use setPreferredWidth instead. Like a layout manager in the AWT, the JTable adjusts a column's width automatically whenever the table itself changes size, or a column's preferred width is changed. Setting widths programmatically therefore has no long term effect.
trans-unit.target: 不应使用此方法设置 JTable 中列的宽度，而应使用 setPreferredWidth 。就像AWT中的布局管理器一样，只要表本身更改大小或更改了列的首选宽度， JTable 都会自动调整列的宽度。因此，以编程方式设置宽度不会产生长期影响。

trans-unit.source: This method should only be called by a thread that is the owner of this object's monitor. A thread becomes the owner of the object's monitor in one of three ways:
trans-unit.target: 这个方法只能由一个是这个对象的监视器的所有者的线程调用。一个线程通过三种方式之一成为对象的监视器的所有者。

trans-unit.source: This method should only be called by a thread that is the owner of this object's monitor. See the notify method for a description of the ways in which a thread can become the owner of a monitor.
trans-unit.target: 此方法只能由作为该对象的监视器的所有者的线程调用。有关线程可以成为监视器所有者的方式的描述，请参见 notify 方法。

trans-unit.source: This method should only be called by the ChildLocator, it is simply a convenient place to hold the cached location.
trans-unit.target: 这个方法只应该被ChildLocator调用,它只是一个方便存放缓存位置的地方。

trans-unit.source: This method should only be invoked within the context of initializing a persistence delegate or setting up an encoder to read from a resource bundle.
trans-unit.target: 该方法只能在初始化持久化委托或设置编码器以从资源包中读取的上下文中调用。

trans-unit.source: This method should only be invoked within the context of initializing a persistence delegate.
trans-unit.target: 这个方法只能在初始化持久化委托的上下文中被调用。

trans-unit.source: This method should only be used internally by GridBagLayout.
trans-unit.target: 此方法只能由 GridBagLayout 内部使用。

trans-unit.source: This method should return an array containing the sub-elements for the receiving menu element.
trans-unit.target: 这个方法应该返回一个包含接收菜单元素的子元素的数组。

trans-unit.source: This method should return as soon as possible, to avoid blocking initialization of Flight Recorder. To avoid deadlocks or unexpected behavior, this method should not call FlightRecorder.getFlightRecorder() or start new recordings.
trans-unit.target: 该方法应尽快返回，以避免阻止Flight Recorder的初始化。为避免死锁或意外行为，此方法不应调用 FlightRecorder.getFlightRecorder() 或开始新的记录。

trans-unit.source: This method should return the java.awt.Component used to paint the receiving element.
trans-unit.target: 此方法应返回用于绘制接收元素的 java.awt.Component 。

trans-unit.source: This method should return the java.awt.Component used to paint the receiving element. The returned component will be used to convert events and detect if an event is inside a MenuElement's component.
trans-unit.target: 此方法应返回用于绘制接收元素的 java.awt.Component 。返回的组件将用于转换事件并检测事件是否在 MenuElement 的组件内。

trans-unit.source: This method should return true if further updates are needed or false if the required information has been acquired. The image which was being tracked is passed in using the img argument. Various constants are combined to form the infoflags argument which indicates what information about the image is now available. The interpretation of the x, y, width, and height arguments depends on the contents of the infoflags argument.
trans-unit.target: 如果需要进一步的更新,本方法应返回true;如果已经获得所需信息,则返回false。使用img参数传递被跟踪的图像。各种常量组合在一起形成 infoflags 参数,该参数表示现在可以获得图像的哪些信息。x、y、width和height参数的解释取决于infoflags参数的内容。

trans-unit.source: This method signals that the drop is completed and if it was successful or not.

trans-unit.target: 此方法发出拖动会话结束的信号。

trans-unit.target: 此方法表示拖动会话结束。DesktopManager维护的任何状态都可以在此处删除。通常，f将是JInternalFrame。

trans-unit.source: This method signals the end of the resize session.
trans-unit.target: 本方法发出调整大小会话结束的信号。

trans-unit.target: 此方法表示调整大小会话已结束。DesktopManager维护的任何状态都可以在此处删除。通常，f将是JInternalFrame。

trans-unit.source: This method simply informs the group's monitor that the object is inactive. It is up to the concrete subclass of ActivationGroup to fulfill the additional requirement of unexporting the object.

trans-unit.target: 此方法仅从 getPreferredSize 返回值。期望列表的 ListUI 覆盖 getPreferredSize 以返回适当的值。

trans-unit.source: This method simultaneously and synchronously sets the values of four scroll bar properties, assuring that the values of these properties are mutually consistent. It enforces the following constraints: maximum must be greater than minimum, maximum - minimum must not be greater than Integer.MAX_VALUE, visibleAmount must be greater than zero. visibleAmount must not be greater than maximum - minimum, value must not be less than minimum, and value must not be greater than maximum - visibleAmount
trans-unit.target: 此方法同时并同步设置四个滚动条属性的值，以确保这些属性的值相互一致。它强制执行以下约束： maximum 必须大于 minimum ， maximum - minimum 不得大于 Integer.MAX_VALUE ， visibleAmount 必须大于零。 visibleAmount 不得大于 maximum - minimum minimal， value 不得小于 minimum ，并且 value 不得大于 maximum - visibleAmount

trans-unit.source: This method starts at the beginning of this matcher's region, or, if a previous invocation of the method was successful and the matcher has not since been reset, at the first character not matched by the previous match.
trans-unit.target: 这个方法从这个匹配器区域的开头开始,或者,如果之前的方法调用成功,并且匹配器此后没有被重置,则从之前匹配的第一个未匹配的字符开始。

trans-unit.source: This method starts the transport service listening on the specified address so that it can subsequently accept an inbound connection. It does not wait until an inbound connection is established.
trans-unit.target: 此方法启动传输服务监听指定地址,以便随后接受入站连接。在建立入站连接之前,它不会等待。

trans-unit.source: This method subtracts the specified amount from the days field decrementing the month and year fields as necessary to ensure the result remains valid. The result is only invalid if the maximum/minimum year is exceeded.
trans-unit.target: 此方法从天数字段中减去指定的金额,并根据需要递减月份和年份字段,以确保结果仍然有效。只有在超过最大/最小年份的情况下,结果才是无效的。

trans-unit.source: This method subtracts the specified amount from the months field in three steps:
trans-unit.target: 此方法分三步从月字段中减去指定的金额。

trans-unit.source: This method subtracts the specified amount from the years field in three steps:
trans-unit.target: 本方法分三步从年限栏中减去指定的金额。

trans-unit.source: This method subtracts the specified amount in weeks from the days field decrementing the month and year fields as necessary to ensure the result remains valid. The result is only invalid if the maximum/minimum year is exceeded.
trans-unit.target: 此方法从天数字段中减去指定的周数,并根据需要递减月份和年份字段,以确保结果有效。只有在超过最大/最小年份的情况下,结果才是无效的。

trans-unit.source: This method supports a special technique of parsing known as 'adjacent value parsing'. This technique solves the problem where a value, variable or fixed width, is followed by one or more fixed length values. The standard parser is greedy, and thus it would normally steal the digits that are needed by the fixed width value parsers that follow the variable width one.
trans-unit.target: 这种方法支持一种特殊的解析技术,称为 "相邻值解析"。这种技术解决了一个值,不管是可变的还是固定宽度的,后面都有一个或多个固定长度的值。标准解析器是贪婪的,因此它通常会窃取固定宽度值解析器所需要的数字,而这些数字是跟随可变宽度值的。

trans-unit.source: This method supports chaining of either Renderable or RenderedImage operations. If sources in the ParameterBlock used to construct the RenderableImageOp are RenderableImages, then a three step process is followed:
trans-unit.target: 该方法支持Renderable或RenderedImage操作的连锁。如果用于构造RenderableImageOp的ParameterBlock中的源是RenderableImages,那么将遵循三个步骤。

trans-unit.source: This method supports post-processing on Optional values, without the need to explicitly check for a return status. trans-unit.source: This method supports post-processing on optional values, without the need to explicitly check for a return status. trans-unit.source: This method supports three Type/format combinations:
trans-unit.target: 此方法支持三种类型/格式组合。

trans-unit.source: This method swaps the sign of the total length of this duration. For example, PT1.3S will be returned as PT-1.3S.
trans-unit.target: 此方法交换此持续时间总长度的符号。例如， PT1.3S 将返回为 PT-1.3S 。

trans-unit.source: This method synchronizes on this, the current object, but not StringBuffer another with which this StringBuffer is compared.
trans-unit.target: 此方法在 this 对象（当前对象）上同步，但在 StringBuffer another 与 this StringBuffer 进行比较的另一个对象不同步。

trans-unit.source: This method synchronizes on this, the destination object, but does not synchronize on the source (s).
trans-unit.target: 此方法在 this （目标对象）上同步，但不在源（一个或 s ）上同步。

trans-unit.source: This method synchronizes on this, the destination object, but does not synchronize on the source (sb).
trans-unit.target: 此方法在 this （目标对象）上同步，但不在源（ sb ）上同步。

trans-unit.source: This method takes a "snapshot" of the current calling context, which includes the current Thread's inherited AccessControlContext and any limited privilege scope, and places it in an AccessControlContext object.
trans-unit.target: 该方法获取当前调用上下文的 "快照",其中包括当前线程继承的AccessControlContext和任何有限权限范围,并将其放置在AccessControlContext对象中。

trans-unit.source: This method takes a "snapshot" of the current calling context, which includes the current Thread's inherited AccessControlContext and any limited privilege scope, and places it in an AccessControlContext object. This context may then be checked at a later point, possibly in another thread.
trans-unit.target: 该方法获取当前调用上下文的 "快照",其中包括当前线程继承的 AccessControlContext 和任何有限的权限范围,并将其放入 AccessControlContext 对象中。然后,这个上下文可以在以后的时间点,可能在另一个线程中进行检查。

trans-unit.source: This method takes a Function accepting a Stream<StackFrame>, rather than returning a Stream<StackFrame> and allowing the caller to directly manipulate the stream. The Java virtual machine is free to reorganize a thread's control stack, for example, via deoptimization. By taking a Function parameter, this method allows access to stack frames through a stable view of a thread's control stack.
trans-unit.target: 此方法采用接受 Stream<StackFrame> 的 Function ，而不是返回 Stream<StackFrame> 并允许调用方直接操作该流。 Java虚拟机可以自由地重组线程的控制堆栈，例如通过取消优化。通过使用 Function 参数，此方法允许通过线程的控制堆栈的稳定视图访问堆栈帧。

trans-unit.source: This method takes no arguments, and opens the line with the current settings. For SourceDataLine and TargetDataLine objects, this means that the line is opened with default settings. For a Clip, however, the buffer size is determined when data is loaded. Since this method does not allow the application to specify any data to load, an IllegalArgumentException is thrown. Therefore, you should instead use one of the open methods provided in the Clip interface to load data into the Clip.
trans-unit.target: 此方法不带任何参数，并使用当前设置打开该行。对于 SourceDataLine 和 TargetDataLine 对象，这意味着将使用默认设置打开该行。但是，对于 Clip 而言，缓冲区大小是在加载数据时确定的。由于此方法不允许应用程序指定要加载的任何数据，因此将 IllegalArgumentException 。因此，您应该改用 Clip 界面中提供的 open 方法之一将数据加载到 Clip 中。

trans-unit.source: This method takes no arguments, and opens the line with the current settings. For SourceDataLine and TargetDataLine objects, this means that the line is opened with default settings. For a Clip, however, the buffer size is determined when data is loaded. Since this method does not allow the application to specify any data to load, an IllegalArgumentException is thrown. Therefore, you should instead use one of the open methods provided in the Clip interface to load data into the Clip.
trans-unit.target: 此方法不带任何参数，并使用当前设置打开该行。对于 SourceDataLine 和 TargetDataLine 对象，这意味着将使用默认设置打开该行。但是，对于 Clip 而言，缓冲区大小是在加载数据时确定的。由于此方法不允许应用程序指定要加载的任何数据，因此将抛出IllegalArgumentException。因此，您应该改用 Clip 界面中提供的 open 方法之一将数据加载到 Clip 中。

trans-unit.source: This method tests for equality of nodes, not sameness (i.e., whether the two nodes are references to the same object) which can be tested with Node.isSameNode(). All nodes that are the same will also be equal, though the reverse may not be true.
trans-unit.target: 此方法测试是否可以使用 Node.isSameNode() 进行测试的节点是否相等，而不是相同（即，两个节点是否是对同一对象的引用）。所有相同的节点也将相等，尽管相反的情况可能并非如此。

trans-unit.source: This method then calls the interrupt method on all the threads in this thread group and in all of its subgroups.
trans-unit.target: 然后，此方法在该线程组及其所有子组中的所有线程上调用 interrupt 方法。

trans-unit.source: This method then calls the resume method on all the threads in this thread group and in all of its sub groups.
trans-unit.target: 然后，此方法在此线程组及其所有子组中的所有线程上调用 resume 方法。

trans-unit.source: This method then calls the stop method on all the threads in this thread group and in all of its subgroups.
trans-unit.target: 然后，此方法在此线程组及其所有子组中的所有线程上调用 stop 方法。

trans-unit.source: This method then calls the suspend method on all the threads in this thread group and in all of its subgroups.
trans-unit.target: 然后，此方法在此线程组及其所有子组中的所有线程上调用 suspend 方法。

trans-unit.source: This method throws UnsupportedOperationException by default.
trans-unit.target: 默认情况下，此方法引发 UnsupportedOperationException 。

trans-unit.source: This method throws FileSystemAlreadyExistsException if the file system already exists because it was previously created by an invocation of this method. Once a file system is closed it is provider-dependent if the provider allows a new file system to be created with the same URI as a file system it previously created.
trans-unit.target: 如果文件系统已经存在，则此方法将引发 FileSystemAlreadyExistsException ,因为该文件系统先前是通过调用此方法创建的。文件系统一旦 closed ，提供者是否允许使用与先前创建的文件系统相同的URI来创建新文件系统，则取决于提供者。

trans-unit.source: This method throws FileSystemAlreadyExistsException if the file system already exists because it was previously created by an invocation of this method. Once a file system is closed it is provider-dependent if the provider allows a new file system to be created with the same URI as a file system it previously created.
trans-unit.target: 如果文件系统已经存在，因为该文件系统先前是通过调用此方法创建的，则此方法将引发 FileSystemAlreadyExistsException 。 closed 文件系统后，如果提供者允许使用与先前创建的文件系统相同的URI创建新文件系统，则该过程取决于提供者。

trans-unit.source: This method throws InvalidPathException when the path string cannot be converted to a path. Where possible, and where applicable, the exception is created with an index value indicating the first position in the path parameter that caused the path string to be rejected.
trans-unit.target: 当路径字符串无法转换为路径时，此方法将引发 InvalidPathException 。在可能的情况下（如果适用），使用 index 值创建异常，该索引值指示导致路径字符串被拒绝的 path 参数中的第一个位置。

trans-unit.source: This method throws InvalidPathException when the path string cannot be converted to a path. Where possible, and where applicable, the exception is created with an index value indicating the first position in the path parameter that caused the path string to be rejected.
trans-unit.target: 当路径字符串无法转换为路径时，此方法将引发 InvalidPathException 。在可能的情况下（如果适用），使用 index 值创建异常，该索引值指示导致路径字符串被拒绝的 path 参数中的第一个位置。

trans-unit.source: This method throws UnsupportedOperationException if the default SelectorProvider is not the JDK built-in implementation.

trans-unit.source: This method transfers bytes from this buffer into the given destination array. If there are fewer bytes remaining in the buffer than are required to satisfy the request, that is, if length>remaining(), then no bytes are transferred and a BufferUnderflowException is thrown.
trans-unit.target: 此方法将字节从此缓冲区传输到给定的目标数组。如果缓冲区中剩余的字节数少于满足请求所需的字节数，即，如果 length > BufferUnderflowException remaining() ，则不传输任何字节，并抛出BufferUnderflowException。

trans-unit.source: This method transfers bytes into this buffer from the given source array. If there are more bytes to be copied from the array than remain in this buffer, that is, if length>remaining(), then no bytes are transferred and a BufferOverflowException is thrown.

trans-unit.source: This method transfers the floats remaining in the given source buffer into this buffer. If there are more floats remaining in the source buffer than in this buffer, that is, if src.remaining()>remaining(), then no floats are transferred and a BufferOverflowException is thrown.
trans-unit.target: 此方法将给定源缓冲区中剩余的浮点数转移到此缓冲区中。如果源缓冲区中剩余的浮点数多于此缓冲区中的浮点数，即 src.remaining() > remaining() ，则不传输任何浮点数，并抛出 BufferOverflowException 。

trans-unit.source: This method transfers the ints remaining in the given source buffer into this buffer. If there are more ints remaining in the source buffer than in this buffer, that is, if src.remaining()>remaining(), then no ints are transferred and a BufferOverflowException is thrown.
trans-unit.target: 此方法将给定源缓冲区中剩余的整数传输到此缓冲区中。如果源缓冲区中剩余的整数多于此缓冲区中的整数，也就是说，如果 src.remaining() > missing remaining() ，则不会传输任何整数，并且会抛出 BufferOverflowException 。

trans-unit.source: This method transfers the longs remaining in the given source buffer into this buffer. If there are more longs remaining in the source buffer than in this buffer, that is, if src.remaining()>remaining(), then no longs are transferred and a BufferOverflowException is thrown.
trans-unit.target: 此方法将给定源缓冲区中剩余的长型转移到该缓冲区中。如果源缓冲区中的剩余长度比该缓冲区中的剩余长度多，也就是说，如果 src.remaining() > remaining() ，则不会传输任何长度，并且会抛出 BufferOverflowException 。

trans-unit.source: This method transfers the shorts remaining in the given source buffer into this buffer. If there are more shorts remaining in the source buffer than in this buffer, that is, if src.remaining()>remaining(), then no shorts are transferred and a BufferOverflowException is thrown.
trans-unit.target: 此方法将给定源缓冲区中剩余的短路转移到该缓冲区中。如果源缓冲区中剩余的短裤要多于此缓冲区，也就是说，如果 src.remaining() > remaining() ，则不会传输任何短裤，并且会抛出 BufferOverflowException 。

trans-unit.source: This method transforms color values using algorithms designed to produce the best perceptual match between input and output colors. In order to do colorimetric conversion of color values, you should use the toCIEXYZ method of the CS_sRGB color space to first convert from the input color space to the CS_CIEXYZ color space, and then use the fromCIEXYZ method of this color space to convert from CS_CIEXYZ to the output color space. See toCIEXYZ and fromCIEXYZ for further information.
trans-unit.target: 此方法使用旨在在输入和输出颜色之间产生最佳感知匹配的算法来变换颜色值。为了进行颜色值的比色转换，您应该使用 CS_sRGB 颜色空间的 toCIEXYZ 方法首先从输入颜色空间转换为 CS_CIEXYZ 颜色空间，然后使用此颜色空间的 fromCIEXYZ 方法将 CS_CIEXYZ 转换为输出色彩空间。有关更多信息，请参见 toCIEXYZ 和 fromCIEXYZ 。

trans-unit.source: This method transforms color values using relative colorimetry, as defined by the ICC Specification. This means that the XYZ argument values taken by this method are represented relative to the D50 white point of the CS_CIEXYZ color space. This representation is useful in a two-step color conversion process in which colors are transformed from an input color space to CS_CIEXYZ and then to an output color space. The color values returned by this method are not those that would produce the XYZ value passed to the method when measured by a colorimeter. If you have XYZ values corresponding to measurements made using current CIE recommended practices, they must be converted to D50 relative values before being passed to this method. The paragraphs below explain this in more detail.
trans-unit.target: 此方法使用ICC规范定义的相对色度法转换颜色值。这意味着此方法采用的XYZ自变量值是相对于 CS_CIEXYZ 颜色空间的D50白点表示的。此表示在两步的颜色转换过程中很有用，在该过程中，颜色从输入颜色空间转换为 CS_CIEXYZ ，然后转换为输出颜色空间。用色度计测量时，此方法返回的颜色值不是将产生传递给该方法的XYZ值的颜色值。如果您的XYZ值与使用当前CIE建议的做法进行的测量相对应，则在将其传递给此方法之前，必须将其转换为D50相对值。下面的段落对此进行了更详细的说明。

trans-unit.source: This method transforms color values using relative colorimetry, as defined by the ICC Specification. This means that the XYZ argument values taken by this method are represented relative to the D50 white point of the CS_CIEXYZ color space. This representation is useful in a two-step color conversion process in which colors are transformed from an input color space to CS_CIEXYZ and then to an output color space. The color values returned by this method are not those that would produce the XYZ value passed to the method when measured by a colorimeter. If you have XYZ values corresponding to measurements made using current CIE recommended practices, they must be converted to D50 relative values before being passed to this method. The paragraphs below explain this in more detail.
trans-unit.target: 此方法使用ICC规范所定义的相对色度来转换颜色值。这意味着本方法所取的XYZ参数值是相对于CS_CIEXYZ色彩空间的D50白点来表示的。这种表示方式在两步色彩转换过程中非常有用,在这个过程中,色彩从输入色彩空间转换到CS_CIEXYZ,然后再转换到输出色彩空间。该方法返回的颜色值并不是那些通过色度计测量时产生传递给该方法的XYZ值。如果您的XYZ值对应于使用当前CIE推荐的做法进行的测量,则必须在传递给本方法之前将其转换为D50相对值。下面的段落将更详细地解释这一点。

trans-unit.source: This method transforms color values using relative colorimetry, as defined by the ICC Specification. This means that the XYZ values returned by this method are represented relative to the D50 white point of the CS_CIEXYZ color space. This representation is useful in a two-step color conversion process in which colors are transformed from an input color space to CS_CIEXYZ and then to an output color space. This representation is not the same as the XYZ values that would be measured from the given color value by a colorimeter. A further transformation is necessary to compute the XYZ values that would be measured using current CIE recommended practices. The paragraphs below explain this in more detail.
trans-unit.target: 此方法使用ICC规范定义的相对色度法转换颜色值。这意味着此方法返回的XYZ值是相对于 CS_CIEXYZ 颜色空间的D50白点表示的。此表示在两步的颜色转换过程中很有用，在该过程中，颜色从输入颜色空间转换为 CS_CIEXYZ ，然后转换为输出颜色空间。此表示形式与通过比色计从给定颜色值测量的XYZ值不同。必须进行进一步的转换才能计算使用当前CIE建议的做法测量的XYZ值。下面的段落对此进行了更详细的说明。

trans-unit.source: This method transforms color values using relative colorimetry, as defined by the ICC Specification. This means that the XYZ values returned by this method are represented relative to the D50 white point of the CS_CIEXYZ color space. This representation is useful in a two-step color conversion process in which colors are transformed from an input color space to CS_CIEXYZ and then to an output color space. This representation is not the same as the XYZ values that would be measured from the given color value by a colorimeter. A further transformation is necessary to compute the XYZ values that would be measured using current CIE recommended practices. The paragraphs below explain this in more detail.
trans-unit.target: 此方法使用ICC规范所定义的相对色度来转换颜色值。这意味着本方法返回的XYZ值是相对于CS_CIEXYZ色彩空间的D50白点来表示的。这种表示方法在两步色彩转换过程中很有用,在这个过程中,色彩从输入色彩空间转换到CS_CIEXYZ,然后再转换到输出色彩空间。这种表示方法与用色度计从给定的颜色值测量的XYZ值不同。需要进一步的转换才能计算出使用当前CIE推荐的做法所测量的XYZ值。下面的段落将更详细地解释这个问题。

trans-unit.source: This method transforms color values using relative colorimetry, as defined by the International Color Consortium standard. This means that the XYZ argument values taken by this method are represented relative to the D50 white point of the CS_CIEXYZ color space. This representation is useful in a two-step color conversion process in which colors are transformed from an input color space to CS_CIEXYZ and then to an output color space. The color values returned by this method are not those that would produce the XYZ value passed to the method when measured by a colorimeter. If you have XYZ values corresponding to measurements made using current CIE recommended practices, they must be converted to D50 relative values before being passed to this method. See the fromCIEXYZ method of ICC_ColorSpace for further information.
trans-unit.target: 此方法使用国际色彩协会标准定义的相对色度法转换颜色值。这意味着此方法采用的XYZ自变量值是相对于 CS_CIEXYZ 颜色空间的D50白点表示的。此表示在两步的颜色转换过程中很有用，在该过程中，颜色从输入颜色空间转换为 CS_CIEXYZ ，然后转换为输出颜色空间。用色度计测量时，此方法返回的颜色值不是将产生传递给该方法的XYZ值的颜色值。如果您的XYZ值与使用当前CIE建议的做法进行的测量相对应，则在将其传递给此方法之前，必须将其转换为D50相对值。参见 fromCIEXYZ ICC_ColorSpace 的方法以获取更多信息。

trans-unit.source: This method transforms color values using relative colorimetry, as defined by the International Color Consortium standard. This means that the XYZ argument values taken by this method are represented relative to the D50 white point of the CS_CIEXYZ color space. This representation is useful in a two-step color conversion process in which colors are transformed from an input color space to CS_CIEXYZ and then to an output color space. The color values returned by this method are not those that would produce the XYZ value passed to the method when measured by a colorimeter. If you have XYZ values corresponding to measurements made using current CIE recommended practices, they must be converted to D50 relative values before being passed to this method. trans-unit.source: This method transforms color values using relative colorimetry, as defined by the International Color Consortium standard. This means that the XYZ values returned by this method are represented relative to the D50 white point of the CS_CIEXYZ color space. This representation is useful in a two-step color conversion process in which colors are transformed from an input color space to CS_CIEXYZ and then to an output color space. This representation is not the same as the XYZ values that would be measured from the given color value by a colorimeter. A further transformation is necessary to compute the XYZ values that would be measured using current CIE recommended practices. See the toCIEXYZ method of ICC_ColorSpace for further information.
trans-unit.target: 此方法使用国际色彩协会标准定义的相对色度法转换颜色值。这意味着此方法返回的XYZ值是相对于 CS_CIEXYZ 颜色空间的D50白点表示的。此表示在两步的颜色转换过程中很有用，在该过程中，颜色从输入颜色空间转换为 CS_CIEXYZ ，然后转换为输出颜色空间。此表示形式与通过比色计从给定颜色值测量的XYZ值不同。要计算使用当前CIE建议的方法测量的XYZ值，还需要进行进一步的转换。请参阅 toCIEXYZ 方法 ICC_ColorSpace 了解更多信息。

trans-unit.source: This method transforms color values using relative colorimetry, as defined by the International Color Consortium standard. This means that the XYZ values returned by this method are represented relative to the D50 white point of the CS_CIEXYZ color space. This representation is useful in a two-step color conversion process in which colors are transformed from an input color space to CS_CIEXYZ and then to an output color space. This representation is not the same as the XYZ values that would be measured from the given color value by a colorimeter. A further transformation is necessary to compute the XYZ values that would be measured using current CIE recommended practices. See the toCIEXYZ method of ICC_ColorSpace for further information.
trans-unit.target: 此方法使用国际色彩协会标准定义的相对色度法转换颜色值。这意味着此方法返回的XYZ值是相对于CS_CIEXYZ颜色空间的D50白点表示的。此表示在两步的颜色转换过程中很有用，在该过程中，颜色从输入颜色空间转换为CS_CIEXYZ，然后转换为输出颜色空间。此表示形式与通过比色计从给定颜色值测量的XYZ值不同。必须进行进一步的转换才能计算使用当前CIE建议的做法测量的XYZ值。请参阅 toCIEXYZ 方法 ICC_ColorSpace 进一步的信息。

trans-unit.source: This method transforms the name of the given service class into a provider-configuration filename as described in the class comment and then uses the getResources method of the given class loader to find all available files with that name. These files are then read and parsed to produce a list of provider-class names. The iterator that is returned uses the given class loader to look up and then instantiate each element of the list.
trans-unit.target: 此方法按照类注释中的描述将给定服务类的名称转换为提供程序配置文件名，然后使用给定类加载器的 getResources 方法查找具有该名称的所有可用文件。然后读取并解析这些文件以生成提供程序类名称的列表。返回的迭代器使用给定的类加载器查找并实例化列表中的每个元素。

trans-unit.source: This method translates an event relative to the given component. This involves, at a minimum, translating the coordinates into the local coordinate system of the given component. It may also involve translating a region in the case of an expose event.
trans-unit.target: 该方法将事件转化为相对于给定组件的事件,至少需要将坐标转化为给定组件的局部坐标系。这至少包括将坐标转换到给定组件的局部坐标系中。在暴露事件的情况下,它还可能涉及转换一个区域。
